Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... huf..... Why is this happening...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...A dead end...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This place......

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: There she is! Get her!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: You’re not so smart after all, eh?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Hee hee.... So this is what we’ve been treating as gods, after all these years?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Look at her, she’s shaking! Bwahaha!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Please don’t do this! We... we’re friends, right?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Friends...?? How dare you, you witch...!! Say whatever you want, but you can't save yourself!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Hey, didn’t you get healed by her before? You don’t have to do it if you're uncomfortable doing this. I’ll take care of her for you.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Shut up. I’m not gonna let you take all the credit!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess I’ll have to fight them...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... huf.....

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Sounds like there's someone over there!!

Item.name: warrior-5
Item.talkText: There! Somebody’s there!

Item.name: warrior-4
Item.talkText: These guys... They’re scouts from Patrol Unit 3! Were they defeated by witch?!

Item.name: warrior-3
Item.talkText: She can't be far. Scatter to find her!

Item.name: warrior-3
Item.talkText: Get her no matter what! Even if it’s a half-blood, we could all get promoted if we catch one!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... This can’t be real... It has to be a nightmare....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Someone wake me up already.... and....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I miss you... Robin... Michelle....

Item.name: warrior-5
Item.talkText: But wouldn't it be difficult to catch her alive? She did knock out those two patrol guys by herself...

Item.name: warrior-3
Item.talkText: Just kill her. Pope promised promotion for those who can bring the witches to him.

Item.name: warrior-4
Item.talkText: These guys were trying to catch her alive, that’s why. Idiots... Hee hee!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Mph mmmm.... Vanilla pie... Yummy..........

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m gonna hide the leftover.. Kueh heh heh.. Ehehehe.... Hee hee hee!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Michelle's going to eat it up!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What?! Where’s my vanilla pie?!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Wake up, sleepyhead. There are some warriors here ‘cause of some injuries.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Michelle gave my vanilla pie to the warriors!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... Eh? So it was a dream??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Yup. Now go see the warriors...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Th... Thank goodness, my pie is safe...!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Well, well! Since you guys work so hard to guard this village...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I’ll just take 200 Gold from each of you!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Don't be upset! The village doctor would charge 300 Gold, you know.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: (We were hoping to get treated for free... But we didn't know this greedy deity would be here...)

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Hehehe, did you just say “I’m not charging them”?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ugh... I was gone for just a few minutes...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I was doing it for Luna! Just in case she didn't want to be bothered...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......That’s very nice of you...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You're welcome!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why were you charging them?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Eeek...... No! I'm not charging them!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why? What's the matter?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Oh please! What's wrong with charging a bit of money for the effort!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Well then, I’ll tell Durok you said that.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Ee...eek!! Lord Aramute!?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I was passing by when I felt magic power coming from here. I thought Luna was helping out the warriors...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: It was me! I helped out those warriors! I wanted to do some good, you know! Heh heh!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And get some gold out of it?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I believe you were taught to use your miracles well... Maybe Durok taught you wrong. I should tell him about this.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: No... Please! He scolded me the last time!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Then I should be clearer this time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yup. Happened the last time, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: By the way, who's this busy kid?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Oh, right. This is Lucia, Elysion’s daughter.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I was showing her around the village. Since she is going to be a Temple Lord one day, too.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: She got herself out while Elysion’s still working, so...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Oh~~~~~ What a cutie pie!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: She looks like a handful. Shoo! Go away!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Lord Elysion’s daughter, huh? No wonder you look so graceful!! So pretty!!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Hm? A monster, inside the village...?

Item.name: ark
Item.talkText: It’s me, Ark! Lord Elysion cast an ugly bird magic on me... So I can come find Lady Lucia.

Item.name: ark
Item.talkText: She didn’t want me wandering around the village in my real form.

Item.name: ark
Item.talkText: Well then, excuse me!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: I ran into that deity girl in the green cape the other day in the woods...

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Hmph... After all, those so-called deities aren’t that different from us humans, eh?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Shh, watch what you say. Lord Aramute has ears everywhere, you know.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Nah, they're just stronger than us. They aren't actually that great and almighty!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: R... Really...?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: This one time, I went to Aimhard Temple and I actually got to see him up close... He was... Let me just say he’s nice to women... I mean, almost “too nice”. You know?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: See? They’re just a different race that can use a bit of magic...

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Actually, you know what? The secret to their power...

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: You know there are springs in every temple, right? People say that's the source of the deities’ power.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: I’ve never heard that before.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: When they grant people's wishes, they always do the ceremony by those springs. For several hundreds of years... No exception.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: T... Then....

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Maybe... If we could get a hold of those springs, we won’t even need their miracles anymore.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Shhhh! Be quiet...! Someone might hear us!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I’ll be going now, then...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Good bye~!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Bye bye~~~! And please don't tell Lord Durok~~♥

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute, you're the best~~~~~!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna! Do you want to go pick some vanilla flowers? I found some while gathering herbs earlier today!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Me too! I want to come!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Okay! Come with us, Michelle!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not going.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Why? You even dreamed about vanilla pie earlier.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Is it because Michelle wants to come with?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: N....nuh huh! It has nothing to do with that!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Va... Vanilla flower!? Where did you find it!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Oh, really?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Well, then I’ll just have to go with Michelle.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Let’s go, Michelle!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Yay~~~ Vanilla flower!! I’m going on a date with Robin~~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........I changed my mind.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Heh heh, I knew you would come!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: As if you can predict everything I do!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: No way. I found it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I was just going to sleep more! I didn't get enough sleep because you woke me up!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It's right below here. Right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ahh, it's true!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Ok! Robin! Get down there!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll die if I fall... Remember? I’m a human...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: So do you want us girls to get down there!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You're a deity... You won’t die even if you fall!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I don't wanna get dirt on my clothes! Can't you just do it?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll go down there.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Ha? Are you worried about Robin?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hahaha~~~ Luna and Robin sitting in a tree~~ K-I-S-S-...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: N...no! I just feel like climbing! It seemed fun...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s not like I’m worried about Robin!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ugh... Never mind, I’ll man up and get down there!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: ........ Ew, why do you guys care for each other so much?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo.... Let me go!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The flower is mine...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uh..... Ehhhh?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Lu... Luna!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Vanilla flower.......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... Lizards, lizards, lizards... I’ve had enough! I think I’m gonna throw up...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There aren’t that many to catch in the first place.... I’m starving!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Meat... I want some kind of real meat!

Item.name: potTalkPoint
Item.talkText: Fuuh! Fuuuu! Fuuuuuuu!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hee hee~ You’re the best!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whew~! That felt so good!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Splash! Splash~!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Shhhh! I got water in my ears!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It seems the warriors aren't searching around this area! Thanks to that, I was able hunt rabbit safely!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well then, it's time to make some Rualet!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It... It's a success! It's been forever since I had a real dish...! Waah!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Time to eat! Bon appetit!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No... No way! I can’t believe I ate it all!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I... I’ll get fat! What should I do!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Right, Michelle! She’s going to make fun of me when she sees me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And then Robin's gonna get disappointed too...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........Whatever. No one's here to see me anyways.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No! I could run into Robin in the woods! He’ll get disappointed!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Why do I care about what he thinks...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...................eek! No! No! I don't even care about Robin!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Exercise! I’m going to exercise! For my own health! For survival!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Exercise is tiring... I gotta go get some sleep...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I feel so much better! Is it because of the rabbit meat?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well then... a little more won't hurt... right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I recall spotting a Kentz Boar drinking water from the pond nearby...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should hunt one! It's going to be even better than rabbit meat!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff... huff...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yippee! I got a Stone Slab!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeek...! You... You!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: S... Sorry about before...! I was so hungry!

Item.name: angryBoar
Item.talkText: Grrrr!! Grraaah!! Grrraaahhhh!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Welp... I don’t have enough strength left after defeating that golem...!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Kyaa!! Go away!!!

Item.name: girlVoice
Item.talkText: How pathetic...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You're struggling over a boar!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hi, long time no see, but see, I’m in a bit of a danger...! Help me out!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Help you? For what? I’m just here to watch.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then why are you here?!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You dummy. I don’t know how to use offensive magic. You know I don't specialize in fights.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Err.. Then cast me some healing magic!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Let me think about it~ Maybe if you gave me that stone slab you just got...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo.... That’s not nice!! FINE. Just help me!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Deal~♥

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... huff..... What a relief!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: The Stone Slab.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! You and I haven’t seen each other for so long! Don’t you wanna say hi first!? This isn’t very nice!! You've changed!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: .........How is that any different now...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You used to be just a jerk who would take advantage of other people!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Me, changed? How?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I was just messing with you. You're too gullible.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Girl, get it together. No matter how desperate you are, always think about what is better for you.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You really need to harden up in times like this. Otherwise you'll get caught by warriors.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hmph... Being the smarter one, I could give you some advices every now and then.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Let's meet up on the top of Mt. Kentz next time. Humans rarely go all the way up there, so we should be able to share information in peace!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh? You’re leaving already? But we’ve just met... I’ve got tons of stuff to talk about...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: We’re near the village... You dummy. I don't want to stay here for too long! And... I just came by to see just in case... But don't tell me you’re living in that old cave.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh... How did you know...?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Idiot! You’re too easy to read! Too naive... Hurry and move out of that place. You’ll get caught in no time!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Sigh... I don't even know why I'm worried about you anyways.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Who knows, even a simple brain like yours could be useful for survival...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Let's meet up on the top of Kentz Mountain on the next night with the brightest moon. Get me some useful information~! Like where to find a lot of magical ingredients and stuff like that. See ya!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Oh, right. Let's have a password between you and me.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: If you get trapped by the warriors when we meet... Say “It smells like vanilla flower today”.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She’s gone...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We didn't get to catch up...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I remember... Lord Aramute used to put a mind control spell on a boar and let me ride on it...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I can try that too...

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Focus... Focus....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is it a success....??

Item.name: boar
Item.talkText: .....Purr♥

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .........Yay!! It's a success!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (There it is... It came to drink water again!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Alright... I should use all my magic power to get him at once!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Pork barbecue it is!!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (But... What if boar meat is more fattening than rabbit meat...?)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Nah, wild boars have very little fat so it shouldn’t be that bad!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Now....? No.... Not yet!!)

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: (Is this enough...?)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gotcha!! It worked!!!

Item.name: angryBoar
Item.talkText: Grrrraah! Grrrraah!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I... I could have died!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Basic magic is too weak...! I could be killed by wild animals, let alone the warriors...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know it could be dangerous... But maybe this time, I should try and go to the side of Kentz Mountain. I know there are ingredients for 3-Circle Flame Pillar Magic Circle over there!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...But I can't remember what those ingredients were... Let me look at the recipe.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: My barbecue♥

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I should be able to put some mind control over him~

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Ack!! I can’t hold it anymore!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff...... I almost died!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Transportation Magic Circle..? I think I can connect this with the magic circle at home!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I finally found it... Lord Arua’s temple.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I remember visiting here with Lord Aramute when I was younger...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But now... It’s probably empty...

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Not completely empty.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: I’m protecting this temple.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A... Aslan!! You were alive!?

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Yes. Though it is pitiful... I am still alive.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t blame yourself... You fought enough.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: No. When the men attacked us... That’s when I should have died. I failed to save my master.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So Lord Arua was also...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sob.... They were so good to the humans... Why did they...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Humans are chasing me every day... I’m also struggling to keep myself alive...

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Just stay alive. And keep waiting. These were the words of my master.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What will happen if I wait? Are they going to come back to life somehow?!

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: He didn’t say.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: But he said to wait. And I will wait. Protecting this temple...

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: One more thing...

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: He said to...believe.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........Believe in what....?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The spring is dead. It’s probably the humans.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: “Only the ones with good will and pure mind can purify the spring and use its power”... Lord Aramute once told me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, the spring isn’t changing or anything... Maybe I’m not pure enough. Sigh...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Only if I could use this spring... I could probably wipe them all out!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sigh... I wish I knew what was on their mind.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll wait. Lord Arua. Lord Aramute. And all the Temple Lords.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know you were always right. It’s going to be right this time, too... right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can feel the energy of the moon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should tell Michelle about how Lord Arua’s spring reacted. She’ll be excited to hear this!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: It's unlike you to be punctual... You used to sleep in and be late for everything...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You should have come late.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't sleep so mush these days. Anyway, how have you been? We didn't really get to talk last time...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Probably the same as you. Always being chased, hiding...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I was asleep when they suddenly barged in... So I ran to the top of Kentz Mountain.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I went up the North hill. Remember? We went there with Robin to get vanilla flowers.. I was hiding there.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Yeah. I remember.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Speaking of which...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Doesn’t it smell like vanilla flower today?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... What? There's no flower around here.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Good job. Miss Witch.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Hee hee, it’s easier than we thought!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: All we did is scare your friend a little bit.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: M... Michelle!! What's going on?!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Sorry... I got caught on my way up here...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: It was the first time I had a sword pressed against my throat... I was scared... I...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Well... What about you?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Come, join Pope’s experiment. As long as you comply, I promise you will live.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Michelle.... you.....?! Did you sell me out...?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Well... I...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I was scared! I couldn’t help it!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: We were gonna get caught eventually if we kept living on Kentz Mountain! Actually, no matter where you live... they'll get us in the end! Even all the Lords are dead!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: There’s no other deity alive! There's nothing we can do...! Maybe we should just let them get us... because at least that way we can live!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: This is my conclusion! It’s still better than dying!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hey...! Be careful!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Just give up and come here.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Lu... Luna!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ughh... He saw me!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Wi... Witch!?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: #@%!! Why did you appear just the moment when my supervisor went to pee....!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm..... You know, we could just pretend like this never happened...right?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Eeeek.. Chances like this don’t come very often... If I could catch this witch right now...!

Item.name: enemy_rock
Item.talkText: owww..... The best opportunity of my life...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: J... Just to be clear, you attacked me first!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let me just ask you one thing. What happened to Lord Aramute? Was he imprisoned?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: .... Stupid witch. Aramute is dead.

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Pope himself pierced his heart with his sword. He didn’t even have a chance to resist.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No... No way! There’s no way Lord Aramute is dead!!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Heh heh... It doesn’t matter what you believe. Witch.. You too, will soon... Be caught...

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: But there’s a good news for you. Because the Pope regrets killing all the deities... So you won’t be killed.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...You guys are regretting what you’ve done... now? It’s too late to ask for forgiveness... Even if you’re feeling guilty at this point...!!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Heh heh... Stupid witch. Who said anything about feeling guilty?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re saying that but witch hunt is still going on!!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: The Pope needs samples for experiments... To fully unleash the power of the springs...!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: I don’t know whatever magic you deities put on those springs... But in the end we’ll find out... Everything about the source of their power!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You took the springs, yet you’re still hunting us to experiment on us...!?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: It’s almost shift time, so come back into the village!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ve got more questions... But I guess I’ll have to find out later...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you! Remember!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute is not dead!! He would never be defeated by your sword!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Heh heh... Think whatever you like..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There’s no way. Lord Aramute... defeated like that...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He is no match for those humans!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Something doesn’t make sense. I’ll go to the temple and find out myself!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know there are warriors in Lord Durok’s temple... I guess I’ll go to Lord Arua’s temple first.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Arua’s temple is on an island... So humans didn’t go there very much.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Alright! Let’s go to Lord Arua’s temple!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This spring used to be filled with radiance...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Arua’s blessing...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Arua! You were alive!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh... Maybe it was just the remnants of magic power that reacted to me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Arua~~~~~~~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. Still, it’s something....! I learned that the springs are powered by the Temple Lords!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m gonna get to the bottom of this! And wipe out those arrogant popes.... and the warriors!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Anyhow, I didn’t expect the spring to show any kind of reaction. I should tell Michelle about this!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should meet her up on the next night with the brightest moon. Would Michelle have something to tell me, too?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My home... is right down this path. But the warriors will get me if I get down there.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... I’ll probably run into warriors if I go further..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, he has a Stone Slab!

Item.motherEventName: 바위언덕 - 바벨리아 마을 입구 못들어가는 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There are warriors at the entrance to the village... I should avoid them.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Magic crafted~! Now I should be able to explore more places!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let's equip the magic to the slot!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The rocky hill is the entrance for the village so there will be warriors patrolling around. I should be careful until I craft the magic circle!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I used to be able to pass through this narrow gap here when I was smaller...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I remember... It’s West Shore past here. I used to run around there to catch crabs with Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s West Shore right across from here... The passage is too narrow...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I could pass through here when I was younger...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I got fat....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And got larger. Says who?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to pass through! I know I can do it!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I... I got stuck!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not fat!!! Inhale!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... huff.....

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I did it.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... I don’t want to pass through here again on the way back..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should be able to jump from there.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m tired from training!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeek... A person?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....It’s a girl...!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Ugh... It’s not over yet!! Don’t run away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: By the way, you were impressive...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... despite the flashy movements, they didn’t hurt very much. Like, they’re more showy than practical...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Shut up! How dare you judge my swordcraft...!!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I don’t want to hear that from you, let alone the palace warrior test!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah, so you’re trying to become a palace warrior?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you failed the test? For the reasons I just said?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You... You...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You wait and see!! I’ll catch you and become a palace warrior one day!!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Whoa... That was quick.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m standing still.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm? Did she just drop this?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s village down there.. Up there is Lord Durok’s Temple..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... I’ve got no choice but to go up..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I need to find somewhere to go before the warriors come. I should go to Lord’s Durok’s Temple...!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Wi... Witch!?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Ugh..... All the other warriors were deployed around Mt. Kentz today... Why today, of all time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....A warrior!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess there's no other way around it...!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: It’s a witch~~!! A witch!! If there’s any warrior nearby, come to Durok temple!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff....

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: .... There’s the witch!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If I go inside the temple, there’s no way out...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I need a place to hide at least..!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s a dead end... What do I do!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Enough with the hide-and-seek! I won't kill you if you behave...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No! Go away!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Hey! It’s Ice Cave below.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Deity or not, you won’t be safe if you fall into Ice Cave! Even if you're lucky and survive the fall, the monsters there are going eat you up...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Don't tell me... You're stupid enough to jump from there...!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: We should have just killed her first....! Why did I hesitate...! It would have been a piece of cake!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Lord Aramute.... Protect me...!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It hurts... I’m cold......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I’m alive... I guess I’m lucky...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why is everyone bullying me!!! Why me!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why..... Why is everyone suddenly calling me a witch...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why is everyone... I...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: First the warriors....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And... now this monster....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m sick and tired of all this!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... It’s so warm...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Am I dead..?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...........Maybe being dead isn't so bad after all...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s so comfy........

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... But it hurts.....

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I see that you’re awake.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... Where am I?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: This is where the Ice Witch used to live. There is no need to worry. There is no monsters around this house.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...Did you save me?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I noticed a golem was on the ground inside the Ice Cave... You were buried under his remainings.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait. My clothes! What happened to my clothes?!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: No need to worry. Your clothes are kept in the closet. It is cold here, so I dressed you in warmer clothing.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s not the point!! You... You...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't tell me...!! Did you...?!?!!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Did I what?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you see...?!!?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: See what?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My body!!!!!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: .....What about your body? One must be unclothed first in order to be dressed again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No way... There's no way I let this stranger see me naked!!! Waaaaaahhhhhh!!!!!!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Oh, I see. It’s been a long time since I left the temple. I forgot that you who dress in clothes are ashamed of your natural appearance.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: However, you must know that it is alright to be uncovered. Look at me. I am in my most natural form.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Go away!! Pervert!!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Well well... Having a personality is tricky. Things used to be simpler for me before I, too, acquired a personality.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I will leave you now. You may use this house as you please, as the Ice Witch is no longer here.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: ...My ears hurt.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Michelle sold me out...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Wait, Ice Witch? There was a real witch living here before?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, I don’t care. Survival is my priority!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...By the way, if this is the Icy Field... Will there be something to eat?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s fine. At least warriors are not going to come all the way out here. Think positive thoughts!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I could always go outside the Icy Field to get food, if I can’t find any here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, and I almost forgot!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The temple! Lord Aimhard’s temple is to the east of this Icy Field. It’s pretty far from Vavelia village, so there won’t be many warriors there!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...I knew I was getting too close to the village...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But he looks kind of clumsy. Maybe he's a new recruit.

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Errr... wait! Luna!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Either way... Get this...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......eh? Did someone call me Luna?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... Do you know me? Did you just call my name?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... You!?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: sigh..... That was merciless... You used to treat strangers so kindly.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Long time no see, Luna! I’m glad you’re alive!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: R... Ro... Robin!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....Is this real?)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It must have been really tough for you... right? Being chased after and all...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I heard stories about you. They said you fell from the cliff on Kentz Mountain...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Are you okay?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uh..... Yes...! You know me. I’m tough!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you... Why are you dressed like this?? This is the armor worn by the warriors!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: My dream since childhood was to become a warrior. I just recently passed the exam.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha... You look upset.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I understand. Warriors must be your worst nightmare.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But don't worry! I’m Robin. Your childhood friend!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Do you want to know why I’ve become a warrior?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, you said you’ve always wanted to become one.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ever since you disappeared.. I studied even harder.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: So I can become a warrior... and come find you. I worried about you a lot.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Really..? You really became a warrior to find me?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And now I’ve found you. See?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uh.... no. I would never think about you!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Um.... It's almost time for patrol. I think I have to go now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... Why? It’s been such a long time...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Are you sure you have to go now? Do you have other things to do?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Dummy. Be honest and just say you missed me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ehhh..? W...why would you think I missed you...??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Another warrior will come if I don’t go back now.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Although I might get in trouble for returning too soon... heh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh.... I see...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna. Can we meet again here?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? Really?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: W...well... If you insist... I guess...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s meet here on the night with the brightest moon, then.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hm! I can't say I didn’t miss him, but it’s not like I wanted him to stay long...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He's going to get board on his duties. So that’s why I’m going to come here to hang out so he doesn't get too bored.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....The spring is completely alive! The power of the spring should have disappeared once the humans took over it, like Lord Arua's spring!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard! You’re alive, aren't you!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I knew it...! This is your answer, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You probably have reasons... I can feel it. I know that you're alive...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I wonder how the spring came back to life.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Can it come back to life on its own?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: At least now I’m sure the Lords are alive! And something is about to happen.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait, what's up with all this noise? Is there someone else in here, other than me?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Ma... master!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: This is it, Witch.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ouch! It hurts!!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Probably because you slacked off when you should have been training...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Shut up! I was just going easy on him since he's so good looking!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: What are you?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Hey! You were just calling me a witch, weren't you? What a weirdo.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A warrior...! There's warriors stationed here, too!?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh my word! When did you get behind me!?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Wait, you're a witch!? There’s another witch, just like me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s my question! When did YOU get behind me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And what’s up with calling yourself a witch?! We're deities!! Don't let them call you that!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I don't think this is a good time to argue!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hey! Miss deity! We're kind of in trouble, so do something about that guy with my master!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: My master is lazy so she tends to slack off when it comes to training... So she's having trouble fighting this warrior off.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Didn't I tell you to shush it? I can do it on my own!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Arguing in front of me... You better be ready to take this!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: He... He’s coming!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This warrior... He's so much stronger than any of the other palace warriors I fought before!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Be ready to take this... final blow...!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Uhm, actually.... What do you think about letting him go? I... I don't dislike him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .........We could.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Oh come on! Are you both crazy? You shouldn’t let someone like this go! He's going to come back with more trouble! Can't you tell? He's obviously a high rank warrior!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Right? Black Joe, You think he's good looking, too. Right?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: No!! That’s not what I meant!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (.................He reminds me of Robin...)

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: If neither of you are going to do it, I’ll do it!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oops... I accidentally knocked out the handsome warrior, too!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m Pieberry! Nice to meet you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Yeah.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh? What's up? We just fought off the warrior together!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I like you~~ I’m super excited to see you! Let’s be friends!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You can come visit my house~! I’ll show you my pet!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, if it's that ugly bird, no thanks.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And a word of advice... Not much good will come from us becoming too close to each other. It's safer to live scattered apart.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Aww... You don’t have to be so uptight...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You ugly, stinky witch!! You’re not my master anymore!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Looks like I gotta go have a little talk with my bird.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Bye! See ya around!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She's really cheerful...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Almost seems like she's got nothing to worry about. When I’m having such a hard time...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And what's up with calling herself a witch? Where’s her pride as a deity?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, I should have asked about the spring!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Nah. What would she know?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I better go check on Lord Elysion's spring, too. The spring is alive, so it means the Lords are alive too!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And the night with the brightest moon is fast approaching. I should go visit Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe Robin can tell me how to get to Lord Elysion's temple.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Black Joe, sorry.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t think I’ve ever been to Lord Aimhard’s temple before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There was a bit of magic power left at Lord Arua’s temple. I wonder if Lord Aimhard’s is the same....

Item.motherEventName: 에임하드 신전 이후 아루아 샘 확인
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh my...! Lord Arua’s spring is restored, too!

Item.motherEventName: 에임하드 신전 이후 아루아 샘 확인
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... I think I’m gonna cry... There is... so much... so much hope...!!

Item.motherEventName: 에임하드 신전 이후 아루아 샘 확인
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ............But I wonder why the springs are getting restored again. I wish I knew why.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I have training to do and magic ingredients to collect!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can’t find Robin. I wonder if he’s not coming today?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Yes, Robin is here.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Great job, Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What's going on....?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Whoa, calm down. We're not here to kill you. After all, this is the most perfect opportunity to capture you alive.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Commander, please consider how much I’ve contributed to this. We would never have known if I didn't show up early because I mistook the shift hours.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin... Were we being watched?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Yes~! Exactly what I wanted to hear~ Thank you!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: It’s me! Who contributed the most to get you captured. Ahem!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Robin. As promised, I’ll promote you to a Squad Leader.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ughh... We should have been more careful...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But Robin! Don’t worry! I can take care of these....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Thank you, Commander Berto.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: R.......... Robin............. What is all this about?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Sorry about this. But he promised me a promotion. There's no way that I could turn it down.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I hope you understand. I... You know how much I wanted to be a warrior.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Oh, and I’ll put you in charge of planning witch hunts from now on.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I really want to become a great warrior.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Bwahahahaha! Look at her face!! Robin. I never knew you had such a talent. Seems like you really got her to trust you...!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I guess I made the right call. We should put together new witch hunt teams with young and handsome warriors just like you!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m flattered, Commander.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you know why I wanted to meet you on the night with the brightest moon?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This moonstone I got from Lord Aramute.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: On the night with the brightest moon.... This moonstone shines the brightest.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I was going to protect you with the power of this moonstone. That’s why I wanted you to meet me on the night with the brightest moon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess there’s no need for it anymore.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Eeeeek.....!! Attack the witch!! She's about to do something!! Hurry!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Bye, Robin.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I... This is... I can explain everything!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna... Everything I did was to protect you. Trust me.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Heh heh... You’ll end up dead at the end of the day, being hunted down and all. But you will be protected as long as you come to the laboratory.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I can still handle this!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: This is nothing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booooo.... My hands hurt!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is... Robin’s Training Dummy...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He punched this thing everyday saying that he wants to be a warrior someday.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... Should I try it out? Training myself now... is going to help me out later when I have to fight the warriors, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How ironic. Robin made this to become a warrior himself... Heh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff...huff... It’s not as easy as I thought.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My arms hurt...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I feel refreshed!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh... That was refreshing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s start by punching some Training Dummy!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ughh.. I’m all wet!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uh..... Ehhhh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s see... For 3-Circle Flame Pillar Magic Circle... I need 1 Low-Grade Stone Slab, 3 Sulfur Powder, and 2 Dried Leaves.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... It’s a bit hard to memorize, but I can look at the recipe outside, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know I can get the Sulfur Powder in the Kentz Mountain cave.. Low-grade Stone Slab is going to be a bit tricky, since I can only get one from a Leaf Golem...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You sleepyhead... Didn’t think you could actually make it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t sleep that much these days... Especially because of the warriors...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Where do you live now?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I’m not going to tell you. I can’t risk you telling the warriors when you get caught.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not going to betray you...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Do you have any information related to survival? First, there’s a couple of things I found out...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You probably know Pope took over Lord Aramute’s temple.. There are warriors stationed near Lord Durok’s temple as well. So don’t go anywhere near the temples.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Who took over Lord Durok’s temple? Are they planning to build a village there, too?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I don’t know. And honestly, I don’t care. All I’m saying is that you shouldn’t go near the temples for whatever reason.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: What about you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ve actually fought a warrior at the rocky hill. And that warrior told me...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: ARE YOU INSANE? YOU FOUGHT A WARRIOR????

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t worry! I beat him~ It was a piece of cake!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Are you stupid?! They can track you down with dogs with the slightest hint of your smell!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Idiot! Why would you go down there?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t be so mad. Oh, and one more thing.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They’re trying to catch us for experiment. Because they’re trying to fully unleash the power of the springs. Which means the humans can’t fully use the power of springs yet.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And, this is my opinion, but I don’t think Lord Aramute is dead. The warrior said the Pope’s sword took his life...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But there’s no way Lord Aramute would be defeated by a human’s sword. It doesn’t make any sense.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Well, that was interesting... But that’s not going to help us survive.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Please be more realistic! Where to find food, what's dangerous, where there are no humans... We need stuff like that!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... Lord Durok looked after us, don't you remember? Being realistic is great, but...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Don’t give me that look.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: We've got to do what we can to survive, right? They would want us to be safe and well, too!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: And you should be more grateful for my advices!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Err....... well...... I didn’t really......find out......there’s.....nothing much...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hey!! What were you doing all this time?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Try to find some more practical information!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We didn’t get to talk a lot last time because you were gone so fast... How have you been?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm, okay. Let's talk about that first.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Let’s meet again here on the night with the brightest moon. Well then...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Again, she’s gone as soon as she’s done...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Well, it was still pretty interesting, so here’s a present for you! I got this from Lord Durok’s temple a while ago.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? Really? It's not like you to give away something for free.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I’m not that stingy. Ahem!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: After all, you should train yourself and become strong enough to protect me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Right... She was never really good at offensive magic...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Okay. Thanks!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh... Michelle's not here. Is she going to be late?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Or... Did she get caught!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There's something written on the rock...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Luna!nn-I’m busy today, so see you later.nn--Michelle-

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Boo... She stood me up..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....I didn’t have much to tell her anyways.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, There’s a Ice Magic Encyclopedia, too! Is this something that the Ice Witch used to use?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard Ice Magics can slow the enemies down, even though they’re not the strongest...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? Why is there a monster this big.... this close to the road....??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeek! It’s just a monster, but I can feel some sort of emotion... Is it angry?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s going to be pretty loud if I fought this huge monster. I don’t want to create a scene this close to the road...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: O... Okay! Fine! I’m leaving!! Could you just stop screaming!? Drawing humans’ attention is the last thing I want!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Whee!! Stop!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ack!! What are you!!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You can’t go past here!! Go back! Go away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Of course... There are warriors here because it’s the entrance to the village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: More warriors are going to show up if I made a ruckus here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......What are you doing there?

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: H... Help me.... I was trying to pick some herbs... But my foot slipped....

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: Please... I can’t feel my arm anymore...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Boo... What should I do....

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: Aaargh!!! I... It’s a witch!!!

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: M... Magic...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Shush, will you?

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: P... Please! I don’t want to die..!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! I just saved your life!

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: D...don’t hurt me please!!

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: Th... Then I’ll go...

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: A witch!!! A wicked, cheating, evil witch!! Help!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I should have just left you there...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t worry. I’m not going to hurt you. I’m a deity, you know?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sigh... Have you ever seen a deity hurting anyone with your own eyes?

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: Well I’ve never actually seen it... But Pope always tells us to be aware of the witches...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't keep saying that! I’m not a witch!

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: F... Forgive me! Miss Witch... ma’am! Just... Just don't hurt me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Just go, already. You're getting on my nerves...

Item.name: lalaquePerson
Item.talkText: Thank you, ma’am!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? He dropped something.

Item.name: lalaquePerson1
Item.talkText: Ugh... The wild dogs again...!

Item.name: lalaquePerson2
Item.talkText: Not again... We don’t have anything to eat for dinner....

Item.name: lalaquePerson1
Item.talkText: Actually, I don’t think now is not the best time to worry about food. Those wild dogs were just eating the berries before, but they’re now coming after us!!

Item.name: lalaquePerson1
Item.talkText: A... a witch!!?

Item.name: lalaquePerson2
Item.talkText: Wild dogs and a witch! Wild dogs and a witch!!!!

Item.name: lalaquePerson2
Item.talkText: We’re dead!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... This is what happens every time.

Item.name: lalaquePerson1
Item.talkText: Guhhh... Now she’s coming for us...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. It’s you guys now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......Why do I even bother.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Th... That warrior....!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can feel so much magic power radiating from him..... He’s already pretty far away, but it’s strong enough for me to still feel it...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait a sec... I know this energy... It’s a deity!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .........................................Can it be Lord Aramute!? I can vaguely sense Lord Aramute’s energy from his magic power.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... Should I go after him?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....sigh.. But what if he’s actually a warrior? That armor is worn only by top rank warriors...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........No! It’s not possible for a human to have that kind of energy. That has to be Lord Aramute!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He probably has reasons!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Master! Stop! Stop!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: It’s Vavelie Road over there! There are warriors around, let's just make a detour through the golem cave!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Hmph! I have something I want to do, for the first time! I need to get to the Icy Field as soon as I can!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She is... The deity I met at Lord Aimhard’s temple.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Has she been to Lord Elysion's temple as well?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......... I think she got a bit taller, too....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I forgot to go after that warrior!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......It’s probably too late by now. I should have talked to him before he went to Vavelie Road!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, since I’m closer to Elysion temple now... I should get to the temple first.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The entrance has collapsed... It’s probably the humans.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That warrior is definitely Lord Aramute! He’s going around and recovering all the springs, one by one!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He’s probably planning to bring back the Lords after reviving all the springs!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........I can feel my heart pounding! My heart can’t contain this excitement! What should I do!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Kyaa!♥

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Aaah...! I can’t just sit here and wait! I’ll find Lord Aramute and tell him that I’m going to help him!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He went towards Vavelie Road, so he might be somewhere around. To Vavelie Road!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There are warriors everywhere because it's near the village...

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: W... Witch!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Filthy humans... You will never call me a witch again.

Item.name: wrrr_1
Item.talkText: S... Squad Leader sir!!

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You betrayed me with that gentle expression on your face... Only if I knew how filthy you were in the inside... Booo....!!

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should have hit him harder!!

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I promise... I’ll find Lord Aramute and bring back the age of deities.... Robin! I’m never going to forgive you!

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What do I do now... I need more information....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What's that sound...?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Whoa! There’s a house in the Icy Field! I can’t imagine anyone living out here where it's freezing!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hmm... I’ve heard that there used to be a village here, but it's long gone now. Maybe that's a house that they missed when they were taking down the buildings.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But it looks pretty neat. Seems like there's somebody living here. Should we go ins........

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff... That was close! What is this?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you?!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ah.... You! The witch from Aimhard temple!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I made myself clear.... that I am a deity, not a witch!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you up to, anyways?!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ehhh~ come on! Don't be so cold to a friend!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Again, I think I’ve made myself clear that we shouldn't be friends.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Heyy... What did I do? I’m just glad to see you here...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't need any of that! I don't need any friends!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: S... Stop it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't..... need.......

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Look, I’m sorry that I came here. But I was only looking for Lord Durok's temple, and there is no reason why we should fight.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: If we had to fight, I'd rather fight against the warriors instead of fighting you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I said I don't need friends! Go! Go away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You can't fool me anymore! After all I’ve done for the humans, they're all trying to kill me now! Michelle sold me out... and even Robin betrayed me!!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Sounds like she got betrayed by someone... She doesn't look well. It's probably better to leave her alone for now...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: sigh..... I guess so.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She got herself caught.... And then sold me out to get her life spared!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stupid, cunning liar!!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: What a nasty monster....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Right? Robin is such a nasty....!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .........Eh? This feeling....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No way...! He’s usually just in the cave! What’s he doing outside?!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: That’s one nasty looking guy right there....

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: So, I’m going!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: He seems pretty strong... So you gotta help me out. Friend!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Aww... But I like her...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Look at her giving us the evil eye! She’s never going to be your friend!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Keh heh heh~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yay~~ We won!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You can get to Lord Durok’s temple through the Ice Cave.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You remembered where I was going! I just said it once, but you remembered!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Boo.... Don't get too close...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well... Since it looks like you're going after the magic power from the springs... The springs’ magic power will definitely help keep you alive.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I just gave you the information 'cause you helped me out just now. It's not because I want to be friends with you or anything.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You can go right over this Ice mountain to get to Lord Durok's temple, but it's impossible to climb up there. Of course it would be a pain to climb up through the Ice Cave, though.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Do you remember my name?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Kyahah~~! Hey... Spit it out! You're want to get to know me, right? How else would you remember my name!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: N...nuh huh! I just have really good memory! I’m smart, you know! I even used to help Lord Aramute at his office!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute... the owner of the last spring we visited, right? Black Joe.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hmm..... Quite unusual for a half-blooded deity. To have helped Lord Aramute....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, now you know how to get there. I’m a bit tired, so I going to go take a rest.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Awwww... Already? Can I visit your house before I go? I’m tired, too.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Pretty please??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph, no.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But come visit me anytime~~ I live in the Black Witch’s Forest south to the Merchants’ Road!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Black Joe! I’m tired, so let’s go back home for now and come back to the Ice Cave later!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I agree. You used too much magic at once.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: So, what's your name?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Thanks for telling me! Hee hee, I know you're nice in the inside!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna! I’m going home now! Don't forget to come visit me~~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......... She’s gone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She lives in the Black Witch’s Forest, huh?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: How cute~~

Item.name: pudding
Item.talkText: Purr! Purrr!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh.. Can I take one home?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: What are you going to do with it? They’re not useful in battles. Besides, they’ll dry up if you take them out of this cave.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: They’re not useless! I can keep one...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: and eat them. It’s going to be a good HP supplement during battles!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eh...? It went away...! Do you think it understood what I said?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh! Luna~~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: What are you doing here? You came all the way here 'cause you missed me, right??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I came here to see you, but not because I missed you.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Come on.. You don’t have to lie!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey... Did you see that warrior in golden armor at Elysion Temple, right?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eh? How did you know I went to Lord Elysion’s temple?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I thought you didn’t like me... But you were following me! Aww!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No! It was a coincidence! I went there because I had something to see there!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I saw the springs coming back to life. You’re probably only interested in the magic power from the springs, but I’m different. That’s why I need to know where that warrior in golden armor went.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: The springs? I’ve been reviving them. I’m going to revive Lord Durok’s spring next.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No, I’m not in the mood for joking around. Seriously. Do you know about the warrior in golden armor?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eh.......... Uhm..... But it’s true.....

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But I know the warrior in golden armor is also interested in the springs. He’s a deity like us, and he said he’s going to bring back the age of the deities by reviving all the springs!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Just as I thought! It’s Lord Aramute! Lord Aramute was bringing the springs back to life!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if he’s already made his way to Durok Temple? I should hurry up and get going...!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ehh... It was really me, though....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Do you want to come see my house? I’ll make you some strawberry juice!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. I’m busy.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Awwww~~ Come with me~~ Just for a few minutes!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey, don’t... Go away...!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But I don’t want to~~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Okay, okay. Fine! Just stop it. Just for a few minutes, okay?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Ugh... Don’t get so close!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: So I blew up that blond warrior with my flame magic!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But since he’s so handsome... I didn’t go too strong on him.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And then... his blond hair got all burnt and got frizzy! It was hilarious!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: He had this serious face and said, “Witch! I’m not going to let you get away next time!” It looked so funny!! ahahahaha~~~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s not that funny.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Aww... Not even this story?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Master, it’s true. I got burnt too many times so I would know... But it just sucks.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You’re just a bully. Meanie pants.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Sounds like someone wants to get burnt again, huh?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hm! Use magic in here and you’re going to burn this house down!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hee hee hee!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Keh heh heh!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Seems like someone forgot that I got Ice magic from Luna!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh..... Huh? You just laughed!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You just laughed, right? RIGHT?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I... I have a cold... That was a sneeze...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Good job, Black Joe. Keep it up!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: - Chapter 4 Black Witch -

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You.. Do you want me to punish you again?? Keep getting on my nerve!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Blah blah I can’t hear you~~ Is somebody talking???

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I’ll teach you ice magic, too.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Thanks! It’s so cold here, so flame magic didn’t work very well.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I’m not saying that we should be friends.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m here again!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t you ever get tired?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And have you been to Durok Temple yet?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Not yet~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s going to be tough. The ice wall is pretty high... So you’ll have to practice climbing up.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yup! That’s why I’m training Black Joe everyday! I was making him fly up while holding a rock...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: but he ran away, so I’m looking for him.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Then by chance I came up here and dropped by... Heh. While we’re here, we could have a cup of tea at your place...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ehh... But I came all the way up here...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You said you’re dropping by... But you actually came here to drink tea, right?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Wahhhh Master!! I got caught by a yeti! Help me!!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Wahhhhh!! He’s gonna eat me! Where are you master!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s noisy... I think you should go...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: What? I don’t hear anything.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Fat witch! Stupid, ugly witch! You’re not my master anymore!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’ll come back later! Show me around your house then!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You don’t have to bother.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gasp...! What's that?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry??? And the blond warrior??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whatwhatwhatwhatwhat is going on!! Why are they sitting so close to each other!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are they both out of their minds?!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: That's my concern these days. The poor villagers say they miss the old time when the deities were in power... I’m not so sure if what I’m doing is right...

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: But when I think of my father... I shouldn’t forgive the deities.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Of course... again, the reason why I’m not attacking you is because you saved that child last time. Don't misunderstand me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They hugged!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wahhhhhh! I can’t stand this anymore!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna~~ Lunaaa~~!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ............ She’s here again...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m just going to pretend like I’m not home...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Are you pretending to be not home?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Let’s go. Why do you keep coming here when she said she hates you?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Nah. Luna doesn’t hate me. I can tell!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Boo... Why does she just assumes...)

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: She’s still a bit shy, that’s all. She secretly enjoy being around me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why are you just assuming how I feel!? I don’t enjoy being around you! And I’m not shy!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: See? She was just pretending to be not home.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Just leave! I’m not going to let you in! I’m going to be studying magic for the whole day today!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: .....Aww... But came all the way here... Can I just take a peek?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. Because I know you’ll keep coming back if I let you in once. I’m sorry that you came far. You can go back now.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (See how she’s chatting with me? I told you she’s just shy.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can still hear you!! And I said leave!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eeek.... Okay! I’ll come back later~~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t come back later!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... She’s gone...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to read some magic books!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She looks really immature. I bet she doesn’t even study.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....Let’s see. The history of 5-circle Flame Magic...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I saw her using 5-circle Flame Magic the other day... That was surprising.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Nah. I don’t care. She probably got lucky and found some good ingredients for magic. If I can find the ingredients, I could use 5-circle flame magic, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... I need to get her off my mind...! She’s been bothering me too much!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Focus! I need to get stronger. And I’ll help Lord Aramute!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s see... On the magic springs... To control the spring, one needs a massive amount of magic power...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. I need more magic power to help Lord Aramute. Even if I had to give him all my magic power... I really want to be helpful.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know Kreytes leaves are good for increasing magic power. It won’t hurt to visit Kentz Mountain again...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (...I kind of want to check on the hideout, too...)

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: You are brilliant! To spot a witch again, this soon...!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Wait! I have something to tell you...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I already spared your life once, and I am not going to do that twice.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Please leave now. Because if you lay a finger on me... or say anything..... I am going to explode.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: We should have brought more people... Do you think we can get this witch on our own?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph, I don’t care how many of you are here. ‘Cause I'm going to blow every single one of you up!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess I can't let you live this time, huh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, do you have any last words?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ..... I... I don't know if you’d believe, but....!!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This place.... This where our childhood memories are...

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you came all the way here to get me...

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......And I was still looking forward to meeting you again after all the springs are recovered...

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess... even if we meet again later... we will no longer be friends.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (......Hey, what if she refuses again?)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You’re going to get rejected. Let’s just go.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: See. She opened the door! I knew she would open the door sometime! I knew it!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I just want to make myself clear. Just leave!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Of course, just as I expected.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Huh? It wasn't this bad before... She looks really upset today. She probably had something happen to her!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I brought this on my way here~ This is my favorite!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My mom used to pick these from the mountains for me...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh.... You had a mother?

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She was my adoptive mom... But she was really nice to me.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you for the berries.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (Whoaa.. She changed her mind! See, Black Joe?)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you, you can leave now.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Do you wanna chat while eating the strawberries....

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: (Her mood swings like crazy, master.)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sniff sniff... Hey, birdy! What’s that?

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: This? It's vanilla flower.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: He can’t lift me up to Durok Temple yet... So I sent him up alone and he brought this back! (Good job, Black Joe)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (Hurry, give it to Luna!)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Vanilla flower.......

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: (I don't want to. This is pretty rare...)
