Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (I’ll beat you up later!)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (....I’ll fix your cage.)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You want this? You can have it.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I thought we were friends.... No.... More than just friends....

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s why I still don't understand.... I get that he's been wanting to become a warrior...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But was this how bad you wanted it...? To the point where he would sell me out...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: When he told me he’s going to become a warrior and protect me... That was the first moment when I felt like I can really trust him...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ............It’s just shocking.... This has to be a dream.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... Why does it hurt so much?

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You had a close friend, right?

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: .........I was always on my own, so I can't understand your feelings completely,

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But I’ll be your friend.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I've never had any friends.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But... When I first met you, another witch, like me... I was really happy.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I got curious about how you’ve been living, what you felt when humans would mistreat us.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You are the first person I ever felt like talking to.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Okay, so are you going to head to Durok Temple now?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yup! I’m going to go after a bit of preparation! ‘Cause last time I almost climbed all the way up, but I fell at the last moment because my foot slipped. Heh heh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe we could run into each other again at Durok Temple.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: What do you say we go together!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Um.... I don't hate you anymore,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but we should move separately to go unnoticed by the warriors. Because there are going to be some warriors near Lord Durok’s Temple because it's so close to the village.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Okay. Then I’ll come visit again later!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (She didn’t say no! Heheh!)

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: (She didn't say yes, either.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do whatever you want.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Now, onward to Lord Durok’s Temple!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...Just as I thought!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... Two high rank warriors...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: L... Lord Aramute!!!

Item.name: who
Item.talkText: It’s a moonstone...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute! It's me, Luna! Don’t you remember?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I can definitely feel Lord Aramute's energy from him...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Yes? Yes! The moonstone from you, Lord Aramute...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh...? Lord Aramute..... I can feel animosity...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wasn't this Lord Aramute... !?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....!! Do you remember me now??

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: ......Sorry about that. The humans put me in this armor with some kind of evil spell...

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: And they were controlling my mind, making me bring the springs back to life for them...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh...... I see!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........Eh? Can the humans do that? How can they cast a spell powerful enough to control you, Lord Aramute...?

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: The half-blooded deity that instigated the war figured out the gods’ weaknesses. That's why all of the other Temple Lords have perished at their sword...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A weakness of you, Lord Aramute?! You have one?!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I barely have any memory of what the humans have done to me... Only thing I remember is that I could not resist.

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: ...That moonstone.... It has so much magic power in it...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! It’s getting stronger every day~ The magic power is even stronger than when you first gave this to me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..............So.. Are we going to crash into the Pope's castle? I’ll be your strength! I’ve become stronger!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: No. There is no way we can face him directly. I still do not know what kind of mind control spell they have used on me.

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I’ll keep pretending like my mind is being controlled. And wait for the opportunity to strike.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I see!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Luna. I need your magic power. I need your strength because of the spell they put on me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... You really need my help!? I can finally be of help to you!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Sure. Your moonstone has grown so much, so you must be pretty strong, too.

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I’ll head back to the Pope's castle. I will look for the Pope's weaknesses until we meet again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! Let’s wipe out all the humans! And bring back the old times....!!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Haha... Thank you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute..... I went through so much... You see... Robin tried to......

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Their spell wears off after a while. They will notice that the spell broke if I return late. Sorry, but I’ll have to listen to your story later.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh...... Okay!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Then let's meet up on the top of Kentz Mountain on the next night with the brightest moon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let's meet up on the top of Kentz Mountain on the next night with the brightest moon! I become the strongest when the moon is the brightest.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... The entrance is sealed...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe Lord Aramute forgot...?

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What was I expecting.....

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You guys, stop that!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: children
Item.talkText: Hey, look! He's rooting for this weirdo!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: children
Item.talkText: Let's beat them up together!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: children
Item.talkText: L... later, losers!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I saved the day...

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! Why do you keep saying you're going to protect me, when you’re the one getting beaten up all the time?

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Heh, I know you’re pretty strong for a girl.

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What.... I just saved your behind!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But it doesn't mean you shouldn’t be protected just because you have strength.

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Wait and see! I’m going to become a super cool warrior when I grow up....

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: and beat up anyone that bullies you!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
pieberry
Item.talkText: Also I’m trying to defeat this scary golem called Lavastein!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: We could beat it faster together~ you and me! It drops something called Lavastein Stone, and I heard it’s a super expensive, high-quality magic ingredient!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Let’s try together!! It’s right behind the Golem Cave behind my house!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. Your house is too far.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: It’s the Golem Cave behind my house~ Come come! Let's do it together, okay?!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eeeek..!! When is that thing going to die!?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You need to be able to defeat this at least, if you want to raid the Pope's castle. So let's forget about attacking the Pope and....

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh, really? Then I've really got to do this!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I think I ended up encouraging her... Pfft

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna is here! She really came! Kyaa~!♥

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Raiding the Pope's castle? Why?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: After Durok Temple, I’m going to go straight to the Pope!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And... I’m going to revive all the springs!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...........You’re still bluffing about that?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: ......But it’s true.....

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Are you going to help me!? Really!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn’t want to let you to take the magic ingredient. I’m gonna get it!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yes! Let's do it together!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........Did you even hear what I said...?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: He’s coming...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We won!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Whoa... So you know how to laugh.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: So she does.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you staring at..!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What. Why. We just won. What. Huh?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You just said “we”, didn’t you? Heheheh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You probably heard wrong! There's no “we”!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... I probably looked like a fool..!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is it wrong to enjoy victory? It’s not like I think of her as a friend! Hmph!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (......I think she’s going to visit me again.....)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... I can sense strong dark energy coming from him...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's the power of the Dark Magic Stone... That means he’s a warrior who’s tried swallowing a Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Parts of the temple was destroyed by the war... so he probably let himself loose.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Will I be able to defeat him...? I need to go through here to get to Lord Aimhard’s temple...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eww... All this dark energy makes me sick...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is what happens without the Lords! They’re just walking around like that in broad daylight...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No matter how messy the temple is without Lord Elysion... What are those filthy creatures doing in the temple?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey!!! Get out of here!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh..? There’s something on the ground.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess it’s their gold from raiding travelers.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........Yuck, even the gold smells awful...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Elysion would never allow something like this...! She was always so clean and tidy...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Humans don't usually come here... So this area should be safe to walk around.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: First of all, there's a Rua Leaf over there...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...aaaand another Rua Leaf over there! And then a rabbit to cook!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, I promised to meet Michelle on the top of Kentz Mountain on the night with the brightest moon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I don’t have any information to share with her yet...

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Eh?? A witch?

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Eek.. Should we run?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: What? Are you crazy? Have you ever seen a bandit run away?

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: But it’s a witch... Isn’t it dangerous?

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Wait... Isn’t there reward money for witches? I heard it’s a lot of money!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Ohhh!! Then we should capture her and take her to the Pope, right?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: ........ Idiots. Don't you know there’s also reward money for us? We're bandits....

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Oh, right.... We were... They’ll probably capture us if we went to the Pope's castle. What should we do?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Let's just sell her to the Dark Traders. Just attack!!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: (B... Boss... We lost.)

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: (Just pretend to be dead. Do you want to be eaten by the witch?)

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: (At least she's not going to eat you. Since your whole body smells like smelly feet.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can hear you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They even left their gold...

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Eeek...! Someone saw me slacking off...!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: (If she tells other people, I’ll probably get punished...)

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Hey, you. Today's the big witch hunting day. Just pretend you didn't see me. Okay? I don’t want to get in trou....

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Eeeeeeek.....! Witch!? I couldn't see her dark skin because it's so dark around here!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... I was going to meet Robin, and there’s a warrior...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... He was bigger than the other guys, so it was a bit harder to defeat than usual... He did look kind of dumb, though.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You guys again..?

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Ugh... Witch!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Bro, we should just run, right?

Item.name: hunters
Item.talkText: Eh...?? Is that a Witch??

Item.name: blackMerchant1
Item.talkText: Ugh... An intruder...??

Item.name: blackMerchant2
Item.talkText: Heh... What a luck! A witch just walked in... And we have hunters in here...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: M... Maybe I shouldn’t have come in here...

Item.name: hunters
Item.talkText: Wait a sec... Isn’t that the witch that used to live near the Vavelia village entrance? There’s quite a bounty on her head...!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Everybody stop.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Welcome to the Hideout of Dark Traders. Miss Witch.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........oh... So it’s the smugglers’ hideout...!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Don’t be afraid! We welcome witches like yourself. Would you like to come closer?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I doubt you can run away anyway.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......What do you want from me?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Trade. If you can get me certain items that I need, I’ll pay you.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Help me get a Royal Palace Pass from a warrior. It’s essential for our smuggling business for whenever we have to pass through the gates...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: But they’re so well made, and it’s almost impossible to make counterfeit copies. The warriors have those passes, but we can’t afford to get in trouble with the palace warriors...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I tried bribing, but those high-and-mighty warriors are just so... stuck up.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm..... So you’re saying, a witch like myself should fight a warrior for you?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Yes! We have hunters here, but there are some things even hunters can’t do.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I’ll pay you 2,000G if you bring me back a Royal Palace Pass from a warrior.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t really need gold though. It’s not like I can go shopping in the village...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Heh, you’re talking to the Dark Traders. Whatever you want, you can get from here. So what I’m offering you is a pretty good deal.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: It’s up to you, but in the end you will want to trade with us. Even a witch is going to need stuff for survival, right?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me that Royal Palace Pass from the warriors. I promise I’ll pay you well.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ha, my eyes never deceives me! I knew I made a good choice.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I’ll pay you as I’ve promised.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Trading with a human... What a strange feeling.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I never doubted your ability, but now I can start trusting you. Let me ask you another favor.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me a Klarates Leaf. You can get one from a huge spirit in the Kreytes forest that only appears during nighttime.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Our hunters tried, but there’s a strange aura all over that forest... They couldn’t do anything to that spirit.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... How much are you going to pay me?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: 6,500 Gold. All I’m asking for is just one leaf.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ehh...? Why is it so expensive?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Klarates Leaves are very rare and there’s a rumor that the Pope is secretly looking for them. And of course, this is a secret information.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......... What’s the Pope going to do with it anyway? Klarates Leaves are for increasing magic power. But humans can’t use magic...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Heheh, you really don’t know anything about what’s going on out there, eh?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Pope figured out how to use Aramute’s spring. He can now use magic like the gods.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh.. What?? Pope knows how to use the spring??

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Hee hee, don’t be so surprised. Yes. We humans now know how to use the power of the spring.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: But not as well as you deities... yet. The miracles are not strong enough...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... So that’s why he’s looking for Klarates Leaves to supplement the magic power?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Well, I don’t really care. Get me the Klarates Leaf.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me a Klarates Leaf. If you go to Kreytes forest during the night, there’s this big guy you can get the leaf from.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me the Klarates Leaf. If you go to Kreytes forest during the night, there’s this big guy you can get the leaf from.

Item.name: brand
Item.talkText: We have everything you need for survival.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh.... Ehhh??? Humans?

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Eck?! How did you!?

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: How did she undo the trap and get in here by herself??

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Ugh.. Get her before she gets away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Seems like they are bandits.... I couldn’t imagine this Wolf Cave to be their hideout.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The warriors used to search everywhere for these Bandits... And they were hiding in here all this time?

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Kekeke, today's our lucky day! We have a merchant!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Seems like he’s on his way back from Lalaque village with the money!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Sigh.....Annoying bandits.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I guess there’s no other way. Here’s 50,000G. I just collected this money from Lalaque village.

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Eh...? Boss... We could take a vacation this month with this money! I like this guy!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I can always make more money again.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: ............He’s not even scared....I’m confused...

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: ..........Hey! Aren't you scared? We could kill you! No.... We will kill you!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: You better let me go.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Huh? You’ve got some nerve, eh? What’s up with this guy?

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Just think for a moment. I still have to continue doing business with Lalaque village. And this is the only way into the village.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: What I’m saying we could meet again. So just take the gold and let me go.

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: ...........Boss. He does have a point.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: ......Don't let him convince you!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Are all merchants this crafty...?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Pft, I’ll take that gold.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Can I take that money instead?

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Eeek!! Boss! It's that witch again!!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Do... Don't get scared! We're stronger than the last time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh, I saved you. You're welcome.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I never asked for your help.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I was just going to pay them and go. You started fighting, so now I’m late now. What are you going to do about it?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeeh... What the...! But I saved you! You could at least say thank you!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Tsk, what a foolish deity.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: You only provide help after you have made a deal. Just keep this in mind.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What was that! That's rude! What is up with that human!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m just going to wait until they leave. I don't want to get involved.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: What, witch? Do you want to trade or something?

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: The giant is back!!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Hey! Shoot now!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Let’s test out the new bomb we just invented!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What is this!!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: #@%!! It's still a prototype, and the aim is off!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why..... Why are you attacking me so suddenly!?

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: .........Hmph! No giants can be trusted! Give us back the Angel’s Eye you stole from us!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Give us back the Angel’s Eye!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you get something robbed...? But why are you taking that out on me?!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Take this!! It will hit this time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: S... Stop!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Aaagh... I could die from taking one of those...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... An Angel’s Eye? Sounds pretty precious.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I have heard that there are dwarves living under the cliff of Mt. Kentz... But I’ve never actually seen them before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I didn't know they would be shooting cannonballs at me. Really... I think that could even kill a dragon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: W... wait! I brought you the Angel’s Eye!!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Here!! We’ll make sure it hits this time!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Wh.. What!? You brought the Angel's Eye?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Here, I found it from the Bandits’ hideout. This is it, right?

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Whoa.....!! Our blessing has returned to our village!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... What a relief. I could have died from that cannon fire...

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Th... Thank you. We knew it wasn't actually you who took it... but we were too mad at giant people.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I did almost die... But it’s fine. I’m glad you got your Angel's Eye back.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Those giant people... They barged in too quickly, and we didn’t even have the time to prepare our cannons.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: And when we were ready to fire, they already had the Angel’s Eye with them so we couldn't fire.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Would you like to come inside for a cup of tea?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thanks, but your houses are too small, so I can’t go inside....

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Oh, that's right. She’s a big fat giant. (chatter chatter)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......Eeeek! Leave out the “fat” part! I’m just bigger than you!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Yeah. She has bigger butt than ours... (mutter mutter)

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: But thank you again. We hope we can be of help to you someday, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ............Yeah! Please lend me your strength if I ever need help.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh..... A human...?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oh... It’s been a long time since I’ve met a person.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Old man, what are you doing in here?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I’ve been training in this cave for 50 years.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ehhh...? How did you live here for 50 years?! It can’t be real!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho... There’s hot water in the center of this cave, and the scorpions here are pretty tasty! Believe it or not, it’s surprisingly nice to live here!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (......He doesn’t seem dangerous. He thinks I’m a human, so it’s true that he’s probably not a villager.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why would you live here, of all places? Especially when there’s a village nearby.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: A... A village, nearby?!?! Really!?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: No way... Ever since I was washed up to the west shore from a storm..

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I’ve been living here because there are wolves outside this cave...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: 50 years!! I lived in this cave for 50 years!! And there’s a village nearby?!?!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: 50 years!!! I wasted 50 years of my life!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......... Maybe I shouldn’t have told him.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Sob....... What's the point now... I’m all old and I don’t have much time left to live anyway...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oy, do you want to learn martial art, by any chance? I will regret it if I die like this. It will lighten up my heart if I had a student to teach.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........Martial Art? But I’m not good at moving my body....

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ha ha ha.... Too bad... I guess I will just have to wait for death...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sorry.... But I’m really not that interested in martial arts.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Come back anytime if you change your mind. I won’t regret my life if I could leave a successor after me.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ohh..... I see that you have come back! Did you come to receive my training?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Now, come forward.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeek...!? Old man, you’re not wearing any clothes!?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: No clothing can last for 50 years, you know. And that’s not important. Hurry up and sit down!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm... Err....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What should I do after I sit down?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I am going to blow my chakra into you now... While I do this, keep in mind these things.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: This chakra will enhance your reflexes. Which is the foundation of the skill that I’m about to teach you.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: With quicker reflexes, you will be able to do consecutive attacks. If you get on a good groove, you will be able to give more damage to the enemy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ohh..... My body feels so much lighter!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Does that mean I’m going to be able to swing my wand multiple time at once? That will save me a lot of MP!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, it’s not that simple. But for now, you will be able to give one extra blow each time you attack.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Like I said, you have to get on a groove, so you will swing once for the first strike, and on the second time you will be able to swing twice.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You still have a long way to go, so twice is the best you can do for now.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: It won't work if you rush it. ‘Cause your body is not ready to take it yet.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... Then, when am I going to get strong enough to attack enemy all I want? I’m being chased, so I don't have a lot of time to get stronger!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Come back when your Strength is higher than 30. I will teach you the next step then.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I was a bit anxious at first, but this is real. Thanks!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, I guess I didn’t waste 50 years of my life in vain. I thought you might not be able to handle my chakra because you’re a little girl...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh... I’m not an ordinary human, so...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Every time you attack, the number of swings get increased one by one. But twice is the best you can do for now.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Let's start the next step once you train yourself and get your Strength up to 30. You won’t be able to take in my chakra unless you come back with a strong body.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oh, I see that you have trained yourself enough.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: But I need to take some rest before I can give you more of my chakra. Will you come back a little later?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You won’t be able to take in my chakra unless you come back with a strong body. Come back after you raise your Strength up to 30.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oh, I see that you have trained enough! Come, sit.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This feels... weird..... I never knew there was energy like this other than magic power...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, you’re doing a better job than I thought!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Now you will be able to consecutively strike up to 3 times.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You were using recoil energy up to the second blow,

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: but the third blow gets energy from the inertia and torque from the 2nd blow. It's more effective than the 2nd blow, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thanks! I... I’m going to become a good student!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho ho, that's a great attitude!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: For your next training, increase your HP to 130. You must have enough HP to supplement your strength for consecutive attacks.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Come back after you increase your HP to 130. You must have enough HP for consecutive attacks.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oh, I see that you have trained yourself enough. But I still need some rest. Come back a little later.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You must have enough HP to supplement your strength for consecutive attacks. Come back after you increase your HP to 130.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I see you have increased your HP! Brilliant!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: The third consecutive attack was using torque and inertia...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: The fourth attack is creating a greater centrifugal force using that torque.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Bigger and stronger rotation will leave a deep would to the enemy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I will be able to beat any warrior now!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Uh-huh! Don’t overestimate your powers just yet. There is much more to learn!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... Okay, Master.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you again!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: For the next lesson, increase your Agility to 40. Your body is probably lighter than before from the chakra I gave you up to now...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: But you need Agility to get to the next level.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I see! I’ll come back after I train some more!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ha ha! I will count on you!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Come back when you have raised your Agility to 40. You have to be quick to do these consecutive attacks.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I see that you have trained your Agility. But I still need some rest. I used too much chakra on you, and I barely have any energy left. Come back later.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I gave you some chakra, but it's not enough. You have to have some Agility to make the consecutive attacks work. Come back when you have raised your Agility to 40.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You came prepared!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: The 5th blow isn't very strong, but you need this move for the 6th blow.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: It’s easy to stumble after the 4th blow because of the torque....

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: But it's a weakness you don't want your enemy to see. That's why you quickly make this little move and strike for the 5th time.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: If the attack is successful, not only do you get to keep your guard up, but you can also give some damage to the enemy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa... I see. It was a bit tricky to balance myself after the 4th strike.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, so you have been feeling it yourself, too! That's my girl!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you again!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: To learn the next move, come back after raising HP to 500.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh... That much?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: The final move is striking straight down with all your power.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You distract the enemy with the 5th blow, and on the 6th you gotta hit ’em hard.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You’re going to attack with your full power, and that's why HP is essential to this.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: It's also the last skill that I can teach you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Last...? That's a bit sad to hear...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, it's too soon to be sad. Keep training until the final lesson!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! Master!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Come back after raising HP to 500. It’s the final strike, so you are going to need a lot of HP.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oh, are you already ready for the lesson? It's great that you're prepared so soon, but I need some rest too.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: You are going to need a lot of HP for this final blow. Come back after raising HP to 500.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Focus, this is the last and the final lesson.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm..... But are you going to be okay if you gave all your chakra to me?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Well, I will probably die.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I told you. I wanted to have a successor before I die.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: This is my moment of dream come true, so don't be so sad.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m done. This was enough. I can beat any warriors now.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Are you refusing to take the lesson? No! Please allow this old man to get his last wish fulfilled!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I was very happy that I had a student after 50 years...! If you refuse to take this lesson, I will no longer consider you my student!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........Please! I know it's your wish, but what about me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How am I supposed to watch you die, just because I drained all your energy from you!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......I’m sorry that I yelled. But I just can't watch you die because of me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......eh? Are you crying because I refused to take the lesson?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: .........Ho ho, maybe I wasn't wasting my time after all.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: 50 years ago I was a fisherman. I was living alone on a remote island, because my parents passed away a long time ago.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: But living alone was too boring. So at a young age, I made a raft and just headed towards the inland.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: But a storm hit me, and I drifted to the west shore... So I started living in this cave.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......... But you were so close to the village... I’m sorry you didn’t find out about the village until too late...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: No. I knew about the village.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I could spot people climbing this mountain every now and then.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: So I tried going down into the village. But no one welcomed me looking like this.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: And I came back into this cave. Because I had no house, no money, and no friends....

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: But 50 years later, I finally met someone...

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Someone who cares and doesn't want me to die...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So don't die. Think about that person who doesn’t want you to die.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What are you doing!?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I have been sending you the chakra little by little while we were talking. Ho ho.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Don't worry! I’m not going to die!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Kekeke, I wanted to see how you'd react. I was just messing with you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........What! Don’t make that kind of joke!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: It’s been a long time since I talked to someone for this lone. In fact.... I think it’s the first time. Heh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (......It's not like I’ve done much for him, yet he looks so happy. He must have been really lonely...)

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I’m going to keep training, so come back if you want. Who knows? I might even be able to teach you something more later!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Okay. And promise me. Don't ever say that you're dying!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, alright. I will live a long life!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: There is nothing that I can teach you any more. Come back to see me if you want.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: The fact that you're here to see me makes me less lonely. Ho ho.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Keep training yourself! My student!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Where did the master go...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh? There are letters on the rock....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you. My child.nn-I have never felt so much passion in the nn-past 50 years of training inside this cave.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Now that I have a wonderful successor... nn-I am planning to go back to my hometown nn-and spend the rest of my life there.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m leaving a present for you. nn-This is a sword made out of Magnestone, which took me 10 years to carve out. nn-The name is Burning Heart!

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: I named it after the passions that I had in my heart while I was teaching you. nn-Please take a good care of it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... He went back to his hometown...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But on the brighter side, he finally got out of this dark cave!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I hope he spends the rest of his life happily.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He was really fighting all by himself... I have to be of help to him!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I have been waiting for you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How have you been? How is the spell? Are you okay?

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Ha, I found out about the Pope's weakness. The spell means nothing to me anymore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Really!? You're amazing, Lord Aramute!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Now then...

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Let's go defeat the Pope, shall we? Luna. I need your help.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Of course! I will lend you my strength as much as I can!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Haha... I’m glad to see you so full of energy.

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: We’re now going to sneak into the Pope's castle. I can talk my way through the guards, so just be sure you follow me well.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, oh! I know the way into the castle through the sewage system! We can get directly into the village waterways from behind the small waterfall at my hideout!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Oh... Is that how that works?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You probably knew it, too. I used to play with Robin there a lot!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Hm... I don't think I remember.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll take the lead! I think it would be the best to not face any warriors at all.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Following this waterway will lead us to the chapel warehouse!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I see... It is going to be safer than encountering warriors.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh... I’m being helpful, right?

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Yes. Very helpful.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I feel some really bad energy...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ... What are these...??

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: These are the Pope's toys. Pope is creating an army using the Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Dark Magic Stone.....! Don’t tell me.... He's turning the palace warriors into Dark Warriors!?

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Yes. He’s very dangerous... If we leave him like this, he may end up ruling the entire Vavelian Continent.

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: So before he gets enough power to do that...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Here! This is the shortcut that I always used when visiting your office...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pope...... First he killed the gods and took the springs, and now this....!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I’m going to do it before he does.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes.... what? Do what before he does? What do you mean?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... Ugghhh.... L... Lord Aramute!

Item.name: who
Item.talkText: There’s no use calling for a dead person.

Item.name: who
Item.talkText: Thank you for coming to the laboratory.. I doubted I could actually get you come here on your own, yet you did.

Item.name: who
Item.talkText: Now, I will be taking the power of your moonstone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You.........!! Who are you....!?!

Item.name: who
Item.talkText: Ha ha ha, stupid witch. You felt Aramute's energy from me, then you should have noticed by now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t tell me.... Are you.... Lord Aramute's secretary..... Jude!!?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Bwahahaha!! How could you not tell that I’m a half-blooded deity, just like you? I did receive a bit of Aramute’s energy back in the days, but you never even doubted!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ughhh.............. Did you... What did you do to Lord Aramute...!?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Humans can't do anything to the gods on their own.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Dumb Aramute might have trusted me too much.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: B.... But how come you can.... Even if you received magic power from Lord Aramute... How....?!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: The pure-blooded deities are lazy... It was their mistake to think that their given magic power will last forever.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I have been raising the magic power I received from Aramute for several hundreds of years. It took me a long time... But I finally managed to become superior to Aramute.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... How could you... Lord Aramute was so nice to you! Why did you...!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Yeah, he was nice to me. But it was the kind of niceness that you treat your dog with, you know?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: And besides, I’ve been loyal to him for several hundreds of years. Don’t you think I deserve to become a temple lord too, at some point?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: But that’s not what Aramute thought.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about you?! You’ve teamed up with the Pope and creating Dark Warriors for him!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Ha, these humans? They simply were my tools.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about those warriors...? They were probably loyal to you! And you’re talking about becoming a temple lord?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: And the strongest one becomes the justice.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Aramute was the strongest in the past, so he was the justice.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: But not anymore. Which makes me the justice now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ............This is exactly why Lord Aramute didn't make you a temple lord....!!! He knew about your dirty desires!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: It doesn't matter anymore. Because I can do what I want now.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I’m on my own, so I’m with the Pope for the time being...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: But the power from your moonstone is going to be enough for me to become Pope's obstacle.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: He’s relying on me because he can't fully control the springs yet, you know.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Soon... I’m going to take care of the Pope and show people how perfectly I can control the springs with the power of this moonstone. Then it's going to be my dream come true.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: My dream of becoming a temple lord.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Actually, no. Who gives a crap about temple lords anymore? I’ll become a God. Ha ha ha!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh.... Lord Aramute.....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: That took longer than I expected. I guess her moonstone contained more magic power than what I imagined.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: It’s a good thing that I got her into this laboratory. It would have been a pain to take her power without these devices.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Now onto my next plan...

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Oh... So this is where it leads to, eh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This smell.... this place looks familiar....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s the prayer room in the temple basement...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Seems like they turned it into a prison...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But what should I do now... I can always recharge the magic power for the moonstone, but now that I’m caught in here...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: You’re awake now, eh?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Hey, don’t be so upset. Show me some smile, sweetheart. Hee hee.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: We’ll be seeing a lot of each other now. Why don’t you smile for me, huh?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Whoa, enough with that scary face.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: There’s a drain under the bed. So if you ever want to pee, you know the drill.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Oh, by the way. Your little magic won't work as long as the anti-magic device right there.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: So don’t be wasting your magic power, cause it’s for us.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeeek! That looks gross...!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: I heard that there's a monster in the sewer that eats dead prisoners’ bodies... I guess that's him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Prisoners? Did we have prisons in this temple?

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Pope turned the prayer rooms into a prison. I heard he feeds the dead prisoners to that thing.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh...... Do that many prisoners die...? To the point where they need a monster like that...

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Pope is also conducting medical experiments on people. It's mostly the warriors that are sacrificed...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Th... That's terrible....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So they’re using the prayer rooms’ water supply system as drains...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This way... was the laboratory. I might get caught if I go here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The anti-magic field is weaker down here... If I go towards the entrance, I could even warp home!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I might get noticed out in the village... So I should just warp home from here!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Robin!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Long time no see. Luna.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... I’m never going to forgive you! You're the worst!!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Your torture will start in a bit. Your magic power will get drained, so try to stay focused.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Are we ready?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: We don't know this witch's maximum magic power, so we should start from the minimum drain.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Huh? Why not start with medium drain?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: This witch has a fragile body. If we started from medium drain, it might shock her to death.... which we don’t want.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I see.... You probably know about this witch the best. Alright. I’ll let you take care of the draining.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, let’s see who this brave warrior is. Now you’re even torturing me, huh??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ve told you multiple times.... that all I ever wanted was to become a warrior. Remember?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You said it so many times and now I’m sick of it...!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: sigh... You're right.

Item.motherEventName: 혼자 있는 로빈과 이벤트 후 집에서 혼자말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Now that I think about it, I lost Lord Aramute again... What should I do?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Ugh... Robin...!! What do you think you're doing?!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was hoping I could take care of you under better circumstances...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Ugh... Do you think you're going to get away with this??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was a rookie warrior without any power.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But one day I.... I overheard another warrior telling you about how Luna and I met.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Of course, Luna wouldn’t know anything about that and she was going to get caught when she came back to Vavelie Road.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Grrr... You were the eager one!! What are you doing now!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was acting, so I could get a chance to get Luna out.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And that’s why I was licking your boots up until now.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: .....Cunning bastard.... So you're saying you were acting as my sidekick... just to get to this witch?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Will you be able to finish me, though?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I must admit that you're a pretty smart guy, but I know you’ve never killed anyone.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: If this is your first time, it ain't gonna be that easy. Hee hee!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You sacrificed a lot of people to be where you are now.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Even when you became the 2nd Commander.... You turned a lot of warriors into Dark Warriors, using promotion as the lure.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: You little... You were prying on me behind my back?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Thanks. Thank you for reminding me. I now have the courage to finish you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And to protect Luna...!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Ack...! Ughh....... I knew it... You failed to cut me deep enough...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I don't care about your filthy life. All I care about is Luna’s safety.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: See? I kept my promise.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Eh.... Ouch! S.... Stop! It hurts! It really hurts!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well that's my intention!!!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You jerk!!!! Jerk!!!!!!!

Item.name: bPoint_3
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ...Is it over now?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is it over?!?! Are you kidding me??!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... Because... because of you....!!! I... Do...!!! You!!! Have!!!! Any idea!!!!! How!!! Much!!!! I had to!!!! Go through!?!?!!?!!! HUH???!?!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Not because of the warriors...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Warriors?! They’re nothing! I could fight them any time!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... You.........!! You..............!! Do you have any idea how much it hurt when you betrayed me?!!?!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: S.. Sorry....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It was beyond my power at the time... This was the only way I could think of.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't care!! I’m going to beat you up!!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m really sorry....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m never going to hurt you, ever again. I promise!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Now let's get out of here. You remember the sewer, right? Let's go back to the hideout in Kentz.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to beat you up with my wand when we get out of here! You better be prepared!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Okay. You can beat me up all you want, so let's just get out of here!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Oh, before that we need to get Michelle!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Michelle's here, too!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I heard everything from Michelle. She did a terrible thing to you...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But she’s been really regretting it. You know her, she’s never sorry for anything. But... She cried in front of me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......Hm, in that case.. let me go look at the traitor's face!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Michelle's in the last cell!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Lu... Luna!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well well, how did cooperating with the warriors go?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Wahhhh!!! They drained away my magic power every day, it was a nightmare!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Those filthy warriors tried to touch me, too!!!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I... It’s been really really terrible...!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Michelle, we’re going to get you out, so don't cry! You’re too loud!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't. Let’s just leave her here.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: What? Luna. We don't have the time... We need to get out first.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She..... didn't even apologize to me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You had a hard time?! Seriously, that’s the first thing out of your mouth?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you know how many times I almost got killed?! Because of you!!!!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Calm down... Let's be reasonable....!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't care! You don't know half the things I had to go through because of....

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Oh? How did you escape?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: J... Jude!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: N... No way.... It's the 1st Commander....!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: I see, you must be the impostor.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Duck! Robin!!!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Seems like you got your last magic power drained from the torture chamber, eh?

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Your moonstone probably doesn't have any magic power left in it either...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Errr... What is going on!?

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Just a few moments in that device, and you won’t be able to control your magic.

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: That's exactly how Aramute died.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh..... This feels terrible.... What is this!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you always got beaten up by other kids!! What kind of a warrior is that!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was trying to get back at the kids who were harassing you...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should have just left you to get beaten up even more! No! I should have beat you up with them!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Robin, you really know your way around this witch! Kekeke!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ugh.. Luna...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Now then... We just have the spring in the Aramute Temple left, right?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: (Mom... I’m going to make sure to bring you back to life!)

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You worked hard. I can’t believe you revived almost all the springs including Lord Durok’s spring.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Are you sure mom will come back to life if I revived all the springs?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Yes. For sure.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I don’t know, but the springs have revived, which means.... the Lords are not completely dead.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Because the springs can only be alive with the temple lords’ magic power.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: ......!! Master! Behind!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ugh... A surprise attack...?!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Haha... Even a strong witch can’t stand a chance if it’s a surprise attack!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Black Joe!?.... Booo... Warrior! How dare you!!!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Eeek!? It was a perfect blow... How is she still okay...?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: We handled it, Commander Crown!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: I can’t believe the springs reacted to this girl's magic power...

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: She’s still pretty young and clumsy.... but she seems pretty useful.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Hm, this witch... She's pretty cute, eh? Her angry face..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What is it! Why are you getting so close!?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Tan skin and cute face... Even her attitude. Spicy! I like it.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Get your filthy face away from me!!! Get lost!!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Hey, stay still!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I hate to do this now... But you sir, just crossed the line.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna. Remember I promised?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That I’m going to become a super cool warrior when I grow up....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: and protect you this time.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: This girl’s resisting really hard, eh??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That's it.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: What is this place.... Did I get caught?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Seems like you're up now.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I’m Michelle. I’ve been witch-hunted, so I’m in the same boat with you.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ah....! I’ve heard of you. You’re the girl that betrayed Luna, right?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Eeek.... That bigmouth...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: sigh..... I wonder if Luna's doing alright...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: It's weird that you should worry about her. Didn't you sell her out in the first place?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: But that was because I was really scared....

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I can't tell you how much I've regretted it ever since.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I should have just jumped off the cliff with Luna...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: In here, I get my magic power drained every day... It feels like they are draining away my life, too.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I... I guess this is the punishment.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: They drained your magic power?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: The Pope is studying the deities’ power. He needs the magic power to control the springs or something.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: That’s why they’re not killing me. But I’m just their lab rat.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Heh, you know they will never be able to completely open up the powers of the springs even if they test with us.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Because the springs can only be alive with the power of the temple lords!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Humans are never going to know how to use the springs unless the lords of those springs allow it.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Huh? Aren't the springs a kind of a huge warehouse for storing magic power, and the lords would just take the magic power from there when they needed?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Isn't that why the humans started the war so they can have the springs? To use the power themselves?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: That’s what they thought, but that wasn't the case~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard told me when I revived his spring!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Pfft, why are you talking like you’ve met Lord Aimhard in person? And you? Revived his spring?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I know you just woke up.... But you must still be dreaming.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Getting caught up in unrealistic dreams will let you down. Just try to get some sleep. They’re going to drain your magic power soon.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: No! I’m going to get out.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m going to beat the crap out of the Pope...! And revive the spring to bring my mom back!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Crown!? How come you're here...?

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: I’m the best warrior in the palace. I can be wherever I want.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yay~~ it opened! I hated it in here~ Prisons are too damp and smelly!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Huh? What happened?? I can’t see!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: What is it?? Who let you out!? Robin??

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Crown! You set Michelle free too, right?

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: No. That half-blooded deity can not be trusted.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But... She’s in the prison. She’s probably not the half-blooded deity that started the war!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: That witch is the one who sold her friend out. That's why I can’t trust her.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh.... You knew about that?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Why are you just chatting over there? Get me out! It's almost the time for experiment!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: The guards are sparsely placed in most places. There might be a small fuss, but you should still be able to escape this castle.

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: But you should know that there’s the chapel upstairs. The Pope is doing his despicable ceremony in front of the spring.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: The Pope is upstairs!?

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: The Pope is almost there with the spring's power.

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: If he really gets full access of the spring's power...

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: It's up to you.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Then it's a good thing that I got caught!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m finally here... Mom... Wait for me!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Get me out too...! I hate it here!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m going to bust the Pope in a bit, so wait for me!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Sob.... Could you just not do whatever you're trying to do? I have a feeling that the tortures are going to get worse if you get into trouble...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Lu... Luna!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......Eh?? What are you doing here??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t tell me....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You're also with the Pope!?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh.... No! They caught me and brought me here, but I just escaped!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m on my way to get the Pope! He's upstairs doing the ceremony now!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know you're pretty strong.... But do you think you can do it by yourself?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yeah. I know I can. I received blessings from four of the temples!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Dummy. What blessing are you talking ab....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait.. Lord Arua.... Lord Aimhard... Lord Elysion... And even Lord Durok!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can really feel all the temple lords’ energy except for Lord Aramute's....!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... You were really going around reviving the springs!?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I kept telling you it’s true...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you!?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m what I am. Just a witch~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: .........Actually, I’m not going to call myself a witch anymore.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m the daughter of my mother, who is a god. I’m Lucia, daughter of Elysion!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: She looks like a handful. Shoo! Go away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Who's that kid? I’ve never seen her before..

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: This is Elysion’s daughter. I was taking a walk with her.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Wow~~! You’re Lord Elysion’s daughter, huh? No wonder you look so graceful!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah...... That little kid??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But how come do you look like you’re my age? Is it because you’re a full-blooded deity?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna! I’ll defeat that Pope quickly and come to rescue you!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: See you later!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Now that Pieberry is out, the warriors will be distracted.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She has the Lords’ blessings, so I probably don't have to worry about her too much...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let me go to different places through the sewer!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: ...! I’m going to go upstairs and fight the Pope!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: The humans will take ownership of the springs,

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: and they will slaughter the deities they have been keeping in the prison for experiments.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (But what about Jude...)

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: How did you get out!? And how did you get to the secret lab...!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: .........I don’t know how you got out, but this is great.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Meet..... Robin.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: This is a huge success... A Dark Warrior who understands human language...!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Hahaha!! Huge reward awaits!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin...! What happened to you!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin... Don’t worry! I... I’ll find a way to turn you back!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: There’s no use. Once you become a Dark Warrior, there is no way to go back.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: N.... No!! That’s a lie!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Well. Now let’s test the performance, shall we?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Heh.... heh.... He is now a Dark Warrior...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait for me, Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to... destroy the Pope who did this to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I’ll come back.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You know I keep my promises.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to destroy the Pope, right now!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There are humans who came here to pray... I’ll be causing a scene if I go down there.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should look for the Pope first!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: This is the punishment for turning your sword against me. Kekeke!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: An unclean demon barging in during the ceremony... I shall not forgive you before this divine spring!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m not a demon...! And I’m not a witch....... I’m a deity!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Kekeke... Deity?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: That old name is gone. No one uses that name to call you anymore. What's left are evil demons that needs to be punished!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna...?! You escaped!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So that’s the famous Pope?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yeah! That's the guy who started the war!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What you did to Robin’s life... can never be forgiven!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: He needed discipline, so I gave him one. Is there a problem?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Shut up!!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Ha ha... What on earth is the Lead Guard doing! How could there be demons wandering around this sacred temple... Two of them!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Oh, that young man who revolted against his superior

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Guhh.... I have most of the spring's power...... But why??

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I have the springs’ power, too.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I have been reviving the springs until now. And they gave me their blessings.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: What are you talking about... I never received any report about any of the springs being revived......??

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Well, that doesn't matter for me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Now is the time to end it all.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry! Let me finish off the Pope.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: sigh..... But have you ever killed a human before? I’m a bit nervous..

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Grrrrrrr!!!! Filthy demons.... Joking around with my divine life!?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Did you think this was over!? Not yet!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: See...? That’s what happens if we don't finish him off completely...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to do it for Robin!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna... Can we just let the temple lords take care of this when they come back?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Ugh... I’m sorry, Pope. I lost conscience...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: D..... Dark Warriors in the divine temple...!?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Don't be alarmed.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: They are the warriors that will cover up for your incompetence.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Ugh... Pope.......

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You're finally exposing who you really are.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: What's all the noise coming from the chapel...?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: You even summoned Dark Warriors.........!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Pope! I will protect you...!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: No! These Dark Warriors were summoned by the Pope!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Do you really think you can fool me with a lie like that!?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ugh... Captain.....

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: P... Pope...... summoned..... the Dark.... Warriors..... B... Be careful.....sir.....

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Wh... What do you mean?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: sigh... I guess there's no way around it. Get him.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: You’ve always insisted on going on the right path. You are a great leader for the warriors.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: But you lack flexibility.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: You are young and you have great skills, but Berto beat you and became the 2nd Commander. Wanna know why?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: That’s ‘cause you're too square.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: I’m sorry to lose such a talented warrior like you... But now that you’ve seen all these, I need you to be dead.

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: How come the Dark Warriors were defeated by this kind of low level magic....?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Hey, Blondie! I saved your life again, you know?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’ve become very strong. These things don't scare me anymore!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: What the...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Heh heh!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Ughhh..... more..... I need more dark magic power.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This icky energy got even stronger...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Can a human being endure this much magic power??

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Isn’t this a bit dangerous...?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Kehehe... heheh....

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Unleashing all of my dark magic power...... I am.... I am the chosen man..... I can even use the power of the spring......

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: I can do it!!!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Gahhhhhhhhh!!!!! What's happening!?!?!!?

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: I can't control this...!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Guhh....!! Spring!!! This is my request for this month!!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: Purify me!!! Now!!!! Now!!!!

Item.name: pope
Item.talkText: G... Good...... Now!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Along with the Dark Warriors... The Pope.... disappeared.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That's how dirty the Pope was. He could only be purified by being destroyed..!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Did everyone witness this?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m sure everyone did!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: I hereby punish that evil witch who murdered the Pope.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You used us to kill the Pope for you? But why Pope...?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: There seems to be a misunderstanding. These witches are...!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Justice, looks like you were possessed by these witches... I suggest you take a rest for a while.

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: I will do it myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry! Be careful... This won't be an easy fight!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I don't know what’s going on... but okay!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The blessing, again...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Alright! I finally got the magic power of all the springs~!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Ugh.. This doesn't make sense... When did these kids become so strong??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph! There's no way I’m going to let you get your way!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Why did you suddenly attack...? You’re a deity, just like me!

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: Ha ha... A deity, like you?

Item.name: crown
Item.talkText: A pure-blooded deity can never understand a half-blood!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What... We're not done yet!?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Ooh... I see.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Master. That guy is the culprit of all this.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Jude.... He used to be Lord Aramute's secretary.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He killed Lord Aramute!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: sigh..... But be careful. He... is turning into his true self.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: What's that going to be like?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Like that.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh..... The amount or magic power...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Whew... Just how much Dark Magic Stones did he consume? This magic power is.... gooey and dirty.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why did he fly away without fighting?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Because he's soon going to get waaaaaay bigger.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The temple... Is it going to collapse?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Seems like he didn't want to destroy the spring...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Master!! It’s dangerous, so we have to find the control crystal inside Lord Aramute's office!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Control Crystal?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You just need to put all the magic power inside the control crystal! Then the temple lords will come back to life!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... Robin!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to take Robin out of here! I promised him that I'll come back!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I beat the Pope, too. Now all we have to do is... to get out of here...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The entrance...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I gotta get to the sewer with Robin on my back......!!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Are you referring to your bare body?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I gotta change clothes before that... I can't get used to pants...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: What you’re wearing now is the dress of the Ice Witch. It should be somewhat warm.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I still prefer this outfit better!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (It is a bit chilly, though...)

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: - CHAPTER 2: A Hurt Witch -

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: - CHAPTER 1: Luna Sets Out -

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Awesome! Now I'll be able to make some Rualet!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There’s a still a chance I could get caught by warriors, so I should just quickly warp home.

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
luna
Item.talkText: ....I’m going to Lord Elysion’s temple.

Item.motherEventName: 집에서 로빈 때문에 운 뒤 루나 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to find out about whatever secret that's behind the temple's springs...

Item.motherEventName: 집에서 로빈 때문에 운 뒤 루나 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I will seek revenge on the humans who hurt me.
