Item.motherEventName: 집에서 로빈 때문에 운 뒤 루나 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: - Chapter 3 Ice Witch -

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s a lie......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Right.. I’ve had so much stress recently, so I’m just having a nightmare...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Seems like she's really out of her mind.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Bring her back to reality.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll do it myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... Ouch....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Did you finally wake up from your dream?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ugh... ugghhh....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna. Come with me, and we won’t hurt you anymore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Especially that time when you struck me with your sword!! How could you do something like that!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: A... about that, I’m really sorry!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But I used the back of my sword to hit you... It shouldn’t have hurt that much......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You broke my heart! Dummy!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I only did that because if any other warriors did it, they might hurt you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And to fool Berto....!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He said there's the power of the moon... and the power of someone that will protect me, in here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't know why, but I felt like changing back into this outfit.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: - CHAPTER 5: Luna’s Friends -

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I was abandoned in the woods, when I was born.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: So I didn't know what loneliness was. Because I was always alone...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: That's why I kept bothering you.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: At least...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Someday, I want to be able to understand your feelings.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........ You talk too much...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry
luna
Item.talkText: I should get going now, too...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah, before that...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: She would heal warriors and ask for gold there, too.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Even gods have a thing for women, eh?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Let's save Michelle first. Michelle's in the innermost cell...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's here!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: You’ve been living here all this time?

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: This is surprisingly close to the village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I came here immediately after the war because I had nowhere elso to go.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (......Ah... I didn't even want to think about their names...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No one knows about this place except for me, Robin, and Michelle~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know humans don't usually come up the mountain because there are wolves.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Side of the mountain should be alright... right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I would have to go all the way to the side of Kentz Mt. to get ingredients to craft Flame magic...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I was being a bit too careful until now...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s put the magic circle in the slot~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I put it in the Secondary Slot to save some MP...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should move it to the Primary Slot when I want it to be more powerful, or to the Sub-Slot to save even more MP.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m still a bit scared of those warriors... But they're only human, so I should be able to protect myself with a flame magic like this.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: No... No more...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can get to the island where Arua Temple is, through the Kentz Cave and the West Shore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll get to Lord Arua's temple even if I had to build a raft to get to the island!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, tell me more about the warrior in the golden armor.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ah! You mean Crown? He's a pure-blood deity who's disguised as a palace warrior!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But why are you so curious about Crown?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Crown? and... disguise?)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A pure-blooded deity??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Lord Aramute, disguised as a warrior...? Then, Crown is probably a fake name..!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (If the disguise is to avoid drawing the humans’ attention....!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did that golden armored warrior ever tell you where he was going?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: We didn't get to talk that much. Except for how much he's looking forward to bring back the age of the gods again.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And he told me he's also going around the temples to revive the springs, too...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: So probably other temples...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Lord Durok's spring...! Lord Durok's spring is the only spring that didn't get revived!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! Thanks for that!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eeeh...? You’re leaving already??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Lord Durok's spring and Lord Arua’s spring are the only springs that I’m not sure were revived yet...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I gotta check both!)

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 대화 후 다시 찾아온 아루아샘
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I knew it... It has revived.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 대화 후 다시 찾아온 아루아샘
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The warrior who is waiting for the age of the gods to come back.... And I’m certain I could feel Lord Aramute's magic power from him...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 대화 후 다시 찾아온 아루아샘
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That must be Lord Aramute disguised as a warrior!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 차 한잔 후 집에 와서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I must hurry to Lord Durok's temple. I might miss Lord Aramute again like the last time...!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 차 한잔 후 집에 와서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should hurry up and go take a look at Arua Temple and Durok Temple.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 차 한잔 후 집에 와서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can't miss Lord Aramute again!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리와 대화 후 다시 찾아온 아루아샘
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should hurry up and go to Durok Temple! I hope I can meet Lord Aramute there...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph... I’m coming only because I’m awake now! Since you woke me up, the vanilla flower is mine!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m going to be a warrior one day... This is nothing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ca.... Care who!? No!

Item.motherEventName: 듀락 신전에서 초반에 용사들에게 접근하지 않기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (It’s the warriors... Seems like there are more inside.)

Item.motherEventName: 듀락 신전에서 초반에 용사들에게 접근하지 않기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I don’t know what they’re doing in the temple, but I should get out of here..)

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: It’s you, the deity from Vavelia Village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s been a really really long time since I last saw you...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You surprise me every time... ‘cause you’re so big!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: What brings you to Lord Durok’s temple?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I still don’t get it. How did the humans manage to get them....?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You know, right? They’re so strong and mighty! And those humans who can’t even use magic...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Speaking of which....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Where were you at the time of the war!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: One Dragon Breath and we could wipe out the whole village! How did the humans barge in to Lord Durok’s temple with you here?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: At the time of the war, I was on the Western Continent. It was Lord Durok’s command.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: When I came back... The humans have already done what they have done.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Grr... When you were gone... of all time!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then you should have destroyed them when you came back and found out! You just sat here and watched!?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Correct. I only watched.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: That too, was the commands of my master.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: He told me to never touch a human until he tells me to.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: And his body has perished after that.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t you get angry? Are you really just going to sit here and do nothing!?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: He told me to wait for his command. And that is what I will do.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......sigh..... You’re... really stuck up.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s nice that you’re loyal and everything...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but Lord Durok is DEAD! He’s not going to give you any more commands!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: You do not know of the existence and the will of the Lords...

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: You only see and hear what you want to hear.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Very much like a human.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Faith is when you believe in things that are invisible.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: If you only believe in what you can see, it is nothing more than facing the reality.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: You say you believed in them?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Maybe you should not think too highly of yourself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I believed and followed them! Very much!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If I were you.... Only if I had the power like you....! I would have revenged!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m nothing like those humans!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s an awful thing to say!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Grr, darn this hill... These armors are so heavy!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: What can we do... We have to do what boss tells us to do.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: But isn’t this too dangerous?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Wouldn’t breaking through the sealed door make the walls crumble down...?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: I don’t know. Let’s just get this over with and go back. We’re not going to get through anyways..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They’re breaking through the temple entrance?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The temple sealing system must have been activated during the war.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why are the humans interested in the spring... when they probably can’t use magic?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s check out Lord Durok’s temple first, since it’s the closest.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s been a long time since I was there last... Lord Durok’s temple should be up the eastern side of rocky hill.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I hope I don’t meet any warriors....!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....Anyway, I should go see Lord Arua’s spring.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s close to the village, to there are warriors at Durok Temple...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s been a long time...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well.. I’ve been hiding out inside the cave for so long. Anywhere I go, it’s going to be like this.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I remember making a raft with Robin and playing on it. The raft broke and we got drifted away...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: to south... right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And Lord Arua’s island was right there, so he saved us.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But how am I going to go there...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! That thing... That’s the one that broke our raft!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I can put a mind control spell on it and ride it to the island!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Royal Palace Coast Guard...!

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: What the... What is that? Looks like a witch, right?

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Ehh...?! A witch?? Should we run away?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Idiot... Even a witch can’t stand a cannonball.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Then should we catch her?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: There's going to be nothing left of her if we shoot a cannonball at her...

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: And besides, I don't think she would attack this ship.

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: We don't care, so just leave her. I don't wanna waste fire on her.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pirates...! Because Lord Arua isn't here anymore, now the pirates appear this close to the land...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I might really get shot if I kept going this way.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The stairs were collapsed. I better find another entrance.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And you sounded like you had so much fun!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you... Do you like me or something?

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: No way!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I just want to become a cool warrior who roots for the weak!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... I don't need any of that. I’m much stronger than them.

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you’re too weak! How do you plan to root for the weak people like that?

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Those who are lonely are also weak.

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That’s why I’m rooting for you.

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph... I don’t need it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gasp...! Isn’t that a golem!?

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: There is nothing to worry about. I made this golem.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Besides, it won’t even move.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh.... I was surprised.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: When the bandits came into the village, we couldn’t fire the cannon in the middle of the village.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: We were only thinking about the power, and we weren’t prepared for that.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: So I made this guy... But we don’t have an energy source for it, so it’s not yet activated.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: It would be nice if we had a stone with a lot of magic power in it. Tsk.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Something like the Dark Magic Stone?

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Oh, we can’t be touching that thing. We’d have to process it to attach it to the golem.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I see...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: We need a stone with a lot of magic power for that.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: If only Guardian could move, it’s going to be a life saver...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Whoa! That stone... It’s very beautiful!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Try touching it. It’s the Dark Magic Stone, purified.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: D... Dark Magic Stone?!?! Get it away from me! We dwarves have weaker body than the humans, our body will rot away if we touched it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I said I purified it. It’s fine.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: It’s sparkly... and doesn’t look too dangerous...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Hmm..... Let me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What!?? What happened?! Is it still dangerous even after it’s purified?!

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: It’s really okay!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... You surprised me..

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Hee hee hee! I’m going to use this right away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Didn’t you say you have to process it first?

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: We, dwarves, are the best when it comes to workmanship! It’s only going to take a few seconds.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Kkiryaraho ho ho Lala La La La!!!!

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: It moves!! It moves!!! Wahhhhhh!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are you that happy?

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Of course. This had to do with my pride as an engineer...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: But it’s also for our species that’s constantly threatened because of how small we are.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: The outside humans call us unsociable and closed...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: But we’ve been living as slaves for years, just because we’re good at crafting. Actually, no... Worse than slave. We were treated like machines...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: We escaped from them and built a village....

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: But we didn’t have anything to protect ourselves with. There is hardly any resources here under the cliff...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: The only thing we have is our skills. So with that skill, we had to build weapons and make sure we protect our village well.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So that’s why you started attacking me the moment you saw me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I understand. I know what it's like to live in fear of warriors...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: Heh, I’ll give this to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........Huh? Isn't this important for you? You finally got it to move...

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: We dwarves can be close-minded, but we care for our friends. Nothing is more valuable than a friend.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: You made my dream come true, so this is nothing. Besides, I can create another one by splitting the stone you gave me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If that's the case... I’ll gladly take it!

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: It makes me happy to see you accept it.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: I really appreciate it. I will never forget about this!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa... This golem seems pretty strong.

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: This is really hard to take out!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Baby brother, keep pulling!

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: W... What if those dwarves find us and shoot cannons at us again!!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Idiot. Do you think they are ever going to destroy this cave?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Do you know the reason why we were safe that last time when we stole the Angel's Eye?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: We’re going to be safe as long as we're inside the village. Because if they try to shoot us, the whole village would be blown away.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: All we have to do is get away from the cannon range after we steal.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: But this isn’t budging... How did the dwarves get this?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You guys again?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Looks like you’re trying to steal the crystal without the dwarves’ permission... but I suggest you just leave.

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Boss...!! Let's run away!! We got beaten up pretty bad the last time, too!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Yeah... Let’s run....!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you doing? Aren't you going to run away?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: We fight.

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: (Are you crazy!? It’s just three of us today! Don’t you remember she beat us the last time when we had more people?!)

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: (Idiot. The exit is over there.)

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: (Don't make a fuss and make all of us look bad! We’re going to look ridiculous!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can hear you....

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Ugh... That was the only piece of crystal we could get, and she took it...!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Everyone, get up!

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Eek.. Boss... Are you going to fight again?

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: Boss, you're so brave... I’m touched.

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Sheesh, I was going to stay down...

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: But I can't do that when our baby brother got up.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow, you guys weren't as pathetic as I thought.

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Well then...!!

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: B... Boss?

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Idiots! It's going to be dwarves’ mining hours soon!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Hurry and get out!!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: ......Welp. That was embarrassing.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But yeah.. That's exactly what they would do.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: What? They tried to steal the crystal this time?

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: But we’re glad you were able to send them away.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: As a token of gratitude, I’ll give you some crystal that we mined.

Item.name: dwarf_sci
Item.talkText: But it's difficult to mine even for us, so we can't give you a lot. Sometimes you can find pieces that fell out inside the cave, but it doesn't happen very often.

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: In the name of justice, I’ll punish you!

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: How's that? Don't you feel better!?

Item.motherEventName: 아지트 앞에서 로빈과 마찰 후 다시 아지트에서 혼잣말
Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Just wait and see!

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You told me you'd be on my side...

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: pieberry

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna
luna
Item.talkText: A..... A gigantic monster...!!! That's the ice spirit?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It... It moves!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How ridiculously strong...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It got back on its feet!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What do I do... I don't even have any magic power left...

Item.name: whoVoice
Item.talkText: Stop. Aeris.

Item.name: whoVoice
Item.talkText: She is alright.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s gone...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: It’s been a long time since I had a visitor here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A deity...??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The magic power all over this cave... It was yours.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you doing here?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Erm.... Sealing myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yourself? Why?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Have you ever heard of the story about a village in the Icy Fields?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... Yes. The merchants built a village to extract frozen dark magic stone,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but the villagers got addicted to the magic power of the stones that they mined out, and the whole village turned into a hot mess.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The Ice Witch who was ruling the village at the time also....

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Yes. I am the deity who was ruling over that village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Which means you're... a real witch!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You confiscated the stones from humans but you, too, got addicted and ended up turning into a monster!!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: ..... I didn’t turn into anything!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Even though I might have been a little carried away...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Same difference.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: No! There were just too many stones for my body to handle!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: It didn't take me long to wake up!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: .............Even though the village was already a disaster when I realized it...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You wouldn't have woke up if it was not for the temple lords... I heard about it.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Booo... Aramute.... You didn’t have to blabber all about it... It’s embarrassing...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard it from Master Kum.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Master Kum...? You mean Panda Kum?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Yes. That’s why I sealed myself in this ice cave to have some time of self-reflection.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I don't know how long it has been, but I kept myself sealed ever since.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: And I’m really regretting what I've done.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait, didn't you just unseal yourself, though? You said you were going to restraint yourself...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Aramute told me I won’t last long.... I guess he was right again. I was planning to be in there for at least 100 years... Pfft.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I imagined you to be more evil, being the Ice Witch and everything... But I find you surprisingly relatable.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Aramute.... How in the world did you raise her...?! An evil witch?? Really? That's what you told her?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........Huh? Did you know about me? How did you know Lord Aramute raised me...?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: No... H..how would I know? I just know Aramute!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute did keep me for a while when I was a baby. Until my adoptive mother took me in...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: What? He got you adopted so soon??

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Booooo.... That's not what he told me! He said he'd take a good care... But he got you adopted instead...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute was really good to me. He just thought I’d need a mother's love, and that's why he sent me to my adoptive mother.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And my mom was really good to me, too~ What’s wrong with adoption?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: ......... Have you ever wondered about your biological mother?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I never thought about it like that, since my mom took such good care of me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But now that you mention it, I guess I’m curious. Why?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: .........Oh, right... I almost forgot I was going to get back in there and keep myself sealed again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait! Hold on!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: ........ Don't stop me. I need to get back in.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, I wasn't going to stop you...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why do you want to spend so much time for self-restraint?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute did say you didn't have to, and that everyone makes mistakes every now and then.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I know that’s what he said.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But I can't forgive myself yet.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I wanted the people in my village.... to be happy.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: ....That's why I supported them studying the Dark Magic Stone, even though Aramute warned me.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: The half-blooded deities have limitations to how much magic power we can have, compared to the pure-blooded deities...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: And the humans can't have the power of a deity. And that's why I could really feel how much they wanted to become stronger.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But the result was... You know what happened in the end.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: And what's more is...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I almost killed my beloved daughter because of it........

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: That's why I can't forgive myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not sure if I’m entitled to say this, but...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If you try to carry all your burdens and your sins on your own,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: you're dragging yourself into an unending loop of guilt.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you'll never get out of it.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But see, if you let someone else forgive you...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then you let someone else take care of your guilt for you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If you choose to refuse that forgiveness, then you’re just being stubborn.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why don't you stop trapping yourself in that guilt?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Even Lord Aramute said it’s okay.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But there is no one left that can forgive me.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: What you just said just means that I can never be forgiven.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. You're wrong.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Because I forgave you.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: You... You knew.....? How.....?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn't know that the Ice Witch was my mother. But...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This moonstone that Lord Aramute gave me... This was yours, wasn't it?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute told me that... this moonstone holds the will of someone and that it will protect me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I realized then. That it must be mom.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute didn't tell me about you in detail, but he gave me hints so I could recognize you someday.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And your energy....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ve had this moonstone on me for my whole life. It wouldn't make sense if I didn’t recognize it.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Aramute.... That was nosy....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It was written all over your face. Giving me the “you are my daughter”-kind of look...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How can I pretend like I don't know, when you’re looking at me with the saddest eyes I've ever seen in my life?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: .... I was afraid I was never going to be forgiven.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: By the villagers who I killed....

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: And you, too...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I know this is shameless of me, but can I ask you to...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Forgive me...?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I... actually... wanted to be forgiven more than anything...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Mom.... you, too... have been hiding your feelings...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know, because... heh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I do that all the time, too. So I can tell how you felt, mom.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I wanted forgiveness more than anything...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But there's no one left to forgive me...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I even thought about killing myself, but...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I didn't have the courage to leave you behind.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then.... Are you coming out of the Ice Cave now?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: No. I think I should stay a little longer.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... Why? We just talked about it!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Oh, it's not that.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I promise. I’ll come out and see you when I’m ready....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh... I know. There are times when I need some time for myself, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But promise me to come meet me as soon as you can! I can't wait too long!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I promise you will be the first person I meet when I get out of here!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I love you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......this is what you wanted to say, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's okay to be honest with yourself. You don't have to feel sorry to say that you love me.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I don’t think I have the courage yet. I guess I’ll have to learn how to stop being sorry.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But one day, when I finally decide to get out of here...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I will learn to have more courage.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I promise I’ll see you again. Luna...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (“Be more honest” is what I always heard other people tell me...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I didn’t think I would be saying this to my own mother.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll wait. Mom.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I hope you come out soon!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Let's just say I said it first.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Luna and Ludina talked to each other for a long time.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I just.... Need some time to get myself ready.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ah! Luna, one more thing! I have a present for you!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: is the symbol you can use to summon Black Joe. I’ll lend him to you~!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Eek.. Am I your slave or something?! You can’t just hand me over like that!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You are my slave. What are you talking about.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Hey, can't you watch over my dear friend for me?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m doing this because of how trustworthy you are.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: .......Whoa. Did you just acknowledge me?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Of course! Watch over Luna just like how you’ve done it for me!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: If that's the case... I’ll try to make time for you from time to time.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I was in the middle of eating!!!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Why did you have to bother me...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Thanks! I was getting scolded by Pieberry!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I was resting!!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: All right, I’ll protect you.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Come on! Come at me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Golden Nuuk.....!? It’s the legendary bird!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you doing?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: How have you been?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Look at you, all greased up and lookin’ good... Phew!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Ark...? What are you doing here?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I’m just volunteering to help this deity out.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Looks more like a slave to me. Kekeke!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: What? Slave? I volunteered! Volunteer!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I just felt bad for her ‘cause she gets chased around a lot by the warriors!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Pfft. Look how stupid you are.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Reminds me of that time when you challenged Elysion.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Eek! Eeek! Don't even talk about that!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m curious. Tell me.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: It’s none of your business!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Long time ago, Elysion came here to find a secretary for herself.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: And this idiot came up and said, “What makes you think that we’re going to serve you!?”

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: This guy was the strongest among all of us, so he wasn't afraid of anything.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: But Elysion cast a magic on him and turned him into an ugly bird! Giggle!!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: He went nuts!! Oh, you should have seen how funny that looked.... Kekeke!! Hehehehe!! Oh my stomach...!!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: This idiot eventually became Elysion's secretary in return for getting the ugly bird magic off.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: And he was about to attack Elysion...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: But why are you still looking like that?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Lord Elysion passed away in the war that the humans caused.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: What??? That scary woman died in the hands of humans??

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: She ordered me to get her daughter out of there...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: so I didn’t see how she died.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: But she’s not completely gone.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Her daughter is going around and reviving the springs right now. She might come back to life soon.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Ooh... So that’s how it is.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Well, it could be another prank by the temple lords.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: I don't know how it will go, but it's interesting.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hey, so just in case... If my master gets into a dangerous situation later... You guys should help her out.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: By master... Do you mean this deity right here?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: No! This is just a poor deity that I volunteered to help!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, Pieberry lent you to me as a slave...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: My master right now is Lady Lucia. Daughter of Lord Elysion. The one that I helped escape at the time of the war...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You have another master? Other than Pieberry?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: None of your business.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, someone's cranky. Is he sulking because I teamed up with Nuuk?

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: There is no reason for us to get involved with the deities’ business.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Whatever it is, it's not going to be small if the deities are involved.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: I don’t think it's reasonable for us to sacrifice ourselves for something like that.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: My gut is telling me there’s something coming up...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hey... We’ve known each other for several hundreds of years.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Well, you were away from us for several hundreds of years, too.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: And besides, our population has dramatically decreased over the past couple of years.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Mutated Nuuk... probably from another continent has been attacking us.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Looks like humans created mutation by using Dark Magic Stone on a Nuuk’s dead body.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: You didn't even know there was a war. How did you know it was the humans?

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Because is has armors around its body.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: I think we’re being targeted as an experiment.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Gosh, humans are really annoying...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Should I get rid of those mutations for you?

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Kekeke...! What a spunky little deity!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: You can dream all you want, but that thing... we couldn’t beat it even with all of us together.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Unless Ark is in his original form, there’s no chance... Not to mention what he looks like right now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But will you help later if I get rid of it for you?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hmm.... I don’t think there is a reason for you to help us out. Why would you bother?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going to fight those humans face to face one day.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s going to be nice get some experience with their weapon ahead of time.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Oh. That’s going to help Master, too.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Nuuk! Where is that mutant?

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: ... Are you a pure-blooded deity?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No, I’m mixed.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Haha! So you want me to rely on only half of a deity?

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Not a chance! I’m not going to tell you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I am strong! I can do it!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Then prove it to me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Fine...! I’ll show you!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I didn’t know half-blooded deities could be so strong... And she looks so young, too...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: She grew up pretty tough. She had to become strong to survive.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: I hate to admit it, but I can see hope.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Actually, the mutant doesn’t stay at one place...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: It actually appears here often, so you’ll see it if you wait here.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: I don’t think it’s going to appear anytime soon, considering how quiet it is around here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Okay. I’ll come here often!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: The mutant appears here pretty often. It will probably come here again soon.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Krrrr... How dare you...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s coming!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff........

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Grrr... The humans became more skillful than the time of the war...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: How can they control such a monster?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Fortunately, there’s just one for now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Usually a big monster like that would really stand out, but this is the first time I’ve ever seen it.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: The Pope has been probably hiding it, because he wouldn’t want to let people know that they are using Dark Magic Stones.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why did they create this? They already have the springs!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Maybe they’re going after something more than that...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hey... Wake up, already!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........ I think it's too late...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know it must be sad... but I think you’ll only leave scars on his face.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why don’t we just bury him?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: What the are you talking about. Can’t you see I’m waking him up?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hey, that mutant is dead. You can wake up now.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: .....phoo.... phooooo....

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: He fell asleep while pretending to be dead.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: What do you mean? He’s alive.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: We’re pretty strong. We may be birds, but we have the life energy of a dragon!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sigh..... What on earth...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Heh. Still...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I guess they owe us now.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Let them sleep. They do nap a lot.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can’t believe this is that Nuuk from the legends...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I should wake this guy up.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: We are grateful for what you’ve done. I look forward to your future.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Oh, and I forgot to give this to you the last time...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow... It’s a pretty flower!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll keep it well!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Keep it? You’re supposed to eat it. It’s for increasing your magic power!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But it was a present...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Whatever. I don’t care what you do with it. But it’s very rare, so be careful what you do with it.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Ark used to be the strongest of us all.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: But now he’s just an ugly bird... Hee hee!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: And fat, too!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Royal Palace Coast Guard...!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Eh? Isn’t that a girl?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ma’am, I think... I think that’s a witch!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: What should we do?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: A witch? That’s a witch?

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Looks like she’s going to run away! I’ll shoot!!

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Whaaaaa?!!? It’s a sea monster!!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Th... That looks nasty!!

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Shoot! We must protect the Princess!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: It’s not even budging! R... Run....!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That looks dangerous...

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: No... We’re doomed!! We can’t aim the cannon because it’s too close to the ship!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Eeeek.. At least shoot the witch!!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Idiots! Don’t shoot!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: The witch saved us.....

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Should I... still shoot?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ........Should we?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! Come on! I just saved your lives!!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Eeeek.... How dare you! Who do you think you’re yelling at?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh? What are you!?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ...!? You don’t know Sofia, the princess of Vavelia??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......You’re the princess of Vavelia?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then what are you doing there?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Our princess gets into a lot of troubles... So the King exiled her to an island, but she got bored and got on this ship.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hey! Don’t tell her everything like that! It’s embarrassing!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Eek.. Sorry, Ma’am!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: If you’re sorry... You should be punished, right?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Yes. Ma’am!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ugh! Ugh! I should have took the armor off first!!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Pull him up if he passes out.

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Yes. Ma’am!!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hmm... But what should we do about the witch?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m going home.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hey! Where do you think you’re going!?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: How dare you show your back towards me!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Didn’t you just see me defeating that monster? You’ll get hurt if you cross me.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: R... Rude!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re the rude one.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hey! Come up here!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: (Eeek.. Princess Sofia got ignored for the first time in her life....)

Item.name: warrior-3
Item.talkText: (What if she gets upset and tells us to kill her?)

Item.name: warrior-4
Item.talkText: (N.... No! She can even defeat a sea monster... We might really die if we tried!!)

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I’ll give you some cookies. Come here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh? Food from the Palace!?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: We have some meat, too. You can come if you want.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: (Can we let that witch go near the princess...? Wouldn’t we get in trouble for this?)

Item.name: warrior-3
Item.talkText: (We’ll get in trouble later if they find out, but the princess will get us in trouble now if we don’t let her...)

Item.name: warrior-3
Item.talkText: (I say we let her do whatever she wants if we’re getting in trouble anyway.)

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: (Oh... Kind of like what happened to that guy down there?)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoaaaaaa... What is all this?!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Sorry. I know it’s not much. But that’s because I’m on an exile, so I hope you understand.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But still, try the cookies! They’re the best!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This kind of food... I’ve never tried food like this...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hey! Don’t be picky! Even I have to eat this!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: But you always complained about food... Pfft.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Yes. Ma’am!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Seems like the warriors really care about you.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Care about me? What? Of course they have to listen to what I tell them.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But what’s wrong with you?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You ignore me, you turned your back when I was talking, and you don’t talk to me politely.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m a witch. I have no reason to suck up to you.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I assumed you would be hungry so I gave you food... but maybe I should have tried another strategy. Do you want gold?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll gladly take it if you give me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s pretty generous..

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: So you’ll obey me now?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why? This was for saving your life earlier.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hey! Bring her more gold!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Ma’am, sorry... But we don’t have that much gold as we’re on exile...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Eeeek.... Then what do you want? Just tell me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop the witch hunt. Then I'll think about it.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why? Is that too difficult?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....Hmph. I’m leaving. What am I even doing here.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: That’s actually why I’m on exile right now.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I liked the deities.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: And so does my Father.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then why did you start the war?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: In fact, Pope is the true authority figure and not my Father.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: The Pope started the war, and people just listen to what he says...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But everybody blames Father... for what the Pope has done.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: The tax raises... Speaking of which, most of the tax money goes to the Pope.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I’ve been against what the Pope has been doing.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: The war, the ridiculous taxes, even the biological experiments.... I really wanted to stop all the dirty things that’s happening.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But I have no power... That’s why I was sent into exile like this.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......Sorry. I think I misunderstood you.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I don't have enough power to stop the witch hunt yet.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But I'll root for you. And...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: If the age of the deities ever come back... You will have my full support to rebuild what has been destroyed.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh. Just wait and see.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ....In fact, to see you defeating that sea monster gave me a little hope.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: The gods always helped with what my Father couldn’t do.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Or buy some Kreytes leaves and craft one. You're a witch, so you should be able to do that.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Can't you craft some Kreytes leaves together and make one?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: It's been a long time since I saw a Klarates leaf.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Reward is 6,500G. Not bad, huh?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Reward is 6,500G. It's not bad, huh?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Here is the promised reward.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: To think that I just helped Pope... It's really weird.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Hee hee! But you can get stronger with the gold I just paid you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh... I guess...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Next is the egg sac from an electric fish called Blitz. Blitz can be found on the West Shore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh.... For power source, eh?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Correct. It has high energy efficiency, but we've been over-hunting them for a while so now it's banned.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: And since we don't have anyone in charge of sea-borne trade... I thought it would be nice to ask you.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Do you swim?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... I can't believe I have to go all the way into the ocean...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Just take it easy~ I’ll pay you 3,000G. Blitz isn’t that strong, after all.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me Blitz's egg sac. You should be able to find Blitz on the West Shore.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Whoa... It stings! Looks pretty fresh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you going to do with just one, though? Don't you need more to do something with this?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You think so, too? I agree.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: This egg sac used to be bought in large quantities to be used as power source for machinery...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Or in small quantities for deities’ magic research.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But the Temple Lords are no longer here.. Who could be needing these?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I don’t know. And honestly, I don’t care. All I care about is the money.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: And in fact, we probably shouldn’t care.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: This time, our client ordered a Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What?? Humans can't use that stone, right?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Something's fishy, eh? That's why I didn’t ask anything.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: ‘Cause knowing too much won't do any good.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Anyways, get me the Dark Magic Stone. This is, by all means, something only you can do. Especially since any human that touches that stone will go mad.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... I’m not sure if this is a good choice...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I know you're still up for it. Hee hee. I’m paying you 5,000G. Go have at it!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I know this request can be a bit tricky. But it is also something that only a witch can do.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You should be able to get a Dark Magic Stone from a Dark Warrior.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I could have our hunters go after one, but the risk is too high. Which is why I’m asking you.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You can probably find a Dark Warrior near either Elysion or Aimhard temple. There should be a couple of them that broke out of the prison when the temple collapsed.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I knew it! Ha ha ha!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, where's the gold?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ugh... Hey! You can't hand it directly to me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You asked me to bring it to you...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get it away from me! Just put it down there!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh.... sorry. I forgot you humans can’t touch this.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Will you be able to carry this, though? Seeing from how afraid you are....

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: No worries, we have specialized people who are going to be in charge of that.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: But I’m not going to be as hasty the next time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What do you want next?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Frozen Dark Magic Stone. One of the most expensive items....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I know. Dark Magic Stone that can even be consumed by humans because the energy isn't as strong.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: We should be able to carry that with bare hands.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Since there’s no one left in the Icy Field village to mind these anymore... The Pope will be pleased if I brought it to him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... The more I do this, the more I don’t know who I’m doing this for.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Heh heh! I know you’re gonna do this.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn't make up my mind yet....

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me the Frozen Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: There used to be a whole village built in the Icy Field just to mine this stone.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: It's a miracle stone for humans who can't consume the Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Bwahaha!! This chilly air! And the dark smoke flowing out of it!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: ......This is the first time I’m seeing this stone this up close... Are you sure I can touch this?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There's dark magic flowing out of it, but it should be fine since it's not that strong.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Whoaa....... I can really touch it!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I even feel kind of stronger...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You won’t be selling it if you keep holding it like that. It's safer compared to the Dark Magic Stone, but it's still pretty dangerous.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Don’t you worry, doll.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: This stone overtakes the souls of those who desire power,

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: but I desire money more than anything. Screw power and all that!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I gotta sell this and make money out of it. So this stone will never get me. Hee hee.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If you say so... You should be fine, since it seems like your obsession for money is stronger than anything else.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ha, which is why we're going big for the next task!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You're scaring me.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You know about Nessie, the sea monster? Bring me its 4 of its luminous eyes.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gasp...! Nessie, all of a sudden?!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: He he he! Right? The reward is 15,000G.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait a second. I’ve heard of Nessie's eyes. Isn't that used for crafting royal costumes?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: 15,000G!? It probably costs at least 20,000G! How could you trick me like this?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: So what?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booooo.... What if I said I’m not going to get it for you?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Do whatever you want. Try selling it to other merchants.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pfft. I guess there's no way around it...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Deal. Giggle.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Bring me Nessie's Luminous Four-Eyes. There's got to be 4, no less. The price will drop if you miss one.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Seems like you’re going to be doing some hunting down at West Shore. Hee hee!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder how much he's making out of this deal...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Probably a lot, considering how happy he looks...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... How shameless.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Hey, there’s no other merchant out there who’s going to be willing to trade with a witch. Just loosen up a bit, won't you? This is how we roll.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....Fine. After all, I can’t buy anything from anyone else either.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Defeat Kentz. Get me Kentz Stone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What’s the next task?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That gigantic golem??

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You even killed Nessie, so why not try?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I know Nessie is a bit less stronger than Kentz, but it would have been difficult to fight something that’s in the ocean.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: But Kentz is on land, so that’s going to make things easier. Right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s easy to say for you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Was this another order from the Pope’s castle?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: No. This one's just for our collection.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Someone had the idea to make a healing chair from this stone,

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: but we had to give up because we don’t have the Kentz Stone.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Someone’s going to bring it up again later. I’ll probably sell it then.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whatever... I feel like I’m being ripped off again. But I’ll try anyways!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Did you get the Kentz Stone?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Come back alive. Hee hee!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: This time, the reward is 17000G. Not bad, huh?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Oh? You really came back in one piece!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I almost died! I’m never doing this again!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: The reward for our next deal is 20,000G.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......What is it?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You’ve gotten used to dealing with us. It’s great!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why are you waiting for?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Hmm. This one kind of worries me.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get me the Big Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Source tells me that you can get it from the Dark Golem inside the Red Rocky Golem Cave on the Elysion Plains.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa... Did you just worry about me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How sweet of you. But I’m going to be fine. I’m super strong now!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: What are you talking about.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I’m just saying I’m afraid of the guys who placed this order.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Why on earth would they need that kind of stone?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: As if just the Dark Magic Stone wasn’t dangerous enough.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah. That sounds really fishy for me, too.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Well.. It’s still business, so...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Can you get it for me? It’s an expensive deal, so I can’t bear to give it up.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm... Okay.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Tsk. I’m doing this just for the money, but it still makes me uncomfortable.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Anyways, be careful.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Yet another success!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... This thing was too huge, it was too heavy to bring it here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What’s wrong?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... It’s just the power of this stone... Is too strong...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I think I was holding this for too long.....

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ugh.. Our hideout... Robbed like this... It’s embarrassing...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn’t know the stone would be that strong. Even I couldn’t stand it.....

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: This time it was our mistake. We had the wrong customer.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Because of 100,000G.... Ugh..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So that’s how much you were making out of these items...? Hmph! Well, good for you!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: It’s not a matter of the gold. Even you had a hard time with that stone, but someone was able to take it somehow.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........ I’ve never seen any human stronger than a deity.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Or it could be a very strong deity.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Well, we’ll consider this a lesson learned.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .......Do you want your gold back? You got robbed...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: What are you talking about. Your job was to bring us that stone and you’ve done it.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I’m not going to get back the gold that I paid you for your work. A deal is a deal.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... Still...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: We’ve been making more money off of you than what you think. It’s fine.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Now, let’s get straight into business,

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Bring the head of the Ice Giant.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: What’s wrong?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ve met the Ice Giant before... at the most depressing moment of my life.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I just remembered that time, and it upsets me.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: We’ll have 22,000G waiting for you. Again, come back safely!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You said you have a bad memory with the Ice Giant? Smash it!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I’ll cheer for you. Hee hee.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Did you smash that ice monster?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I crashed it.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Great job!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Now~ Lets get down to business.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ready to hear this?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh, say it!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Bring me the Egg of Zirconia Dragon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are you telling me to kill a dragon now?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are you trying to kill me?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You’ve been doing a great job so far.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: 30,000 Gold? Deal?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... Urr... Urmmmm.... Hmmm..... Uhm....

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Good luck!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: The Egg of Zirconia Dragon is the top-notch, high-end food ingredient. The people at the palace absolutely love it.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: That’s why we used to go steal the eggs, but Zirconia figured it out and now he attacks from behind the mountain.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: If you get into trouble, just run away.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: That is, if you can... Hee hee. I hear he never lets go of any egg-stealer alive.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: WHOA~~~! You really brought it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Boo... Booo... Boooooo...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Give me the gold!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh...??? 20,000G?? This isn’t what you promised me!!

Item.name: blackMerchant2
Item.talkText: Oh, sorry. We just had this huge deal, but we spent too much money so we don’t have a lot of money left in our safe.

Item.name: blackMerchant2
Item.talkText: I promise I’ll pay you double in our next deal.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! Don’t do this to me! You really think I’m going to believe that?? I brought you all the commissioned items every time, risking my life....!!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Come on, I’ll really pay you well the next time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There is not going to be another time!

Item.name: blackMerchant2
Item.talkText: I’ll pay you 50,000... (whisper)

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: If you don’t want the money, then fine.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: But if you ever happen to find the Lightning Dragon’s Horn, bring it here.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I promise I’ll pay you really well!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Really I’m going to pay you double! Believe me this time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Screw you... Hmph!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Lightening Dragon’s Horn!!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I’ve never actually seen it... But this dazzling electricity! I'm sure this is the Horn of Lightning!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I knew this would happen.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Please understand. We’re having a hard time these days.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well then, just quit.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Giggle, I’ll take care of myself. Now give me the horn.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not going to.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Take it from me if you can. But remember, I can kill a dragon.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ugh.. So you’ve grown up...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Fine. I’m going to start treating you as an adult.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ha, are you kidding me?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Wh... Why!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re going to sell it for at least 200,000G, aren’t you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, show me your respect.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ugh... This cheeky little...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: sigh... Alright.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey, mister? I know this can be sold at whatever price that’s demanded.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Give me 30,000 more gold~

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Eek! We’re really broke! This is everything we have!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I could look for more money myself, if I wanted to. Let’s see, what do you think could be behind that wooden wall~?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Seems like I raised a dragon cub and got bitten...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey, I’m stronger than a dragon!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Also, I’m not going to deal with you guys anymore.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: W... Wait! You made a lot of money with us, didn’t you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah. And now that I have so much gold, I think I’m going to take some rest from all your commissions.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Ugh... I made a mistake. She wasn’t that stupid, after all...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Hey, come back any time, if you change your mind.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: We’re always going to have requests for you!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Weaklings.... Have you forgotten about all the trainings?

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: I remember. Boss.

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: We've been training. And we’ve become stronger.

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: To rob better! To go through the warriors when we meet them! And...

Item.name: thief1
Item.talkText: To defeat that witch who have disgraced us!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: Baby brother, I’m touched.

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: I’m embarrassed now.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Ha. That’s the spirit!

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: After the training... There’s one more thing that we have achieved other than strength.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Courage! Keep that in mind and nothing is going to be impossible.

Item.name: thief3
Item.talkText: Let’s go!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are they stronger.......? I can’t tell!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I gotta find Robin now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: While Pieberry is buying me some time, I gotta hurry up and find Robin!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... No matter how much stronger you’ve become....! You can’t fight all five of the temple lords!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You’re right. It would have been difficult for me to fight them all.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: That’s why I used the humans.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Just as I thought, the temple lords didn’t attack the humans. Even when they were being cut by their swords...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Without any resistance... That’s how they died...?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Because those pure-blooded deities always had to be the center of this world...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: How ignorant!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Listen carefully.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: A tool is used for the owner, and is thrown away when it’s not needed anymore. This is how everything works.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Am I wrong?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I think I saw her going this way...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: .....Did I miss her?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whatcha doin’?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Ugh..!!! You got me!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: White Witch... I must admit that you’re good.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I have no regret, so just finish me without pain.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you talking about.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Huh? It’s not the White Witch!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm.... Warrior??

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I am a warrior!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You evil witch who enjoys making fun of people!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re surprisingly weak, and you don’t even have that much gold on you...!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I... I don’t want your pity!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So... pathetic!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He passed out. How sad that he’s so weak...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: How crafty of her to hide in a cave...!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Of course she would hide in the darkness!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Found you!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Today is my lucky day. To find two witches in a row!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It looks like you were beaten up pretty bad... are you okay?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Ha.. Maybe, maybe not!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: It was a magnificent battle. It’s just that my sword broke, so we’re going to continue our fight some other time...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I see.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you doing, just standing there? Go.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Eh? You’re not attacking me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were the one that attacked me the last time, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why should I attack you in the first place?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Because you’re a witch! And I’m a warrior!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Are you pitying me!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t be upset. Pfft, pity? I just don’t want to fight you.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: No.... It is pity. You called me weak the other day! You’re sympathizing because I’m weak!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then get stronger if you don’t like it. You get beaten up all the time but you’re talking about witch hunt?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Fine. I’ll came back after I’ve become stronger!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: White Witch and the Black Witch! You are now added to my to-hunt-list!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Prepare to suffer!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did I just encourage him?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Man, do I want to cheer for him.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Witch! Stop right there!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What was that just now...?

Item.name: whoVoice
Item.talkText: Somebody help me!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's you again.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: What? What are you doing here?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I came because I heard you cry for help.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Urrrm.... Maybe someone needs help.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I would save you if you asked. You don’t have to bluff.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Does it look like I’m trapped here or something?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Don’t take me wrong, it’s not that I was chasing after the White Witch and then saw the monster inside and got scared so I came back but now that I’m here again the magma is scary so I’m trapped here.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Ha. I failed to find the White Witch... but I can still fight you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A... Are you really going to jump? Stop! Your legs are too short to....

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: M... My ankle!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m not afraid!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: W... Well...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t talk to me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I used too much freezing magic at once... to vaporize the magma...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Urmm.... Uhm.....

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m sorry.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Unbelievable. I just used up all my magic power to save a warrior...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........I’m hungry...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Y... You can... have this...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow... That smells really nice...!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: My mom made it for me. She wanted to cheer me because I told her I’m a warrior...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... are you going to continue being a warrior?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Even my mom is rooting for me. I have to become a cool warrior and make her proud!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Cool warrior, huh?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You probably spent your life getting chased after the warriors, so you might not understand.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But being a warrior is everything to me.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: They always ignore me and make fun of me in the village... But once I’m a warrior with an achievement, everyone looks up to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you want to be recognized that badly?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: It’s for my mother. I am going to make her happy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What does your mom do?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: She farms, cooks breakfast, lunch, and dinner for me, and then she weaves fabric for extra money, and then she goes to the forest and picks lalaque berries....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Just help your mom. That’s a better way to make her happy.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: N... No! Not after I’ve come so far!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: After you’ve come so far? Where exactly did you get so far?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Aren’t you a little too caught up in your own dreams?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And honestly, you’re too naive to be a cool warrior.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: To be a successful warrior, you would have to know how to sell out your friends, and how to step over other people for your own success.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I don’t want to be that kind of person!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s why...

Item.name: luna
