Item.talkText: You shouldn’t try too hard to fit in to what other people tell you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do what you really want to do.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ha, it’s been a really long time since I talked to a human for this long.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah. I don’t think you’re that kind of person.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Even just now, you could have just stabbed me when I was resting.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But instead you gave me a cookie, didn’t you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Honestly... Do you really think being a warrior suits you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (He wanted to become a cool warrior, too...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I have some power now, so I’ll get you up!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Hutcha ~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That guy... I could see his eyes shaking.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if I’ll ever see him again if he quits being a warrior...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (...He was a funny guy. Too bad..)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Pieberry and I. Will we be able to defeat Jude?)

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: We finally meet again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... How come you’re here!?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: ...I’ve been following you guys.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But you didn’t come out for a while after going into the Pope’s castle, so I came in.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Even though I couldn’t get in any further... because there is a monster.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Were you still following us?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sorry, but now is not a good time for this. Later...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: In fact...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: To see you guys working towards a goal...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I was very impressed.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I envied you.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You are strong...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: And besides, I liked the deities.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Same goes with my mother... And the people in my village, too, like deities.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: We weren’t this hungry when the gods were taking care of us.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But after they were gone, life became harsh.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: We should have blamed the country...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But they have so much power and blaming them wouldn’t do anything for us.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: And that’s why...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: We turned our anger towards you deities.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Why did you leave us.......?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Looking just wanted to take it out on somebody.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: We were never recognized in our lives,

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: and now the cruel world...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s okay. Everything is going to be over soon.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I know. You’re going to kill the Pope soon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How did you...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I told you I was following you around. I heard everything.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Please succeed.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You told me to not compromise myself to be someone I’m not.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Yes. I changed my dream.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: My dream is... To work at the farm with my mother.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Just like the old times when the gods were in power.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: So please...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Come back safe and sound.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I don’t know if it will help you... But I brought you some things.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... Now that I think about it, Pieberry asked me to catch a golem together...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s probably this golem cave.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I can sort of sense her energy around here...)

Item.name: whoVoice
Item.talkText: Excuse me......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you call me?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I have... a favor to ask you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Weird... Humans are usually afraid of me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you have a favor to ask me?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Actually... another deity girl helped me once, too.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: She got rid of some wild dogs for us.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I wonder who that was...)

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: And they stopped appearing for a while...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: But those wild dogs came back with a bigger wild dog this time!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I don’t have much that I can give you... but could you please get rid of the wild dogs for us?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You look like a villager from Lalaque village...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m busy. Can’t warriors take care of that for you?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The warriors don’t care about us. All they care about is the witch hunt...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Because getting rid of the wild dogs won’t get them a promotion.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Same goes for me, too. What if I run into a warrior... while getting rid of those dogs for you?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Ah....! I’m sorry!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The other deity girl would walk around the Lalaque forest, so I thought it would be okay!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I’m so sorry for asking you like this...! I’ll go now...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I'll help.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: R... Really?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s inside the Lalaque forest?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Yes! There’s the big wild dog near the lalaque tree!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Thank you, so so much! Now we can eat berries again!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You mean the lalaque berries? Did you want it that bad?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: All the other fruits and crops are sent to the Pope’s castle as tax...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: So we can’t eat anything other than lalaque berries...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard lalaque berries ripe once a day and rots after one day.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess that’s why the Pope isn’t collecting those.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Okay! I’ll get rid of the wild dogs for you!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Then....! I’ll keep the warriors away from the Lalaque tree as much as possible!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Thank you again...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That Pope... He was even harassing small villages like this.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess I could meet Pieberry after this.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: You came!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Where are the wild dogs?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Right there, down south!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I told the warriors that I saw a witch in the northeastern part of the forest... so they won’t appear nearby!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: And the warriors went northeast, so they shouldn’t appear for a while.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The wild dogs are in the south.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Thank you!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I didn’t get to eat anything since yesterday because of the wild dogs...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s why you came out of the forest to look for help?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I’m sorry for how the villagers behaved before.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The Pope really brainwashed everyone by telling them how dangerous witches are...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: They used to like the deities before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Being rude is fine... It’s still better than the warriors.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Then.... I’ll go and tell the people that the wild dogs were taken care of!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Thank you so much!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re welcome!

Item.motherEventName: 검은 마녀의 숲 처음 들어왔을 때
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Is this her house? I wonder if she’s home...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black In the beginning, there were gods.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black They granted miracles to humans,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black and humans worshiped them wholeheartedly.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: However, man’s admiration towards the deities nn-soon evolve into a desire for their power.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black “Desire.”

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black Humans started war to seize the spring,nn-the source of deities’ power, from them.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black A new religion was founded.nn-And humans started making miracles on their own, using the spring.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: #black Just as the deities did.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black Furthermore,nn-they declare the surviving deities to be “demons”,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #black hence, starting a witch hunt.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Approximately 10 years from the Spring War...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....Pervert Panda!?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Uhm....? What do you mean by pervert?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .............Grr. I don't want to talk about it.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Oh, are you referring to that incident where I saw you uncovered?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t!!! Say!!! It!!!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: As I’ve said before, there is nothing to be ashamed of. You do not need to restraint yourself.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Anyway, how do you find the Icy Field? Are you finding yourself comfortable?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....Well... It’s okay. Only thing is I have to go far out to find food...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: And there are monsters. It’s not an easy place to survive in.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah. That’s why I’m training every day.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Plus, I want to get my revenge against those humans...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: That is not good.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Two wrongs don't make a right.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s so cliché...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Hmm. But you are not someone who would do that.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: No. You won’t do that.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you talking about? How would you know?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Have you ever had someone tell you that you’re too self-conscious? Or that you tend to beat around the bushes too much?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I can read you mind. I am the spirit of this Icy Field. I can tell your thoughts easily.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re bluffing... You’re just a random panda that can talk.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm? Wait, an animal that can talk....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Were you someone’s guardian animal? I’ve never seen you...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Yes. I used to be the guardian animal of the Ice Witch.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... That’s what people called the half-blooded deity who used to rule the Icy Fields.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Anyway, I can train you if you wish to become stronger.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: This encounter, too, must have some meaning to it. One thing for sure is that it will increase your chance of survival.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm..... I don’t know if I can count on you.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Ho ho...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A... Amazing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This power... It’s similar to my moonstone’s Magic Power!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I have devoted myself to training for a long time.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I could fight a dragon, if I wanted to.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (He’s not bluffing...)

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Would you like to challenge me? You will become significantly stronger if you defeat me.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Of course, I will go easy on you.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Come! Rookie!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff......

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Oh... That was better than my expectation.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were great, too.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Ho ho... That’s it for today.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I won’t go as easy the next time. Come back when you are prepared.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Let’s see how much you’ve improved.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Heh. You’ve become stronger. Alright!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I thought I hit you hard... How come you’re okay?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: That’s because you still have room to improve.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Hit me harder the next time!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Come at me with all you’ve got!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I won!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Whoa.... That blow wasn’t so bad.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: A little more and you could even fight the Ice Giant.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Good. I’ll become stronger!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh.. You’re stronger than before...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: That also means you’ve become stronger. I had to put more effort than I expected.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you for training me like this.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: It is also my pleasure to watch you become stronger.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Next time, come prepared to fight me with your best effort.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: In other words... I, also, am going to fight you with my best effort.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: At this rate...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I believe our next fight will be your last training.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Really...? Master Kum. Can’t you continue to help me train?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Although it is still a little too early to admit,

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: but I believe you have become strong enough.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: If you manage to pass the next training... I will give you a present.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Really? What is it!?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Beat me and find out yourself.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Already prepared, eh? Let’s begin our last training.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Here we go!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Ho ho... Just as expected... You’ve become so much stronger.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff..... huff.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I thought I could beat you for sure this time... But that last blow didn’t hit properly.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: When will I be able to bring out Master Kum’s best effort?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: You already have.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: The fact that I’m still on the ground is the evidence.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I should get back on my feet to give you the present.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What is the present? I’m super excited!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wha.. What is this? Some kind of energy flew into me... But I’m not sure what this is!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I gave you a skill that I used to use.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: From now on, every time you do a physical attack.. you can give additional damage of as much as half of the damage from the magic attack right before.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: This is an advanced skill that reuses magic power used from magic attacks,

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: which will be very effective if you can do consecutive attacks.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm..... It sounds complicated...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but thanks anyway! I really feel stronger from all the trainings from you, Master Kum.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I feel like I can do anything!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Yes. I hope that is possible for you.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I have an old friend of mine sealed deep inside the Ice Cave.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I want you to undo the seal and release my friend.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm..... How do I do that...?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Aeris, the ice spirit, is guarding the place. It will be a difficult fight.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Urr..... Then shouldn't you go?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Honestly, you're way stronger than I am. I know that.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: No. Only you can undo the seal.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: My last present for you is also there, so you should go.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... I’m not sure what it's all about.... But if it’s your last present for me, I’ll look forward to it.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Please undo the seal on Ice Witch inside the Ice Cave. My last present for you is also there.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh! Kitty!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Boo... I want to keep it... Should I put a mind control spell over it?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. It might harm her...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Can I pet you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She doesn’t like me... What should I do to make you like me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She still doesn’t like me... What should I do to make you like me?

Item.name: blackCat-pat
Item.talkText: Meow♥

Item.name: lalaqueWarrior
Item.talkText: W... Witch!?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How annoying...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard there’s a lot of warriors in Lalaque Village as well. I shouldn’t go too close.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? Again...?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I waited for White Witch, but it’s the Dark Witch!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......Why am I the Dark Witch?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You have dark skin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about the White Witch?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: She has white hair.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: This is a great place to fight.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Even the village is close by, so people passing by will see me if I beat you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah. They’ll see you on the ground.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Eek! Don’t look down on me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... That was too easy it was almost embarrassing... Let alone the amount of gold. How troublesome.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: That was my pocket money from mom...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: What do I do now... Sob...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: And the witches took all my pocket money...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I heard witches are afraid of the warriors...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: but why do they ignore me?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m worthless... Nobody will like me....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is he... trying to jump?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I really want to find peace of mind...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Weren’t you trying to jump?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: No!!! I was just thinking!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did he pass out?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s just that what you’re doing now is worthless.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But don’t think you’re a worthless person.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Oh... Sorry!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Kyaaa!! Help me!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is the path connected to the waterway to transport items...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But there’s an iron gate now...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Should I try to use the key I got from Robin?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They were gathering the Dark Warriors in the warehouse!

Item.name: thief2
Item.talkText: (I’m jealous.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: To form a Flame magic, I need the chemical ingredients and some flammable items.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There are some dried leaves near the tree over there...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: and over there... there's the Kentz cave.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s where I can collect Sulfer Powder, which is the most important ingredient.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll have to defeat Leaf Golem to get the default ingredient for all magics... The Stone Slab.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It should be a piece of cake!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Once I craft this flame magic... I’ll become so much stronger!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's so close to the village entrance over there... I wonder if I can go down...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (It won’t hurt to look at how the warriors are doing...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh.. Cold!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard there was a village in the Icy Field...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder why they made a village somewhere this cold?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe the villagers left... because it’s too cold.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (But why create a village if you’re going to leave......)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Anyways! I’ve seen the Icy Field on the map before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should be able to get out of the Icy Field if I go straight south.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And then I’ll look for Lord Aimhard’s temple!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why is she called a witch? I think I heard about her... wasn’t she a half-blooded deity?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Uhm.... That is...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Because she blew away her village with her own hands.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No way... But why!? She ruled that village!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard she was the first half-blooded deity ever to become a temple lord...!

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Well, she was half human... So some aspects of her might have been lacking.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She got corrupted...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let’s go to Lord Elysion’s temple right away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I think the only way to get there now is through the Vavelie Road...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (The warriors are probably going to be on watch...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll head right to the Elysion Hill as soon as I get to Vavelie Road!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe somewhere with some less guards... Or divert the attention....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (It’s awesome to have a warrior friend!)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: The warriors are the ones searching for the deities the most... So I thought there might be some information about you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’ve... grown taller...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha... I’m taller than you now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hm, but I bet you’re still a weakling...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you remember me falling from the cliff when I was trying to pick that vanilla flower? I was fine back then!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m glad you look healthy. Really!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... What’s with that attitude? I’m a customer, you know!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: So what? Do you want me to be kind to you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Boooo...!! I’m not here to buy anything!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: All I do is give items in return for the money.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: You said you’re a customer?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m just looking. Not buying anything!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: If you’re not going to buy anything, you should leave. I don’t want to get in trouble for talking to a witch.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........... Fine. I’ll buy.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I have a lot of Kreytes items... But nowhere to sell them. Should I try to sell them to the Pope’s castle?

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I think I heard the Pope is buying Kreytes Leaves in bulk...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gasp....... A huge pudding!!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: Ho ho... Little witch is scared, eh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if it tastes good, too?

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: Are all witches this rude.......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It can talk...... Cool!!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: R... rude...!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: P... Please don't hurt me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ehehe... Eheheheh!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: S... Stop! You will regret it if you eat me up!!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: I see you’re pretty strong. I will graciously reward you with a piece of my flesh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A piece of your flesh? I’m going to eat the whole thing.

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: But... Yes! See,

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: you’re going to get fat!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: Ah... I’m tired. I should go to sleep to regenerate my flesh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... Ugh..... I can’t take any more...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s me! Get me a piece of pudding~

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: You rude little... I am the king of the puddings.

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: Fatty fat fat!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: Fatty fatty fat fat!!!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: Alright? Just one piece.

Item.name: puddingQueen
Item.talkText: Oh, what a cute little girl!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: S... Strawberry flavored!!

Item.name: puddingKing
Item.talkText: What is honey doing!? This rude little girl is running all over my cave!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... Will I be able to go back to that time...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (The vanilla flower didn’t bloom...)

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: That bear.... Saying unnecessary stuff like that...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No way...!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Didn't you think about me?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You had a habit of calling my name whenever you were tired or troubled.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh.. What are you talking about?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Nuh huh! It's not like I missed you... not that I didn't.. But anyways!! I’m busy too!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m just curious... But why are you going back so soon? You said you still have some time left.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It’s all for you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Nothing. See you again!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin was even worse!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She might know something about that warrior wearing the golden armor.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I should go to the Black Witch’s Forest.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There is one that’s still around.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Oh, and you may take Blue with you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Blue? What’s that?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: This guy next to me. It’s said to be kept as a pet by ancient gods. They have special power with the deities.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Plus, I think I’m going to want to know about how you’re doing, so he can tell me about that.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re going to monitor me?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Yeah. You better do a good job because I’m rooting for you. I’m going to be watching you using Blue!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: And he’s so smart, he can even write. Even though he can’t speak...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: At least it’s not going to collapse right away because he flew out so soon...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Sorry to make you wait so long.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute!!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I know you've gone through a lot of trouble.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why did you take so long!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin... Robin is...... now..........!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Let’s get out of here first, shall we?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Why is it so dark outside...??

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Wh.. What is this?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: A... dragon???

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: We need to tell Pope.....!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Heh heh... Silly humans....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: The Pope that you're looking for is dead.

Item.name: oldMan
Item.talkText: We're getting punished because of what we did to the gods..... It's the end of the world........

Item.name: vPeople
Item.talkText: The Pope is.....what?!?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: The Pope was addicted to the dark energy and destroyed by the spring.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: That is the limit of you humans...

Item.name: oldMan
Item.talkText: Gods! Where are you!! Please forgive our sins and help us from this disaster...!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I am the deity that will save you.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I succeeded the power of Aramute, the god that you all worshiped.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: And now that I have surpassed him... You must simply obey to me.

Item.name: warriors
Item.talkText: Everyone.... We should run........ Aaah....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Yes... You only believe when you see it for your own eyes.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I will now show you the miracle that you were longing for.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: The village entrance... is on fire...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Right... Despair before the absolute power.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: This is the power of the god that you are going to serve now.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ..........This was almost too easy. The temple lords died without resistance...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: It’s almost a letdown. Hee hee!

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: Hey... You warriors... You should... Do something....

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: You guys were hunting down the deities... right?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Don’t be ridiculous...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Ugh.. Nuuk??

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: How come you guys......??

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Ugh... Why..... Why why are you doing this, all of a sudden?! You guys barely even come out here!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Because a friend asked for help.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: What kind of nonsense is....

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: These are my friends.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: My honorable friends!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Wh.. Vavelia village isn't that far from our home...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: And besides, we owe these guys. That's why we’re helping.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Kekeke, this will buy us some time.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Krrrr... I can eat you with just one bite....!!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Nuuks are faster than dragons, you know!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Do you think any of your slow attacks would work on them?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Hee hee hee!!!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Ark. It’s not a great situation.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Eh? The village...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: We can't completely stop this guy with simple diversion...

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: Wahhhhhh!! More flames are coming!!

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: But... We have a dragon behind us........

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Ugh...The temple lords should come back quickly....!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: The more you resist, the more screams will fill this village.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: This one is for you.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: S.... Someone help..........

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: I don't think we can stop this....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Wh... What is it!!!!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: It's been a long time since we could shoot a dragon!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Those big, useless humans!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Kekeke, I bet the giants can’t do anything about this!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: The Dwarves.... Why did they come out of hiding......

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: We happen to be friends with the big fat deity.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: We are going to protect this village, where she will return to, one day!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Oh, by the way how is Aramute doing? He normally comes to visit us once or twice every year, but we haven't seen him around much.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The humans caused a war.

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Wh... What!? Giants caused a war!? Why? Didn't the deities grant them miracles?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They killed the temple lords to take over the power for the miracles.

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Boo! Boo! They killed Aramute!!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Giants are bad! Let’s fire cannon to the Vavelia village!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t do that. Someday I'm gonna go back to the village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We can't seen them now, but I believe they will come back someday.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That's why I’ve been investigating the temples.

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: ....Grr.. This was a great chance to get back at those giants..

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: But we should save the village if the big fat deity wants to go back there someday. Sure, we hate the giants....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t call me big fat! I’m not that fat!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: You probably weigh a hundred times more than we do...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: These dwarves....!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Of course. Friend.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Our village is nearby. We're not going to keep quite if you keep breathing fire like that.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Kekeke!! Have you witnessed the miracle of fire?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Even more miracles are possible. Humans...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I guess I just wasted time by teaming up with the Pope...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: For you to worship me more... I will show you more of the god's power!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Ughh....... Neck.... My neck.....

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Whoa... I didn't think we could hit it right away!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Thank you... Heh heh

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Nah. That thing is huge.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You could shoot anywhere and it would still hit. Right?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I could have found out too late if I didn’t send Blue with Luna.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I will save my own people!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Good job!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Well done! Blue!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You pricky little things...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: and my friend Luna!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Shoot more! More!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Krrrr... Krrrrrwahhhhh!!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: R.... Red Beard!?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: You're wanted! How dare you come here!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I don’t think this is a good time for you say stuff like that.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I'm here to rescue you.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Are you really... going to get us on there....?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Yeah. Except for you.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: I’m sorry!! Please save me!!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Heh heh, I’ll think about it.

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: But is that vehicle... safe? How did you manage to get it through the flames?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: I covered it with the non-melting ice I got from the Icy Fields.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: But the fire is so strong, so it could melt slowly.

Item.name: vPeople
Item.talkText: wow.... We’re safe!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Get on, women and children first.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You, warrior. You’re the last.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Th... Thanks!

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: Wh... what should we do!! We have to go through here! But it's still better than the dragon...!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: And the Frozen Dark Magic Stone is keeping it from melting down, so it’s safe for a while.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Now, it’s 10,000G per person, so hop on first and pay me later.

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: Of course, it’s the Red Beard... You're not doing this for nothing...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I am sorry I couldn't be more helpful...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: It's okay! Let’s just buy some more time........!!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: #@%!! The hot air balloon broke, and we can't move the cannon...

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Ouch... How far were we blown away?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: The deities were soft before... But I am not.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I will show you the divine majesty. And I will make all things new!!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Stop. Jude.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: My master commanded to protect the village.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You idiot. The humans killed your master and took over the springs,

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: What I’m doing now is the revenge for your master!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Your conspiracy to mislead the humans.. Lord Durok knew of it from the very beginning.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: .......You're talking nonsense, just like Aramute...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: They were murdered in the hands of the humans.......

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: They gave their life to the humans.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ..... They gave their life? They gave it away?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I have prepared for a long time. Devices to neutralize their magic power...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: and to make the humans attack them, so that they won’t fight back.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: And lastly... My power surpassing theirs.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: All of these were my effort. Are you kidding me?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: They gave their lives?! That doesn't make sense!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Men's endless desire to seek power... It cannot be stopped.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: You of all people, would know.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Yes. The Pope died because he wanted more power than what he could hold in his hands.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: But all living things desire and pursue power. What is wrong about that?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: To show them the end of that kind of desire.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Just like the Pope you described.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: And you.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Hee hee.... Hee hee hee!!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: That’s the stupidest plan out of all their plans that I’ve heard in the past several hundreds of years!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: But what's it going to be now?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Let's say we showed them. But the humans are going crazy over the Dark Magic Stones. Even the Pope went crazy.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Then what now?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: For me to judge these corrupted humans and become the only god?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Why, thank you! That sounds like a great plan for me!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Stop getting in my way, get lost!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Don’t make me laugh.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: That’s why I made an alliance with the Pope.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: What are you trying to do? Aren't you here to fight?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Come on, shoot me a fire breath!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: This village will be completely destroyed if we fight here.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Huh? Then why are you here? Just to get bored?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: This is it.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Don’t do that...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Temar. Disappear with this village.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: He reduced the power of the explosion using his body...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ....Well, let me consider that a practice.

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Mommy!!! Wahhhhhh!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: This is sad. I blew away only half of the village.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Now let's so this properly.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Oh dear... Poor little child who lost mommy.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I’ll send you to her right now.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ....Aeris??? What is this thing doing here?!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: .... Ludina!?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Long time no see. Jude.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Grrr... Ludina... Didn't you seal yourself?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I could feel you emitting so much poison, so I was worried about my daughter.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Fortunately, seems like Luna is not here.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Grrr... Well then, get back into that cave and take this with you!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: What? Are you still pretending to be a temple lord??

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You blew up your own village.... And now you're going to try to stop me!?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Do you think this will make the weight of your sin any lighter?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But it's okay.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: My daughter forgave me.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: That's why I decided to accept myself, as I am.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Yes... Doing this won't make what I did okay.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But I’m going to start over!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Shameless woman... Still seeking to be the temple lord...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: No. I no longer need the title of a temple lord.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I just want to help the humans who need my help.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I’m different from you.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Grrr... Don't do this. Let's join forces. We're both half-blooded deities, after all.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Without them we could rule over all of the continents! We're almost there!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I will give you at least one continent. I promise!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: You never looked very handsome, but you look even worse as a dragon.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: It was a good thing I dumped you back then.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I don't need you anyways!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: And Aeris... I know this thing can't last very long outside of the Ice Cave!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Once this thing is gone, I’ll rip you into thousands of pieces!!!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I knew it... But you really are nothing but a monster.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Oh, right. You were. Since you’re a dragon from birth... Pfft!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I’m going to kill you... I’m going to murder you.......

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I hope you're prepared to die.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Pfft, you should really try hard if you want to get rid of me.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You are the last obstruction that I have left.....

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Oh dear... I was just worried for you.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Well... Who's the one that said he’s going to die if he doesn’t see me?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Sorry, I don't want a partner as ugly as you are.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Ughh....... Barrier...!?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You could do this.....??

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: sigh..... you really can't tell whose magic power this is? Your sense really got dull, didn't it?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: N... nonsense!!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I killed him!! I felt his magic power disappear as he died!!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: It’s funny to see you in panic.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Did you really think I, Aimhard, would die so easily?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Huff.... huff.... It doesn't matter.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I can break this barrier... And kill him again!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Aaah.... Ack!!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Look at you! You got even uglier than before.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Oh, he disappeared sooner than I thought... I guess Aeris was too hot.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Idiot. This barrier never breaks.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: You never know.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I put my telekinesis on it. You don't have to thank me.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Well that wasn’t necessary. My barrier alone is strong enough!

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: You shouldn't trust you magic power too much, you just woke up.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: And you're always so careless.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Then get the telekinesis away! Let’s see how long this guy lasts!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ..... This is a lie... I....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I surpassed Aramute!!

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Should we finish this up quickly? The humans are afraid.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Aramute. The last should be yours, shouldn't it?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ...........Ah... Lord Aramute.....

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Jude. You lured the humans, and now... this is the end of you.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: .............You were just making fun of me this whole time..

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: You had the strength like this.... Why did you give your life away to the humans.....?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Many humans, including you, the Pope, and countless warriors, were enticed by the dark power. You know that better than anybody else.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And at the result, the village became a mess...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And if we let you, the whole continent would have looked the same.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: To let the humans realize their fault.... We just stepped out for a moment.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: So you knew all about it...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: And why didn’t you stop me!?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I served you with everything I had for hundreds of years!!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: But you kept me trapped in the position of your secretary!! I’ve done so much for you, but you never made me a temple lord!!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Temple secretary was what you wanted.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: That's why I gave you the position and a portion of my magic power.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: All I did was give you what you wanted. But why do you blame me?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Because you did not stop me! I’ve become like this because you never stopped me!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: There was no reason for me to stop you.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And no reason to change the way you think.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Why did I not stop you, as a god?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Because we do not care for the titles that you made for us.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: We only give miracles to those who we find sympathetic.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: First of all, being a god has nothing to do with me. We are us.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: You judge us by your standards and act on your own, and you end up blaming us.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ...... So did I mean nothing to you?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Then... Why did you take me in......?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And you're wrong about being chosen as the bait.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: and this would have happened anyway. Even after this... This will happen again.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: You merely walked in your own path,

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I acknowledge your efforts so far.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: These are the limitations of incomplete beings.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: ............ All is futile...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Now, I will stop your existence.

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: We’re doomed... We’re just going to die anyway......

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: Oh, gods.... Please come back and help us.....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: .... What is this!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: P... Please save us.........

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: Poor warrior..... It's over ...

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Ugh......... What.... What's this?

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: This is.... Hell.....

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Was I.... Just a bait....?

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: Did we... survive.....?

Item.name: bableliaPerson2
Item.talkText: The red dragon used its body to protect us....

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: What’s the point.... The black dragon won, anyway!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: It would have been easier to die earlier!

Item.name: bableliaPerson1
Item.talkText: This is devastating...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: What did I tell you... We should have died earlier!!!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Um... That just now was the last super-long-range shell we had...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Why! Why!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Because we’re on exile now, all we have left are short-range defensive shells.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Blue! Go and tell Father about what’s going on, and ask him to send backup shells!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Haha, Jude.

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Your dream was to become a temple lord, too, right?

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: Grrr... I am the god now... Don't talk about the stories from the past!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......... It's strange.. Lord Aramute is back, but that doesn’t make me happy at all..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What have I.... What have I been fighting for, this whole time?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were the worst until the very end.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You promised to protect me... And leaving me like this......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........... I don't even want to go back to the village!!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: So that's Robin? The one that betrayed you...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... Just leave me alone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Please leave!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And he didn't betray me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He... because of me.... He was trying to protect me!!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Can't we bring him back to life? Mom.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: There’s no problem. Besides, that boy isn't dead.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: He's wandering in the darkness for now.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Lu... Luna!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Are you alright!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah.... Are you mad??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah... I said I’ll take a beating from you when we get out...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How many times do you want to surprise me like this!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... You........ I’m going to beat you up a lot!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Okay. But please go easy on me. My whole body hurts...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: What happened to Crown!? What about Berto!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah.... You saved me.....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Sorry. I promised to keep you safe, but still I couldn’t keep that promise..

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont This is how my journey ended.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont A lot of time has passed,

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont and a lot of things have changed.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont I am no longer called a witch,

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: #bFont and no one fears me anymore.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont And....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont I have regained lost friends.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont I no longer have to stand alone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard's barrier...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But the barrior shouldn’t work without Lord Aimhard's magic power... That’s weird.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard's barrier in the Lalaque forest... Then is this the area where Nightmare is sealed?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess only pure-blooded deities can get in.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Or I heard you can pass through if you have a blue crystal of purification on you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wasn't sure, but I guess I can pass through. Is it because of the crystal?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The example of humanity's endless desire...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... That was impressive.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think he’ll get back up later, seeing from how I can still feel his magic power.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Boo...! I fought him with that girl before....!)

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Ugh.. Unbelievable!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I tried so hard... But why....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You're really strong. For a human to be this strong, is amazing.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Shut up! I do not want to hear it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh......What! I’m just complimenting you!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I’m just ashamed that I was defeated by a witch...! Ugh..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, you're a real scary guy.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I knew it... It’s you again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why are you, a palace warrior, at the Lalaque forest?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Aren’t you supposed to guard the Pope’s castle?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I do not need to answer your questions. I will only punish you...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You're so determined!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re even stronger than before!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: To shout like that until he passes out...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Now he's quiet. Are you upset that you lost again?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... He passed out while sitting down!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But really, what is a palace warrior doing here? It's disturbing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait, that red outfit... You're a palace warrior, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Then are there other palace warriors around here, too?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Palace warriors are stronger than other warriors, so I don't really want to face them...

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Wahhhhhhhh!!! Mommy!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The wild dog...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? Did it just dodge...??

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: B... Big sis.....!! Help!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't worry. I’m super strong!

Item.name: dog
Item.talkText: Grrrrrhhh.... Grrrr!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is he...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is he taking the kids hostage!?

Item.name: dog
Item.talkText: Grrr! (Yes!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are wild dogs this smart these days....?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa... You’re impressive. Aren’t you?

Item.name: dog
Item.talkText: Krr krr (hee hee)

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Big sister!! Are we going to die!?

Item.name: dog
Item.talkText: Krrrhh krrh! (kekeke!)

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Big sis is in danger!!

Item.name: dog
Item.talkText: Pant pant! (Master!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't get too close! You're gross!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..............I said get away!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Go, fetch!!

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Big sis saved us!!

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: You're the best!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh. This is nothing.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I gotta go before that dog comes back.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I put mind control over him, so he might come back thinking that I’m his owner.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You guys should go home, too.

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Big sis! Tell us how you did that!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh, you're too young to know.

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Whoaaa!!! She’s gone!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: See you. Little guys.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Looks like a village entrance... I shouldn't go further.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Dark Magic Stone...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's in small quantity, but it’s still going to be dangerous for humans.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Captain, at least you should run away......

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: We're too late.....

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Stay alert!! We’ll go together!!

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Why.... Why isn’t your soul coming out?

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Odd.... I’ve never met a human... like you...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Don’t resist... Come join us.... Let’s become one......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s not purification magic, but you should be able to hold out a little more if your strength is recovered.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Why me...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This witch... She became even stronger when she absorbed your warriors’ souls.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's because if you get eaten too, it will be harder for me to fight her. Don't misunderstand me.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: ...... But still I don't understand...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is not a good time for that. Don't you want to bring your warriors back to life?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Fine. We’ll talk later.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: She’ll eat us if we lose conscience!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She ran away...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you come here to fight this evil spirit?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Yes. There was a report, so me and my men have been sent here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow..... All the way here, just to save the people of Lalaque village?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ugh... Captain.....

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Are you alright?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Sigh..... I just had an out-of-body experience.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: It feels like I was in the witch’s stomach, but I got out somehow.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: That fella should be fine, too. Probably.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Alright. You've all suffered so much. Let's get going once we get some rest.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Urmm.... But didn't we have a purpose why we were sent here?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: ... We've accomplished the witch hunt. It’s okay.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Still... Pope didn't send us here to get rid of evil spirits...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: He told us to catch a witch...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... So they sent you here thinking that it's a deity, but it actually turned out to be an evil spirit, huh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And now that you’ve figured that out, you're going to arrest me now?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ehhhhhh? Isn’t this a chance, sir? She probably doesn’t have a lot of magic power left!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I can't hold my sword anymore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But ugh.... Yeah, this sword is contaminated pretty badly.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: When I tried to slice through the evil spirit... The sword got contaminated from the evil energy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The sticky blood is already hardened, and it won't come off easily!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I’m sorry, but could you take that sword with you? Please.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You're worried about the villagers, so you can’t just leave it here, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You should know that you owe me big time for today, okay?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Next time we meet, try not to attack me so suddenly!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Alright. I'll take it. I think I could even use it if I purified it well.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Hang in there!! My friend!!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Grrrr... Grr....

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Damn it!! He's already been eaten away!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Hey.... I’ll pay you back all the money that I own you when we get back to the village, so please...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm... How come there is a Dark Warrior here...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... I should have just ignored this.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: H... Help me.... Miss Witch...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He asked for this. This is what happens when you try too hard to get power!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Miss Witch... This guy is going to head towards the village...

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: My family is there....

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Please help....

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ughhh.............. Damn it!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I did it. The village will be fine.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Ugh... You could have helped more quickly...

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: This happened while we were gathering the remains of the Dark Magic Stone from the Evil Spirit's Cave...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But how did a Dark Warrior even get here?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: It was such a small piece, so my friend thought it would be okay...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You know how dangerous they are, yet that is how much you want to become strong?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is the era of the humans now. But you need more power?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: We've got to succeed... This is a countryside in the corner of this continent.... so...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... That’s why the Dark Warriors kept appearing.

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Idiot! I’m saving this kid!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Don't do anything to that kid!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Gotta help...!)

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Lower the sword!! I can't focus like this!

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Wahhhhhhhh!!! Mommy!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (It's too late...!)

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: G... Got it!!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Kid! I’ll pull you up!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: See? I’ll pull you up too....

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I decline.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I do not want help of a witch.

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Why are you so stuck up!?

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: You just saw me saving the child! Do you still hate me!?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Master...! Ignore him and use teleportation magic...!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Shut up! I gotta hear him out!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Tell me! What did I ever do to you!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: You're just a witch. And your existence has killed many people!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: I... I did nothing but helped!!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: What did I do wrong?!! Waaaaaahhhhhh!!!!!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: S... Stop.... We’re going to fall...!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: I don't care!! I don't know!! Apologize!! Now!!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: S.. Sorry....

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: I can't hear you!!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Master!! Grab my feet!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is Pieberry alright?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: .......That witch is safe. She was not hurt.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm.... It’s not that I’m worried about you...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why are you in such a mess? Ever your armors are broken.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Urr... Urmm.... That’s because...

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: .............. I got dropped on my back.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What? That’s sad. You're a Palace Warrior and you don’t know how to land on your feet?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Urmm.... Anyway, she is safe, so don’t ask anymore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why is he so flustered?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did he hug her when they were falling, or something?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh.. What am I talking about! There's no way!!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Why is that my fault?? Did I ever kill someone!?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: You are a demon too, and you are responsible for that war!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I cannot forgive your kind!! Every time I think of my father who died in the war.....!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: You guys are the reason why I’ve become a warrior!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: For my father's revenge!! And for justice!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Everyone hates me just because I was born!!

Item.name: pieberry2
Item.talkText: Kid! Grab this bird's feet!!

Item.name: little
Item.talkText: Kyaaa! No! I don't like ugly bird!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Come on, grab my feet.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He’s still in the Lalaque forest...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if he is he still deployed here to catch us?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It should be alright to leave them there, right? He doesn’t seem to be so cautious these days...

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I believe the Pope. Miracle powers are something that's granted for those who are pure. So...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Trust me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (But I need to go down to get to Lord Elysion's temple...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I should ask Robin on the night with the brightest moon!)

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wahhhhh!! Wahhhhhhh!!!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: From now on, I’m not going to believe anyone...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll find all the springs and revive them...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m never going to forgive you...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You hurt me so bad....

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m never ever going to forgive you...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't need any friends...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈에게 배신 당한 후 집에서 대사
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Not anymore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Aslan! But still, don't you want to come with me and investigate the temples?

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: I refuse. I will protect the temple.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You're so stiff.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But Lord Arua's spring just reacted to me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Seems like he wanted to say something to me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. Lord Arua's magic power came into me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: From now on, I’m going to check out to all the rest of the temples.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Although it is unlikely that you are lying...

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: I am going to test you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Test what?

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: My Master’s will.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... What’s with the frown all of a sudden!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why did you attack me so suddenly!

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: But I wanted to test it.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: I could definitely feel Lord Arua's magic power from you during the battle.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Which means... You have Lord Arua's will within you.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: From now on, I will protect you as if you were my master.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It would be really reassuring to have you nearby!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, right... There were lions near Lord Aimhard's temple!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pack of lions....!

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Here. Now you may travel freely on this plain.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow... I'm glad you're a lion!

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: This was my hometown.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard sent me to my master, Lord Arua.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you look kind of different from them.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: That's why I couldn't fit in with my brothers. I was very small, smaller than my brothers.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: That is why I was sent to Lord Arua.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... You were bullied? Are you on good terms with them now?

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: After I was chosen by Lord Aimhard, the pack started to respect me more.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard really cared for my brothers... The lions followed Lord Aimhard well.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Since then, there has not been a problem.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm.... Isn't that a bit dirty? They used to bully you before...

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: Well, I do not care.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: It is only natural that the weakest dies out faster. I understand.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: I never hated my brothers. I just thought that I was too lacking.

Item.name: aslan
Item.talkText: I’ll go.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But there’s something about you that seems... rather lacking. Your armor... maybe the face too...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Eeeek!! I was born this way!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: What do you want me to do!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... Sorry.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I will punish you right here!!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I thought I met you around here before.. where have you been?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't live around here lately...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I waited here because I didn’t know that...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: .......But it was worth it!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Because I finally met you!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You look really tired... How long have you been standing here?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I tried so hard...!!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Just kill me!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Nah. I’ve never killed someone before.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Wait and see!! I’m not going to make this kind of mistake again!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m pretty sure she's strong, but she really overdoes it...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I waited so long, that my strength ran out....!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll spare you, so just go.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I heard that you appear in the Icy Fields a lot!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah? Well, let's see you skills!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll let you go again, so come back next time....

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I won!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I let my guard down....!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Hohoho!! I can finally get recognized! I can become a palace warrior!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is that how bad you wanted to become a palace warrior?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you going to do when you become one?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I guess you’ve never even thought about it.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Somebody I know claimed that he became a warrior to protect someone...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But after he became one, he sold out his friend. And got promoted!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Will you do that, too?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Eeek..! Sell out a friend!? I won't do such a bad thing!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Justice... Yes! I’m going to fight for justice!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: What's so funny?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ve saved your life multiple times until now, but you’re still trying to kill me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What is your justice? You’re probably just going to go around and sell your friends out, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I just remembered...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You're Alflady, daughter of the toolmaker in Vavelia village. Right?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You... you remember me...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey. We may not have been best friends, but we used to hang out a lot.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So you are a friend betrayer, too!!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: S.. Sorry.... Luna...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....Seems like you knew who I was all along.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is this the best you can do!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Saying you're going to keep justice! Or protect weak people... or whatever!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But in the end all you do is pushing your sword against your friend's throat!?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Ah.... Ahhh...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She knew that I was her friend and still came after me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She's just as bad as Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I remember... She was always alone...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's kind of sad.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I kind of understand what it's like to be lonely, and wanting to get recognized by people even if that involves turning me in. Just a little bit.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I knew it...!!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You better be prepared! I trained hard and I’m in the best condition!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you doing?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You’re the worst...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Because of you, I lost my dream.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I was so happy that I was improving myself every day...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: And when I finally beat you, I couldn't have been happier....

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: But you attacked my conscience, and now it's all gone.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: What... What do you think I should do?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't know. Why are you asking me?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Right...? You're the one who took away my dream, and yet I asked you what to do with myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Look, I’m sorry. But you still attacked me knowing that I was your friend.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well.. There's a worse person, so I wasn't that shocked.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Hey. It's not because I’m sorry or anything, but...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: my dad packed me a couple of these to give to you, so you don't catch a cold.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: My dad also knows that you’re not a bad girl, so...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you just say “my dad also”?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That means you don't think I’m a bad person, either. Right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Apology accepted. Don't do that next time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m leaving. Bye.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Get out.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You, kid! What are you and why are you chasing me around?!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m not a kid!! I was just chasing that Black Witch!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Don't make excuses!! You were everywhere, no matter where I go!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You stop disturbing me and go away!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I need to keep watching that Black Witch!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You??? You're never going to be able to get her!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You Lalaque hillbilly!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m not trying to catch her! I’m watching her!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: You’re stalking her!? What a pervert!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Pervert? Pervert??

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Just give up, already!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I lost my dream because of her! That’s why I’m watching her to she what she’s going to do!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Don't disturb me while I’m trying to figure out life!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: ........Huh? I lost my dream because of her, too!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You guys looks alike. You’ll get along really well.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Congrats! Woot!

Item.name: alfr
Item.talkText: Do you have a minute...?

Item.name: alfr
Item.talkText: What’s your name...?

Item.name: alfl
Item.talkText: I don't know.

Item.name: alfr
Item.talkText: I think maybe we could...

Item.name: alfl
Item.talkText: Get lost.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Whoa...! It’s a pretty dragon!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Pieberry is lucky. She has a pet like this!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I want one, too...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I want...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Can I?

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Should I?

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I.... I’m gonna take it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's... It's just for a little bit...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't want to be seen riding this out of here, so I’ll warp this home just in case.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Success!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow... It’s a lamp!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's really bright and I can feel so much magic power from it... Is it a magic lamp?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s amazing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It talked!!

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: I’m not a “it”!!

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: I’m the guardian animal of Lord Aimhard, and the secretary of the fourth temple!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ahhh...? Oh!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s why you have so much magic power even though you're a lamp!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That's really amazing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But what are you doing here...?

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: .....Lord Aimhard sent me here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh dear... You were thrown away?

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: N... No!!! I... I’ve been.... um... Yes! I’ve been deployed!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Deployed? You mean lent?

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: Don’t talk as if I’m a thing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But that's weird... Why?

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: I don't know. It all happened so fast and next thing I knew was that I got thrown ou.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh dear... Didn’t Lord Aimhard mention anything? Like the recovery of the spring...

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: Nothing in specific. He only told me to protect this girl and wait.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I see... The same thing as Aslan.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (There’s something going on. Something even the guardian animals are not aware of.)

Item.name: lightingbell
