Item.talkText: By the way, I haven't seen you around.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I lived in Vavelia village.

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: Oh, you're that deity with the moonstone?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... Do you know me?

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: Oh... I just heard that there's a deity with a moonstone.

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: It’s the first time I’m seeing the moonstone so up close.

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: I can definitely feel her power...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: “Her”? Do you know who owner of this moonstone was?

Item.name: lightingbell
Item.talkText: N... nothing. I just find the moonstone fascinating.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna! Do you wanna race?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh? Race?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: To that stone pillar over there!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not going to do it. I have better things to do. And don’t randomly start races and stuff like that!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Why...? Are you afraid you're going to lose?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No! ‘Cause they’re useless!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I understand.... You're probably heavier than I am...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... Alright! It’s on!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Get to the goal quickly!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Alright! Ready...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What are you talking about!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I won!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wasn’t ready! This doesn’t count!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I won!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Aww... I thought I'd win...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Only if I didn't lose my Lucca...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m so jealous of your Lucca!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Lucca is a dragon that's really hard to find... But I lost mine!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sorry. Actually, this is your Lucca.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wanted to ride on it because it's so pretty... I’m so sorry.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh, I see. No wonder he looked so familiar...!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Luna, you have a bad habit, don't you?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Heh, it’s okay. You can keep my Lucca...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: There’s a golem that I’m trying to defeat these days. Do you want to get it with me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... Why me...?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yay! So we’ll do it together, okay?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m so glad we can meet again thanks to Lucca!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: By the way, the golem cave is behind my house~ You have to get deep inside, so make sure you find the way correctly!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... I keep getting involved with her.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: It's going to be boring to do the same race twice..

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Let's try to see who catches the golem faster next!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Fine... I’m confident when it comes to things like that!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I thought you were confident just now, too!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wasn't ready!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Okay~ Anyways, we're going to get that golem together, alright?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: It’s in the golem cave behind my house! There’s this huge guy deep inside, so let's do it together!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Make sure you come!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I keep getting involved with her...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And if you can beat me! I’ll let you have Black Joe!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't need an ugly bird like that.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh, I’ll lend you Black Joe like I said. Use him when you need!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I said I don't need an ugly bird like that...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You know how to summon him now, right? Use him well!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Did something happen!? Are you alright?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah... Something did happen. There was this huge warrior!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I think somebody might have seen you around here. The security is now tighter...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was worried! Really!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't you worry, I’m really strong!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But that doesn't mean you should wander around too much,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop nagging. My ears hurt.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Sigh... If I didn’t tell them I saw a witch near the Elysion temple's entrance...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You could have faced the three warriors from just now. They’re really strong... It would have been really dangerous.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, that reminds me. I have to get to the Elysion temple. Do you know of any safe way to get there?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Hmm... Are you about to do something dangerous again?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Can’t you just keep yourself hidden?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: So I get to meet you like this every now and then.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You say that you want to see me too much..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's embarrassing, so please stop.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I won't get to tell you if you ever get caught...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That’s why I want to be honest to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m not going to get caught! You worry too much!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If you want to keep seeing me, just tell me how to get to Elysion Plains!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You're going to go no matter what I say, aren't you?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I guess there’s no other way. I’m going to be stationed here from now on...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But there is no safe path. Except... my partner tends to sleep a lot. That's probably when you should move.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But promise me... you'll only move on the days that we promised to meet. Okay?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: All right!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... Why are you getting so close?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Please stay like this for a while.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You were alone back in the village.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I remember naughty little kids throwing rocks at you, just because of your dark skin color.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It wasn't a big deal. They didn’t even hurt.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And you... Even though you were probably struggling at a young age... You helped Lord Aramute... and other people...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But to me... It looked like you were struggling hard because you didn’t want to show your weaknesses to anyone.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Even now...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You don’t have to keep saying you're okay. You can rely on me.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I... I’m your friend.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You can be honest around me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ............Yeah. It is tough.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I hate hiding all the time, and the Icy Field is too cold.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t want to sneak around like this to see you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... I can handle it. Because I’m not that weak.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha, that’s an improvement.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Yes. Just tell me a little bit at a time.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I hope talking to me makes you feel better, at least.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't really...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But how long are you going to hold me like this? It's hard to breathe...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Of course. I have to investigate the springs.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And you are alone now...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m fine.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wh... What are you doing!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So I’m okay.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And you always said “I’m okay”...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Sorry! I probably hugged you too hard, because of.. sentiments.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Can we meet again the next night, too... right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well.. If you say so...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m busy, but I could come out here to see you, since you're so worried about me.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Yeah! Let’s meet again safe and sound!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I can hear footsteps. Then see you next time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Make sure you show me the path to Lord Elysion's temple next time!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m going to let Michelle take the vanilla flower, too.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That’s because you're so predictable.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: We're on the same boat. Why don't we become friends?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: How's that? This is the Medal of Honor that's only given once every 100 years.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I asked Father to award this to you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm... I don't know....

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ......Hey! You're the first person to get it ever since Vavelia Kingdom was founded!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You should be jumping up and down because of happiness!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: When I, Princess Sofia, is awarding it to you personally!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... It’s just inconvenient.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Psh, people will die to have a cup of tea with me... But you...!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You should be a little more nervous! I’m the princess of Vavelia Kingdom!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ........Hm! This is never going to end.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But thank you anyways. I could do something for the Kingdom, because of you.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: If I couldn't do anything while the village was getting destroyed... I probably couldn't live with all the guilt.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s all because you didn’t hate the deities.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's all thanks to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That cannon fire bought us time for the temple lords to get there.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And thanks to you for sending Blue with me, because the cannon fire wouldn't have happened if you didn’t.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Heh, I knew I’m good at judging people. I knew you would do something.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll have to admit... You could even become a queen right now.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hey... My Father is still alive and healthy!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I’m going to keep learning from him.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Celvis, the Pope was also a good man in the beginning. That's why everyone trusted him.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You don't know when a person will change. That's why you always have to learn. It’s a big mistake if you believe that I am eligible.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: That mistake is what made the Pope what he’s become.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa~ you really are a decent princess! I’m impressed!

Item.name: vPeople
Item.talkText: Wow!!! It’s the hero!! She is the hero of Vavelia Village!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booooo.... Stop!

Item.name: vPeople
Item.talkText: Send respects to her!! Praise her! Wooooot!!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Be careful. If you open it up too much, the magic power from the spring will evaporate too quickly.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: But if you don’t open up enough, the magic power from the spring won't be able to flow out.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... This is hard...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: If you don't have enough magic power, you’ll find it hard to control the amount of power at the opening of the spring.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: But it will get better, so don't be impatient.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... So that's why the Pope was collecting all those Dark Magic Stones?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I think Jude taught him how to use the spring.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Correct. If he has ample magic power, getting to the sealing stone opening would be so much stable.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But Jude didn’t know that the source of the springs’ power is the temple lords, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If he knew, he would have never killed you.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Yes. You’re right. Jude believed that we were strong because of the power from the spring.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: That is why he lured the humans by telling them that the springs will turn them into gods.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But why did he wanted to join forces with humans? Humans are so weak, and they wouldn't have helped him that much.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Because he thought we wouldn’t fight back if he used humans to attack us.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And to rule the entire continent, he would have needed help.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But this spring is just a container for the temple lords’ power.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Without you, the power of the springs would have ran out eventually...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Jude probably just made an assumption, because he always watched us getting power from the springs during ceremonies.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Of course, Jude would have caused the war even if he knew the source of the springs...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And unless the craving for power of the imperfect beings are gone...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Someone like Jude is going to appear again.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: For when that time comes...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Luna. When you become a temple lord one day, be sure to become a good example of a half-blooded temple lord.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I know my daughter is going to be good! You're so mature.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh heh!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I believe so, too. Even with the limitations of being a half-blooded deity, you’ve come so far.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: If we go down a bit, we can see Lucca's baby!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: We gotta go before the mother comes back!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... Don’t pull me so hard!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And don't get too close! It's hot!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hey! Can you guys be quieter or not?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Keep making noise, and the mother will show up anytime!

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Robin! Keep watching to see if the mother is coming.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: If something happens, make sure to get it away from us. Okay?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Lucca is so much faster than me... Will I be okay?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You're a warrior! You can do that much!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin. When Lucca comes, just run away screaming.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We’ll take care of the rest.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: You're caring for Robin, again? Huh?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: They're fun to watch.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: They're always full of energy.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: sigh...... Why aren’t there guys like that in the palace?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: It's just boring people like you!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I’m sorry.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Be more entertaining, like them!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I'm sorry, but that's not my job.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ................Are you talking back to me?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I’m sorry.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I didn't know I would ever come back here with you again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whatever.. It hasn't been that long since Lord Elysion saved your life up here.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah.... It was here? I barely have any memory of what happened back then.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah, you weren't doing that great. You fainted again, and slept for days... I don't blame you for not remembering.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Urmm.... But...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I can kind of recall someone giving me a hug...

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Eeek..! Shut up!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... Are you sure you don't remember anything??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha! I was just messing with you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: There's no way I could ever forget that hug.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It.... It's not like there's any meaning behind it...!! Really!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: R... Right! It was a headlock! I was trying to hit you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Remember? I was going to beat you up if we made it out of the castle...!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Oh... Yeah?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was just hoping... it meant something.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What do you mean??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I thought maybe I was special to you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I even saw you crying...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: B...Booo...... I had something in my eyes! This vanilla pollen...! This was the reason!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll be honest with you first.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ve decided to protect you with my life.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But it wasn't easy for me to do.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Right after the war, I was still a rookie... So I couldn’t really do anything. And...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You were already too strong. Strong enough to fight against all the warriors.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: When I met you again on the Vavelie Road, I’ve decided.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was going to say this when I've saved you and took you somewhere they can't find us...!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But I let you save me again, just like the old days.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: So I was not going to say it...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But I’ve really kept this in me for a long time, and I think I should to say it before it's too late.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But that didn't work out very well.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna. I like you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And I’m serious.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Or you can dump me, if you want.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I.... I don't know.... Stuff like that....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Uhm.... Now that I think of it, I’m just a rookie warrior...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But you're a beloved student of Lord Aramute. You're too good for me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't know!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Phew~~ But this feels so much better!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I would have regretted it if I didn't say it!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: We can still be good friends, right?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I don't want to make you feel uncomfortable, so I’ll go...!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m glad that you gave me an answer! Because I was half expecting you to beat me up!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: F....... From when I was little... I didn't have anyone to rely on... other than you...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: When the other kids bullied me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wasn't okay.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: You said you’ll stay with me until the end!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I’m not done talking...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn’t want to let other people know... That I wasn’t okay.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you came to me... Even though you're a weakling...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You came to me and told me you'd be on my side...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And after the war, everyone left me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you were the only person who waited for me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........I was.... honestly grateful.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I... Me too....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I, too....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Like you!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: B...Booo...... That’s it!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Alright?? Just go now!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Will you... Accept my heart?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Heh.. I guess I really am a weakling. I realized that I can’t protect you with strength.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But I also realized... There is one thing I ca do for you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I can believe in you... And stand by your side until the very end.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Just once... Tell me how you feel.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont The story of Luna, the Moonlight Witch.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: #bFont The End

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Main Illustration/nn-Hye-yeon Choi

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: UI Design/nn-Suyoung Jang

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #bFont3D Design&Animation/nn-Suyoung Jang

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: #bFontSound/nn-Suyoung Jang

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Story/nn-Suyoung Jang

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Programming/nn-Suyoung Jang

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Game Design&Direction/nn-Suyoung Jang

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you!

Item.name: jude
Item.talkText: I gave all my heart to you....

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I didn't want all of your heart.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I wanted sincerity

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I can feel filthy magic power flowing out!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: These steel bars are really thick... I've never seen anything like this before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ruth Falls...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard there is a huge monster living under this fall.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I might get sucked in if I stayed here long.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: How come you're here...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I was looking around for magic ingredients and stuff!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But how come you're here, master?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: This... This is the island that I was born on.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: It sank too much, and now I’m not even sure if I can call it an island anymore..

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: It’s okay. Still... I got to see light for the first time in 50 years.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So, how did it feel like?

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho. It was the first light from the outside world.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: The light that made my life worthwhile.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I am going to spend the rest of my life here.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I went into the sea and found a lot of memories. I even found a rock carving that I made when I was young.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh... I see. Be careful and take care!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Ho ho, thank you. I’m still healthy and well, so don’t worry about me!

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: I’m going to spend the rest of my life here.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: There are a lot of memories under the sea.

Item.name: cenchOldMan
Item.talkText: Oh, and I forgot to give some of my chakra to the Burning Heart,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This turtle looks ancient. It's not even budging.

Item.name: judePerson
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute.

Item.name: judePerson
Item.talkText: All the Temple Lords have gathered.

Item.name: judePerson
Item.talkText: I’ve also sorted and placed the pledges on the meeting room table.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I see. Thank you for your hard work.

Item.name: judePerson
Item.talkText: I will go and finish preparing for the meeting.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is this why.... you wanted to meet me again?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You told me you became a warrior to find me... And it was true...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Besides, there’s a dragon near Durok Temple.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Temar? No one has seen it after the war, so it should be fine.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: S... Still...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I have to go to the west shore to get to Lord Arua's temple.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I used to play with Robin when I was little...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if I can still pass through there...?

Item.name: hunter
Item.talkText: Hm, what I pity. It was a good prey...

Item.name: hunter
Item.talkText: I wonder if there’s a request for me today...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh? Was that cave always there?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There might be some hidden food or treasures inside.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Let's go!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I don't think that human just now was a palace warrior...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A palace warrior, alone...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Just one isn't that dangerous, but I should still be careful.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s dangerous to fight a warrior. I should run away...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Got the Royal Palace Pass. I guess I just gotta give this to Red Beard now.)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Right now I’m just here temporarily, but I think they’ll assign me to be stationed here soon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I got caught again.... I wonder if Robin will be safe...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Old Magic Book....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This was Lord Aramute’s private room.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I’ll be able to get some of my magic improved with this.

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: But it’s not easy for me to get out, so I don't know when that will be.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's okay! I’ll be waiting every time when it's the night with the brightest moon!

Item.name: fakeCrown
Item.talkText: Haha, okay. I will see you again.

Item.motherEventName: 파이베리의 두 번째 집 문 두드리기
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin... He looked tired. Maybe it’s because he’s still a rookie warrior.

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard it helps if you eat a Running Leaf...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....Maybe I should get one for Robin.

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No, why do I care?

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s not like I’m his girlfriend...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Urr..... But we are friends. Friends can care about each other, right?

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But what if Robin thinks I like him?!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booooo!! What am I thinking!!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But what if Robin hugs me again because he wants to thank me........

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: In his arms......

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh... Heheh...

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No, I have better things to do! I’m not gonna go out of my way to get it for him!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Running Leaves can be found at Northern Vavelia Hill, but it’s too much trouble to go there!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Besides, Running Leaves are too fast to catch!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Running Leaf!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s not like I came here to find one for Robin, but what a coincidence!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s pretty rare, so I should catch it! It’s not like I’m catching it to give to Robin...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booo... Why is it laughing like a human!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You... I’m gonna get you!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hee hee! Is that the best you can do!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ha! Keep running!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eek! It’s flying on wind...!

Item.name: leafObj
Item.talkText: Huehehe! Heehee! LOLOLOLOL!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I’ve done this many times...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I did it!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hee hee!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Thanks to that, I could leave you by yourself. Now all I need to do is take care of you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I said I’m going to become a super cool warrior and protect you, right?

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Did you meet my friend?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You were my mom’s guardian animal?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And that’s why you are able to talk... And have a similar energy as my moonstone...

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Ho ho, that is correct.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I’m glad that you got to meet your mother.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I presume Ludina will come out soon? I didn’t think she would walk out holding your hands.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. She said she’s going to get ready before coming out.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... Thanks. I was able to meet my mom because of you.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Well, it is always my pleasure to help a friend.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Frankly, I’m surprised that you managed to open her frozen heart. I’m impressed.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Well, I hope you become a good deity, as well.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Ludina made the mistake she made because she has a soft side,

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: but she really wanted to help the humans.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I hope you take after her in that aspect.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Well, I hope you become a good deity, as well.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: I hope you take after Ludina's heart, as she really wanted to help the humans despite her mistakes.

Item.name: pandaKum
Item.talkText: Everyone makes mistake, so don't get caught up when you make one.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Keeeeee..... Krrrr.....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Grrr Grrrrrr....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... Robin.. Stop...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.... You don't have a lot of magic power left in you...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Keiiiickk!! Keee!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Finally... can you... recognize me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m so relieved!!

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: I..... can’t.... stop...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Keep it together!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There's.... There's gotta be a way....!!

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: I have.... a favor... to.... ask....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't say anything along the line of “finish me”!!

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: want..... to...... stab you... I couldn't.......

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: do any.....thing.... to you..... I can't..... die..... in peace.......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Please don't give up!!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about me?! Do you think I’m going to be okay if I did that?? You selfish jerk....!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’d rather die with you!!!!

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: Ah.... Aaah....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Don't be so sorry.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You........ You've protected me enough.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You never left me alone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: When I was getting bullied by other kids... And when I was being hunted down...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Now I'll stay by your side.

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: no.... Wahhhhhhhhhh!!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Please wake up!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Even when I was alone in the hideout.... The only thing that kept me going was you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Even when I thought you betrayed me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I spent the days thinking about how to get back at you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were.... Always by my side.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you... Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m sorry... Robin...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were always with me....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I..... I......... This is the only way.....

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I’m sorry!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's the same for me, too!!!!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If I attack you any more.... You’ll die!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Promise me you won't walk around here if I can’t make it out here at night, okay?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop nagging... Okay! I’ll only move when you're around to help me!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And.... There’s plenty of time left until the next time... But I’m busy!

Item.motherEventName: 로빈과 2차 만남 후 달리는 나뭇잎 혼잣말
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I... could use some fresh air..... I could take a walk over at the Northern Hill...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ahh...! I sighed because I was nervous.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Even though I got dumped...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It feels good that I could finally get that off my chest.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Honestly, I know I don’t deserve you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Because I wasn’t able to protect you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But I still wanted to say it out loud.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That way, I won’t have any regrets.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Can be stay as good friends, though?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Heh.. Sorry that I had to make it awkward.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah... Sorry, I might have been too abrupt.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll head down first!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll see you at the party later this evening!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s me.... Who doesn’t deserve you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can’t forgive myself.. for attacking you when you were dying...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sorry, Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I hope I can forgive myself someday...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: and gather up the courage to tell you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you, Robin.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Please bear with me... Just for a little bit.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can make combinations out of up to 3 magic circles for each slot.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Booster Magic Circles increase the amount of heal/magic damage from other magic circles in the slot.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The Focus Magic Circles that I can equip on the right will reduce the amount of MP I use.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s not very hard to collect ingredients for supportive magic circles like Booster and Focus magic.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should try and combine some supportive magic circles when I get a chance!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: MP usage will be increased slightly, but magic will become more effective.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He sounds gentler now...

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Wait for me!!

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: I... am... going to die... soon..........

Item.name: darkRobin
Item.talkText: So please... before I do...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Now that I think of it, Jude got me because of this device...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (What should I do...?)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Do you want some help?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Uh huh, yes. Come grab her.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I can forgive you if you lay down your sword now. Come on, Robin...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... The sea is too wide and it’s so difficult to find direction.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: From the map, it seems like it’s the Southwestern Waters here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The island with Lord Arua’s temple is going to be right over there!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... So this is right below the Kentz Mountain...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is probably the way to the dungeon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pope is probably at the prayer room, or Lord Aramute’s room.

Item.name: rPoint_0
Item.talkText: Ugggh.... Sir.....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You are injured pretty badly.... Don’t move.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph. I see that you take care of your people, huh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What a great warrior.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ..... That warrior.... just almost died.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That was my intention.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My bad, I should have cut his throat completely.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You should have just stayed down. For your own good.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Stop it! Luna!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: I can..... still fight..... Ugh..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop what!?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You are making it sound like I’m the bad one here!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you feel anything about what you’ve done to me?!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So now you... you think I’m a wicked witch, too?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Is it?!!?!?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It’s Uncle Ruba. Who ran the tool shop.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: He applied to become a warrior to earn money for food.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You remember... right? Mary, his daughter, is the only family he has left.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So what...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What does it have anything to do with me!?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He tried to kill me!!! And he will continue to try to kill me even if I let him go!!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You’ve... changed.

Item.name: ruba
Item.talkText: Sir..... Please.... attack....

Item.name: ruba
Item.talkText: That way... our squad.........

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Everything is crazy.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Ughh... I lost conscience.... for a bit.....

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: ......I can still fight.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Don’t do that.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You will regret it someday.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph. Do you think I’m going to be afraid of you? There is going to be no regret!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: His daughter.... is waiting for him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You ignorant, selfish humans!!! I’m sick of it!!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t even want to get my wand dirty.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ......This is where I fell from.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh..... Now that I think about it, I did fall too often.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: To the point where I even got used to falling from places.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Light? Seems like this is the only spot where there is no ceiling.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I remember falling at the ice cave...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I could feed it a small fish?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Should I give it some mixed meat?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Will it like a foxtail...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Here~~ it’s a foxtail!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Try it~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Here, try it!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: How cute~~!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: zzz... zzzZZ...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How do you expect me to survive, huh!?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I had nothing from the beginning!! No! The new family that I finally found.. and friends! I lost them all because of the war!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: His daughter is waiting??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you are going to continue your witch hunts??

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You saved me, when I was getting beaten by them.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Oh, sir. Can I help you?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You can get off duty and return to your quarters.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Um....? But the shift hours....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Commander Berto and I are taking over.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Oh? Why?

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Oh, okay. We’ll take off as soon as we fill out the shift log.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: That cocky punk. He just got promoted, and see how he's acting... He used to be my subordinate before he got promoted!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: He has no talent in swordsmanship, yet he’s already a squad leader....

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: And just look at how he's sticking around Commander Berto these days... How cunning.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Guys like that get promoted faster. On the other hand, people like us who guard posts... never get promoted.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Ughh... Phooey! He used to be so clumsy...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't say something so awful with that kind of face!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Where are the guards, by the way?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I sent them away. I thought you might enjoy having some fun, first.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: You clever bastard! It's like you can read my mind! Hee hee!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It’s the Commander's order. Don't question it, just go.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I’ll kill you in the most painful way I can imagine!!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: You’re still not very good with your sword... and you hesitate too much.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m going to protect Luna from now on.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Idiot... You're going to.... regret this...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I heard there’s a witch that appears here even during the day, and still you can’t get her??

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: And you got yourselves beaten?! What the!!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Pardon me sir... You got beaten, too... sir...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Watch your mouth!! You cocky idiot!

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: S... Sorry, Sir!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: I was just off guard! Who knew that witch would be that strong?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Don’t try to get her when you find her... At least one of you should go find help!

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: How stupid to get caught all at once...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I have an idea.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Oh? What is that?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It’s difficult to overpower a witch.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: The only person who can overpower a witch would probably be Commander Crown.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Are you out of your mind, too? Why are you bringing up Commander Crown?!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I know you probably don't like him that much, because he just appeared one day and became the 1st Commander.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Which is why you’re still the 2nd Commander despite all your effort.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: What did you just say? Are you out of your mind? What the?!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: All I’m saying is, we should take advantage of Commander Crown.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Honestly, even if we found a witch, they will beat us or get away. It just doesn’t look nice.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And from what I’ve observed, Commander Crown isn’t that interested in witch hunt itself.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: ......? From your observation, eh?

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Interesting. Keep talking.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Yes. He goes in and out of the temples every day.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: He doesn’t talk very much, so I don’t know what he’s thinking...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But at least I can tell that he has a lot of interest in the springs.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That's why we should lure Commander Crown and the witch to the spring.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Even though he's not that interested in witches, he's still going to fight if he sees one.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Then we can just take the witch after he’s done.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll take care of Commander Crown.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: We can use blue lizard to lure the witch. I heard witches like it because it increases their magic power.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: .....But are you sure we can do this? We might get into trouble if we get caught...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: This is just a way to take back what you really deserve.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Don’t you think it’s unfair?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You're the one out in the field hunting for the witches, but our 1st Commander just pays visit to the temple ruins...

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: ..... You're right.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Yes. I deserve to be the highest commander, not him.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: After this mission, Pope will finally see who is more suitable to be the 1st commander.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: After all, this is all for the Pope! Kekeke!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You are absolutely right, sir.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Robin... So this is who you really are?)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (...but you're wrong...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (I hate lizards. Because I’ve been eating them for 10 years!)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha, I see you still make that face when you're embarrassed. You haven't changed a bit!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... I didn’t get embarrassed! I really didn't miss you or anything!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But anyway, how have you been? Are you okay?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I've been eating lizards in the cave for 10 years.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: What?? Didn't you hate lizards cause they look creepy? But you ate them??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah. That should tell you how my past 10 years have been.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Shut up!! You don't have the right to talk to me like this!!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Shut up.

Item.name: berto
Item.talkText: Grrrrhh........ You... bastard.....

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Please use the authentic copy. Please...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: So much effort has been put into creating this world.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... It’s Lord Aramute's diary.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aimhard!!

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: - Back to Everyday Life -

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Nothing changed here.

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's amazing how this hideout never got discovered... Except that one time when I ran into Robin.

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If Robin and I didn't make this hideout...

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I probably would have got caught because I had nowhere else to go.

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: To survive that long this close to the Pope's castle...

Item.motherEventName: 엔딩 이후 아지트에서 첫 대사 이벤트
Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s almost unbelievable.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Oh, hello! What a great weather, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It feels weird that I can talk to you guys now. It’s still a little awkward...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: We're sorry about before. We were just doing what we were told...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... I don’t think so. I think you guys were really passionate about hunting me down.

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: Eeek... it's a misunderstanding!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A misunderstanding? Didn’t you get all excited when you guys surrounded me over here?

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: T... That was that guy over there!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: Ehhh?? I swear it wasn't me!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: It probably was the guard over at the other entrance of the village!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can't really tell because I can't see your faces...

Item.name: warrior-1
Item.talkText: It’s been so much better ever since the witch hunt is over. We're just watching for bandits these days.

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: How are you? Luna!

Item.name: warrior-2
Item.talkText: I promise I wasn't the one trying to get you! I swear!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, the entrance to the abandoned mine is open.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if it was from that time when Jude caused the earthquake.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... This incredible amount of Dark Magic Stone!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Seeing that there are bars... I can tell humans have passed through here before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if they were trying to take that thing, but gave up because they couldn't move it...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I see, it was because of that guy...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The Pope probably wanted to collect as much Dark Magic Stones as possible... To leave all these behind would have been a shame.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... It’s a good thing the entrance is pretty narrow.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It would have caused some pretty serious problem if these ever made their way out of here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm.... This place is full of dark magic energy, and there’s even a Dark Warrior here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gold...? Do Dark Warriors carry around gold these days?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Or... Maybe it hasn't been long since he became a Dark Warrior...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... You.... You're different from other Dark Warriors.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Dark Warriors normally radiate unstable, evil energy, but you...?

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: ........ You're a witch.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Has the entrance opened...? Finally... I can be of use to the Pope.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A Dark Warrior who can speak!? What's happening?

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: ..... Yes. I guess I should be called a Dark Warrior now.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: But witch, I’m fine as long as I can punish you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop calling me a witch, will you?? I’m not a witch! Not anymore...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ughhh.... What are you doing!!

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Dark Magic Stone absorbs soul from people...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: If you know how, you can even make it absorb power from demons like you.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: .... Good. It is done.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: For the Pope... And for the sake of all the warriors who had to sacrifice themselves, I will punish you!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Booo.. It feels like that time when Jude absorbed the power from my moonstone!!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... I didn’t expect to get my power sucked out.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If Pope ever summoned this Dark Warrior during the last battle, it could have been devastating.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: During the last battle?? What are you talking about!?

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I will punish you... and get out of here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You probably don't know because you were locked in here all these time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The Pope is dead. And there are no “witches” anymore.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: T... That’s a lie!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey, calm down.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The Pope teamed up with a corrupt deity and tried to cause another war, using the Dark Warriors.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: All because he wanted to become the King of the entire Vavelian Continent.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were just being used.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Shut up! Do you think I’ll believe that?

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Filthy witch! I will destroy you with my own hands!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Stop it.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: J... Justice!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Do they know each other?)

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: How come you're here...?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I have been investigating what Pope has done.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Including who were with the pope, and the places he had hidden the Dark Magic Stones.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: This abandoned mine is one of those places.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Livya. Didn’t you tell me you were leaving for a secret mission?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: You were surprisingly close to us.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Justice...! I just participated in the experiments because I had orders from the Pope!

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Don’t... Please don’t misunderstand this!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Dark warriors were the Pope's private army to get the war started.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: And witch hunts were just a way to eliminate any potential obstacles for Pope’s plan.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: W.. What?!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Crown, the best warrior in the Royal Palace. Along with him, the Pope greeded over the place of the King of Vavelia.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Is that... true?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: By the way, this deity over here is the hero that saved Vavelia village from him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I kept telling you I’m not a witch, but you didn’t believe me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you suddenly get it when Justice says it??

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Huh...? Yeah?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Did you want power, just like him?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I’m disappointed. I thought you and I had something in common...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I’m not like that!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Then how are you going to explain what you are now?

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I... I just...!

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I wanted to sacrifice myself for the good cause!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Good cause?

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I heard the Pope himself promised promotion for the warriors to participate in those experiences...

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: He did the same to you, didn’t he?

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: No! It’s really not like that...!

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: You gotta believe me! I really didn’t even want anything like that!

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I’m... You know me!

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: When we first became palace warriors, we made a promise to each other so we would only walk in the righteous path!!

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: .... But why...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: Sob..... Sob...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I truly believed that the Pope had good intentions...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: That if we wanted to fight off the witches... We need a strong warrior...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: And he told me no more warriors will have to be sacrificed once the experiments are over.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: And... Every time I laid my eyes on fellow warriors who got turned into Dark Warriors...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: I thought I don't want you to let you become like them.

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: But I knew if I refused ... the Pope was going to ask you...

Item.name: rivia
Item.talkText: So that's why...

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Livya. I’m sorry, but I think I will have to kill you because you are now a Dark Warrior.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: At least I’ll make sure you die without pain.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop it. She doesn’t seem that bad.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She just said she became the Dark Warrior instead of you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You were pretty loyal to the Pope, remember?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If he turned it down, you would be in his shoes right now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't worry. She’s different from other Dark Warriors.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She still has conscience, unlike the others.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And besides......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: that battle just now exhausted all the magic power, so she's probably...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You should say goodbye to your buddy. I’ll give you some space.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How was the farewell? You could have been nicer to her, you know.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: She was a good friend...

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I was foolish.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: The Pope's greed... caused too much sacrifices.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: There should never be any sacrifices like this anymore...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... I also hesitated when Robin became a Dark Warrior.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I know how Justice feels.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... I had no right to stop Justice.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I......... After all, I attacked Robin when he became a Dark Warrior.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Justice, I understand... how difficult it was.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We should never let anything like that happen again.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The Monster of the Ruth Falls...!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Haaah... That was the strongest thing I’ve ever met in the ocean.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But still, I got a mysterious scale. I wonder if the merchants will be interested in this!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: sigh... But I might get sucked into the center of that fall if I stayed here long.

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Oh, it's her...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Now I don't need to worry about the cannons.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey! I still can't get past over there?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: Ah.... You see, past here is Manil Island where the King is!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: We don't really mean to harm you, but this is our job..!

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: I hope you understand!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sigh... I guess there’s no other way.

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: This also is a trade route, so you need to comply with us!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: It’s been a long time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How have you been? I can tell you look better. You always looked so depressing before...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: It's definitely better. Now that I don't get beaten up by you guys, or get my pocket money taken...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Warrior really wasn’t your thing.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So, what are you doing these days?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: As you can see, I’m farming. And helping Mom...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa~ You're being a good son now!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’ve got a long way to go. Considering how much gold I’ve used up so far...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...? What’s wrong?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: There is one thing that I can't do on my own... Could you do me a favor?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Tell me. I did take your gold before, so... I guess I could do you a favor or two!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Recently, a witch appeared and started kidnapped people.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Witch? There are no more witches!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I am referring to a real witch. They say she collects the people's souls.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: They also say that she is very strong, but I have a feeling that you can beat her.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You managed to persuade me from being a warrior, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Alright! Leave it to me!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Thank you. The witch is inside the cave in the Lalaque Forest. You should be able to find it near the Lalaque Berries.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: The witch can be found inside the cave in the Lalaque Forest.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Even the palace warriors were sent to defeat that witch, but even they failed.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Fortunately, they were able to get rid of her with someone's help, but she came back.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Little bit of Dark Magic Stone...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And the cave full of bizarre energy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Come out!!

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: .... Thanks... Thanks for calling me....

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: You.... you're someone that... wants me.... aren’t you...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you talking about? I came here to get rid of you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you kidnap people? I’ll make you stop.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re not dead? I’m pretty sure that was a strong blow...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll do it right this time!

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Heh heh... There's no use...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: I’m a spirit... and I'm not afraid of that....

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Even though you.... made me lose my collection of souls...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: It's okay... I can always get them back...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (.......What should I do.. Come to think of it, her body doesn't seem real either...)

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Wait. Black Witch.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Kate is my friend.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey...! It’s dangerous! It’s not over yet!!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Long time no see, Kate.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You could have taken my soul, if you were that lonely. Here,

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: ..... No...... I don’t want your soul ..... No......

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I see... After all these years, even after your death... You still refuse me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Do you guys know each other?

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Yes. Kate was another kid in my village that was bullied all the time, like me.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Since we were in similar situation, I tried to take care of her...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But being with me made people bully her even more, so she did not really like my favor.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: In the end, she killed herself from loneliness.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But I had no idea she would be collecting people's souls like this....

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: ....... I guess you were lonely even after death.

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Grr... I hate you.... Go away.... I......... I’m different from you...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Yes. You were different from me.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: At least you... had someone who cared for you.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: And still... I want to help you when I look at your face.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... She called his name!)

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Finally, you're calling me by my name.

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: ...... Only if... you were... a little taller...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: .... Only if... you weren’t so dumb...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m sorry that I’m stupid.

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: If then...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: I.... I could have... been closer to you...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: I was afraid... of how... people will think of me...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: That's why... I avoided you...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: You don't have to do that anymore. There’s no one here to judge you.

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: ...... Right... This place.... there’s nobody to judge...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Yes. I’m the only one here.

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: It's fine now... Go....

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Are you still avoiding me?

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: I..... didn't want to... absorb you.....

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: ..... I knew... you were my friend...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: And that I don't have to trap you inside me...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Thank you. I......... I thought you really hated me!

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: But you were just afraid of other people.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: It wasn't a big deal!

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: I’m sorry... that I kept pushing you away... all these time...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: ...... Still... so dumb...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: Now I have... no regrets...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: One friend...

Item.name: kate
Item.talkText: ..... is enough...

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Thank you. Black Witch. It’s all thanks to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... Nah. I couldn't have done that by myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This time, you saved the day.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... That was cooler than a warrior. Heh.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Then maybe I could be a warrior again....

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Nope. I didn't say that.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: I’m really happy. I really am happy.

Item.name: alfredo
Item.talkText: Thank you. Black Witch. It seems like you always help me out.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Oh, what is a deity like yourself doing in this countryside...?

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Sigh... My back hurts!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Oh! It’s the big sister with dark skin!!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Oh! It’s the big sister with white hair!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Oh! It's the bib sister with rabbit ears!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The era of the gods is back, as we hoped it would. Congratulations.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Thanks to you, the village became a much better place to live in.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: And the warriors are being actually helpful to the village, now that they don’t do witch hunts anymore.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The warriors even get rid of the wild dogs for us, these days!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Oh~~ What a pretty deity girl!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s Pieberry!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don't know who drew this, but she looks really cute! I’m jealous....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, that’s me!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... So pretty..... Ehehe!!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s the Ice Witch costume! I kind of liked that dress...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Awww... Pieberry looks so cute!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... I think I saw Pieberry when she was around 2 years old.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I want to pat her hair...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... This picture... We looks so friendly here. Heh.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... I want those plushies...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is when I went to swim on the West Shore with Pieberry...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... I guess I could let Robin see this picture, too...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whoa... It’s really colorful.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How can people draw this well?

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: This is an exhibition room. Many artists have drawn pictures of the heroes who saved our village.

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: The underground dungeon is still being recovered.

Item.name: warrior
Item.talkText: This is where most of the Dark Warriors were kept... and there are some still left in there, so reconstruction is tricky.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Oh? Aren't you the friend of Lucia? Luna, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hello, ma’am! I’m Luna!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: How pretty you are!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You look really busy.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Yes. Jude killed a lot of people, so there are a lot of prayers to bring those people back to life.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: But bringing someone back to life requires a lot of magic power, so we can't bring all the people back.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: That’s why I’m looking at each of these prayers and deciding how to answer them.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Sigh..... This is going to take me a while...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... I’m sorry for interrupting you when you're so busy!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: No worries, it's still great to see you!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: How are you with Lucia?

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Lucia told me all about how Luna really likes her.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: .........Eh? What’s wrong?

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: ....Don't you like Lucia?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: O... Of course I like her!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Oh... So you do like her!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Oh, Luna. Speaking of which, would you like to take the test of the Mirror Room?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Test of the Mirror Room?

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Yes~ It’s where you get to fight with yourself. Lucia already passed it~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Fight with myself? Do I meditate in there?

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: You’ll know once you get there~

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: I left the portal to the Mirror Room open on the translocation device. Feel free to use it anytime~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... Yes! I’ll take the test, too!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: I left the portal to the Mirror Room open on the translocation device.

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Feel free to use that room if you want to fight against yourself. I’m sure it will help you grow into a better person!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There’s a whole new space in here!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....It’s amazing. A secret room with no passageway!

Item.name: nLu
Item.talkText: .... Who are you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eek..!! What are you?!

Item.name: nLu
Item.talkText: What are you talking about!! That's what I was going to ask you!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (She could have given me a heads up... It scared me.)

Item.name: nLu
Item.talkText: Oh, I get it.

Item.name: nLu
Item.talkText: I can pass Lord Elysion's test by defeating you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ehhh? Fake me is treating me as if I’m fake!

Item.name: nLu
Item.talkText: Of course a fake me is going to be treated like you’re fake! Stop pretending to be real!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: B...Booo...... And you're even copying what I say... You're creepy!

Item.name: nLu
Item.talkText: So do you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff...... huff.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whew! It’s an improvement!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: Congratulations, you passed the test. I knew a friend of my daughter could do this!

Item.name: eliy
Item.talkText: How was it? Don't you feel much stronger?

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: It’s you, Luna.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hello, Lord Durok!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is the first time that I’m actually meeting you in person!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How are you these days? A lot of your magic power was used to rebuild the destroyed village.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: sigh... There is a lot of reconstruction ahead, and a lot of work to catch up on.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: It’s endless.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Erm.... Where is Michelle?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She said she wants to be your secretary, but she’s never around when you actually need her!

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Ha. I never really expect her to be helpful.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: She’ll be back once I’m done with all my work. Asking me if there's anything to help with...

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I really envy Aimhard at times like these.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: He doesn’t do anything.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Urr... Erm.... Ha ha...

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Of course Aimhard keeps the magic power flowing to maintain the barriers... But it's not a difficult job.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: That's why he sits still and jokes around all day.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I think he got better at his jokes because he was so bored.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: And unlike other gods, he’s going to be awfully glad to see any visitors.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: If a god is busy like me, there is no time to joke around.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Durok, it seems like you talk a lot when it's about Lord Aimhard!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re normally so quiet...

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Ugh... Hmm.... Why would you say that I talk about him a lot..

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Anyways, temple lords need to be exemplary to the humans.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I hope you don't get lazy like him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! I’m training hard~

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Do you want to fight Temar, by chance?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Y.. You must be kidding... Temar is really strong!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He’s the strongest among all the dragons...!

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Nah. He didn’t keep himself in shape, and he became weaker than Jude.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: You know, right? Jude got him with a single blow.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Temar is a lot weaker now than what he used to be... So I think you could challenge him if you want to.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I left the portal to the Temar’s Room open on the translocation device. Feel free to challenge him anytime.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Temar is a lot weaker now than what he used to be. I think this could be a good time for you to challenge him.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I left the portal to the Temar’s Room open on the translocation device. Feel free to challenge him anytime.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow... It's a really huge... space..... Eh?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Hmm....? How did you get inside this room?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Gasp... He's too large.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Durok sent me here to challenge you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He said you're a lot weaker than what you used to be.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Grrr... Even so, sending me a little girl like this...

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: I know I let Jude get me, but this is too much...

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Honestly, I didn’t do much because I didn't want to damage the village further.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: If I really fought seriously, I was going to be able to buy more time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So you're admitting that you're weaker than Jude, huh? Not saying that you could have beat him.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Well.. He did swallow a ton of Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: That kind of power wasn't achieved by training.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But Lord Durok told me that ‘Temar didn't keep himself in shape’, either...

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Grrr... No matter how weak I am, I’m not going to let a little girl defeat me.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Come. I’ll fight you.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Guh...? This doesn’t make sense...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Whew... I really won?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: I guess it wasn't a coincidence that you defeated Jude while he was in his human form...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Of course! I trained really hard!

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Sigh..... This is disgraceful.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Lord Durok is going to scold me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Scolding from Lord Durok...?

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: ..... He’s not that quiet.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: He acts like he is, only in front of other people.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: But thank you. I think I can use this as an excuse to take a 100-year nap.

Item.name: temar
Item.talkText: Besides, my wounds from Jude still need to be healed.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... Right.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you for accepting my challenge even though you're sick!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hope you get some rest~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .....He’s already sleeping.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Temar lost to you, eh?

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: And he's asleep now?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ha ha... Y... you should understand him~ He is still wounded from fighting Jude, and...

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: You don’t have to tell me excuses for him.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Besides, you’re really great.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: What you can do is beyond what a half-blooded deity can do.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: This is not what I expected, but you deserve a reward.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: I don’t have anything prepared, so... I’ll give you these gloves that I’ve been using.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: It will let you blow strong punches based on how much magic power and strength you have.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: Keep training.

Item.name: durok
Item.talkText: And don't take after Temar's example.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow, thank you~!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Oh ho~ Luna! Welcome!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hello~ You look great today! Did you have something good happen today?

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Haha, because I was bored!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: I’m so glad you came to visit me!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Sigh, this is awful. I really could use some fresh air around this continent...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why not? Do you have to stay in your temple all the time?

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: The Nightmare Seal area is dangerous, so I need to be at my spot.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Only if I was in charge of telekinesis like Durok, I would be able to get around more!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Ugh... I chose to keep the barriers because it sounded easy...

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: But I never thought it would be this boring.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Haha... Lord Durok is probably with Lord Aramute, rebuilding everything that Jude blew up.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute seemed pretty tired these days, too...

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Hah, that's a good thing!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: They’re just busy for now~

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Well, Aramute is always busy ‘cause he’s the Senior Temple Lord.

Item.name: aimhard
