Item.talkText: Durok is just busy when there's an accident or a disaster.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: I may look like I do nothing, but I get my magic power sucked out by the barriers every day.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Durok has it easy!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... I see... Haha.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Hm? I guess I talk fast when it's about Durok.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are you in bad terms with Lord Durok?

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: I don’t really like him because he is too full of himself,

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: but it's fun to watch him react whenever I say something.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: I’m just playing around~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I heard you're sad that Lord Durok doesn't play along your jokes...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry told me..

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Huh? I’m a god. A god!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: I’d never be sad over something like that!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Ah.... I told Pieberry exactly the same thing, but I guess it's not working.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: But honestly, Durok is the only temple Lord that plays along my jokes.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Aramute is always so busy so I don’t want to bother him...

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Elysion is too modest...

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Arua is no fun.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: But Durok is different. Every time I mess with him, he always tries to get back at me. It’s so much fun to watch~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You really look like you're good friends!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Erm.... I’m not going to deny it, but it does sound a bit cheesy.

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Let’s just say we're not THAT close!

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Anyways, it's pretty awesome that I have two more companions to talk to now! Thanks!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Two more? Lord Durok, and....

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: Three total. Durok, you, and Lucia~

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: She laughs so much, and her reaction is the best!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: She does find humor in pretty much anything... I think you two will get along very well. Haha...

Item.name: aimhard
Item.talkText: You too, can come visit me anytime. I’d love to chat with you, Luna!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes~ I will!

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Oh... What brings you all the way here, Luna?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hello! Lord Arua!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Your temple is on a remote island, so it's a bit hard to come visit you often. Heh...

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Haha. I enjoy serenity...

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: And I always enjoy meditation and reading.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You are busy too, Lord Arua? It seems like everyone has been busy after Jude created that mess...

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: I control miracles of weather and nature, so it's not much different for me.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Since weather change constantly happens...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why did Jude want to become a temple lord, when all of you have to work so hard?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t think Jude is someone who enjoys giving and helping.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: That’s not true. I know you probably remember Jude as when he revealed himself,

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: but for several hundreds of years, he was a really good secretary.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Everyone could feel how much he wanted to grant miracles.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh...? Then what made him change so much?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And why did he never become a temple lord when he had been such a great secretary for so long?

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Like I said, his heart was true when it came to granting miracles.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: But a true heart doesn’t always mean it's the right thing to do.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: It seemed like it was for the others,

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: but for Jude, it was really for himself.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: He wanted to gain respect and loyalty from people by granting miracles.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: And Aramute could see right through him.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: If Jude ever became a temple lord, he would have govern the humans pretty well,

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: but in the center of it, it’s always going to be about himself.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Aramute foresaw that Jude could change any time.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: And he eventually did kill a lot of people and caused troubles.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Just because of he couldn’t become a temple lord.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Luna, if you ever find yourself in a position where you lead others...

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: Look closely to see what people are really like in the inside, and not just the outside.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: By outside, I don't mean their appearance...

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: but their personality, dignity, and such.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s a bit difficult...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you used Jude as an example, so I think I kind of get it.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: If you live on for a few hundreds of years, I promise you’ll eventually have the eyes to see people's nature.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: And what’s more important is that you should have the eyes to see our own core

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: before looking at someone else’s core.

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: I believe you can do it, Luna.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! Thank you!

Item.name: arua
Item.talkText: I wouldn't say that Jude changed. Rather, it's his core nature that was revealed.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh! Luna~~!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You came to see me 'cause you missed me!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I was just wandering around and decided to drop by...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn’t actually know you would be home.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Why? Did you want to steal something, like the last time when you stole Lucca?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Hee hee, you're so cute when you’re embarrassed!!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m going to mess with you about this for a while.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wait, why are you still here? I thought you were living at the Elysion Temple?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Yeah. But I spent more than 10 years here...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’ll never forget about this place. I come back here whenever I remember.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And mom is so busy, and I don't want to bother her at the temple.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh, right. Luna.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: By the way, are you dating Robin?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah.... Yeah. It kind of just happened.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I knew it~ I knew it when you hugged him!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I could tell that you really really really really really like Robin!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. It’s not like that!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin bugged me so much, so I just accepted it.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And it wasn't just any hug. It was a super passionate hug!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Huh? But Michelle told me you call Robin’s name in your sleep...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... You probably heard wrong.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I never call anyone in my sleep.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Fine. Let’s just say that Robin said it first!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... Awkward.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: That’s not what’s important! What’s more important is that you guys like each other!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: By the way, where do you guys go for a date? How far have you gone? Did you guys hold hands?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... Hands, yeah.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Right? You even had that passionate hug, so hand-holding is nothing!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Did you guys kiss? Huh?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: No? Is it a bit too early for that?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Well. We’re still young, so that might be too far.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... Nuh huh. You’re the only young one here.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You really kissed? Really?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And it wasn’t a smooch on the cheek?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh. You don’t have to know, young one.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: How was it? How did it feel like? Could you feel your heart pounding?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And what about your eyes? Did you close them??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh. Like I said, young one. But Robin's lips were softer than I imagined.....

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Hee hee... So that’s how it was.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't you have anyone that you like?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Uhm.... You?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A boy, silly!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Well.. I don’t know anyone.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... Right. You weren't able to go inside the town until recently, so you probably don't know a lot of people.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Tell me about Robin again later!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. Look forward to the life lessons from a grownup like me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... I did something terrible to Robin, so I couldn’t accept his heart.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Why? You still look very close to each other!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well... It’s just... I’m hesitant.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ask him out! Ask him out!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I’m sure Robin is waiting, too!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: You like Robin!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Aren't you being too cautious?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Have some courage!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... I don't know.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Should I wait for him to ask me out again?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: No~ I don’t think that’s a good idea.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But you could make him ask you again!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Dress nicely, and say nice things to him... Hee hee.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Let me lure Robin for you!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: There’s a merchant called Ralph that’s selling pretty clothes~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I heard they’re super popular nowadays!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Come to the north hill wearing it!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And I’ll get you Robin!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ha... Haha...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Now I'm watching and helping mom.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: She said I’m going to be a temple lord one day, too.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I think I’m going to find it boring and annoying at the same time. Having to work...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: But it’s okay! There’s going to be a few hundred years later~

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: There is nothing much going on these days.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: We’re just guarding the village and defeating the remaining Dark Warriors.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: I would like to express my gratitude for finding us peace.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: ...Hee hee.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What. What’s with that reaction....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: D... don't tell me!?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You're.... really....?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: With that blond warrior!?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: It’s been a while~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: At first I thought he's really stiff...

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: but Justice is actually really cute when you get to know him!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Even the cheesy things he says... are kind of cure if you get used to it. Hee hee!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh my word... So that time when you guys were by yourselves in Lalaque forest...!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: I actually liked Justice from when I first saw him~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: He used to hate me so much,

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: but on the other hand, he would give me help along the way.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: And he also saved me from danger a couple of times.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: He has a surprisingly warm heart... and I like it!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. Even a stuck up person like that could have nice aspects, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I hope you guys are happy and everything.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Of course we are~

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Speaking of which, what do you like about Robin?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I don’t really like like him... that much...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but... I don't know. It just makes me feel better when he's near me, with that grin on his face.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And he's also kind of trustworthy.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eh? He didn't seem that reliable to me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe not his appearance...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but he was still the only one that was by my side when I was having a hard time. That's why I feel like I can trust him/

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Eeeh? “The only one”?? What about me??? I was always there for you, Luna!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you're a deity. He was the only human. Got it?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Ohhh~ I see.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Besides, Robin even risked his life to save me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Even though he’s pretty weak compared to me, I feel like I can really trust him.

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Tell me about Robin again later!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wonder if Robin is still on duty? He’s always on duty, so I can't spend time with him.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: The warriors are sent here and there to help reconstruct the village... So I guess there's no other way.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. Look forward to the life lessons from a grownup like me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Rude merchant! Hi there!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Oh, isn't this the hero who saved the Vavelia village!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You're still selling things here?

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I used to sell items for hunting or fighting here...

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: But since there is no more witch hunt, there is no need for those items anymore.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: All thanks to you, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Did you lose your job because of me?

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Heh. That’s why I switched to other trading items.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Nowadays I’m selling clothes made in Lalaque village to the people in Vavelia village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... That's great!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: But the stock is never enough, so I have to travel very often.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Again, all thanks to you! Probably.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Haha... Fine. I’m sorry.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Then buy some clothes.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: I have some clothes that my customer returned.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh... But selling clothes that were thrown away by someone else...

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Heh. No worries.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: These were returned because my customer decided she doesn’t like how they look.

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: This is just between me and you, but the customer couldn’t fit in these clothes... So they are still brand new. Never worn!

Item.name: ralf
Item.talkText: Just take a look.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Are you busy today? Are you the only warrior they got?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute and Lord Durok helped us recover the village and the collapsed castle...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But the underground waterway is still under construction.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That's why we only have the minimum amount of security to maintain peace.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You know. I’m still a rookie, so I have to guard... Haha.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh? Didn't you become a squad leader?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I thought you were guarding just because they don't have enough people!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Right. But I just decided to step down.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: After all, I got that promotion only because of Berto...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Right now, I’m starting over from scratch, from basic swordsmanship.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Captain Justice is teaching me himself! Haha!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Tell Lady Lucia that I said thank you. Because it was her who asked the captain...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ah... Pieberry asked, huh? I see.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But when do you get off duty?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m not sure.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Do you want to stay here and keep me company?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. I don’t really want to be in the middle of all these warriors over here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I don’t like the look of these armors!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Especially seeing you in that armor brings back bad memories!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah... Alright.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I promise I will stay with you when I get off duty.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ..... Th.. that too...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about training with Justice?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about the promotion exam?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I guess I’ll procrastinate...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What about the warriors’ meeting?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It's not that important.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How is work? Is it alright?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’m still a rookie, so it's alright.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What? Robin, weren't you a squad leader before?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I got that promotion by making Berto like me...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But I wanted to start over, properly!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ohhh..... I’m impressed.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ..... Luna.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Do you want to get some air sometime?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... Eh... Okay?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But... Aren’t you busy?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll make time. Night breeze will be nice too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don’t overwork yourself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's going to be alright when this is over.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can wait.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Don't your legs hurt from standing so long? Take it easy!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Go Robin!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha, taking it easy is my forte. Don't worry!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: W... whoa!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna. Is that a new dress?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah...! It was pretty cheap, so...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It was? Really?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: But It looks really expensive! It looks amazing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Really?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It’s stunning!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Maybe because you're wearing it.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: By the way, can you tell if something’s different?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Can you tell if something’s different?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: A lot has changed.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: The village is peaceful... and the miracles are granted just as they were before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........ I’m not talking about that.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..........I’ll give you a hint. A person.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Oh, yes!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: My superiors don’t bully me anymore.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I explained everything, and they understood me.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: In fact, they’re really nice to me these days!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... Alright. Cake care.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Huh? You’re leaving already?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sounds like you're really busy, so I won’t bother you anymore.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Come on~ What's wrong? Did something happen?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No. I just don’t feel good.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You’re so cute even when you’re upset!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Even wearing this pretty dress.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Gasp!! What are you doing! You’re still at work!)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (Why? I gave you a hug on the Vavelie Road before, too.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Can’t you see Justice is standing right there??)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (No, I can’t.)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (All I can see now is you.)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (You're the one who’s too beautiful to resist!)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (I can’t stand it, you’re so lovely.)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (Kyaa! Stop being so cheesy!!)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (Haha. You would stop me if you really don't like it. You're stronger than I am...)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (That's because I was overwhelmed by how cheesy it is!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (......Why are you laughing...)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Because you're adorable even when you're angry!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I think i could live with this... For the rest of my life.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I might have to stop getting upset id I wanted to stop you from saying those cheesy lines.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (...Eeek! Was that too loud?)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (......N... Nah. He probably didn’t hear it.)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (....... Captain Justice?)

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: ..... Please try to refrain from public display of affection while on duty.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eek! I think he heard the whole thing!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: S... Sir, I’ll make sure I stick to work!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: (I’m sticking to work!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (...Way to go, Robin!)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I was being too careful...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Robin probably had to gather up the courage to ask me...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe I was the selfish one.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I even bought pretty clothes...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I wish I could spend some alone time with Robin...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: .... Luna?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Urr... How did you come here?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Aren’t you supposed to be at work during the day...?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ah... w... well...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It seems like Lady Lucia asked Captain Justice...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: to excuse me from duty...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And she made me change into my normal clothes...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: and summoned me here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: W... was she following me around...??

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry...?? How did she know I was here...?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Lady Lucia’s servant let her know. You know, that black bird.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: (....... She didn't have to.....)

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Urr... Urm.....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But I guess I should still be thankful for Pirberry. To be able to relax like this... Right?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Yeah... I should thank Lady Lucia.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Would you like to sit down with me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Y... Yeah!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Were you taking a walk here?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There's a lot of memories here...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You’re right. There are so many memories here.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Remember that time... when you were trying to pick the vanilla flower and fell from here?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: You fell upside down, but you didn't even get hurt. Haha....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well.. That’s because I’m strong!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I actually fell from here even after that.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That running leaf... it was a pain to catch.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I came here right after I escaped the village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Because I couldn’t think of anywhere to go... So I just came here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I jumped from here to avoid the warriors!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ..... You really rent through a lot of trouble. Really..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That's not all~

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ....Huh? But running leaves are useless for deities like you... Aren’t they?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Why did you dive to catch it?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I dived from here to catch that little guy!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: T.... That’s because...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Haha. You were going to give it to me, right?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Thank you~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...I was really going to give it to you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It was a pain to get here all the way from the Icy Field.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I had to make a huge detour to get here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ........ To get it for you...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: .... Th... Thank you...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: So there were memories that I didn’t even know about...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And it was for me... I’m really grateful!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Yes. There are many memories here.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This is also where you asked me out.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Sigh..... It’s embarrassing...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Hey. I really had to gather up all my courage to tell you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It wasn’t easy for me, you know!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My heart really pounded hard at first.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But now that I’ve thought about it over and over... It's not as bad as before.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: That means we are just going to be friends, right?

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: .......I was hoping... for a little bit .....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Ha ha... Ha ha ha....

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Well, still!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: It’s not a bad thing, since we can still be good friends!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... You dummy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I said It's not as bad as before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I never said I’m not nervous.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: My heart is still beating fast.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I like you, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I’m sorry.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m sorry to keep you waiting...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I still can’t forgive myself for attacking you at the Pope's castle...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Don’t bring up bad memories that I don’t even remember.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And what you just said... Could you say that again?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... I’m not going to say it twice.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I’ll get you to say it twice.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I really like you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Whenever I see you...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: And whenever I’m next to you like this, I get really happy.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: What do you think about me?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ..... Hey. You heard me the first time. Why...

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I really like you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Then I’ll say it twice, too.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: ..... What about you?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... Ugh... It’s like you were waiting for this...!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: .... Yes. You’re right.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I was waiting for this.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: I really was waiting for this, for a long time.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...Do I really have to say it?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ...... I like you, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... Why? I said it!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: .... I’m really happy.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: .....Thank you.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Luna and Robin spent some quality time together.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Until Pieberry force summoned Robin because of Justice.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: B...Booo...... Pieberry.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: If you were really going to help, couldn't you at least give us some more time?!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: We were just about to kiss!

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Nothing out of the ordinary on duty.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Everything out of the ordinary in my heart.

Item.name: robin
Item.talkText: Missing Luna every second.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Just focus on duty~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Lord Aramute~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You must be realllllly busy these days.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: sigh... I have a light headache.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: It was more comfortable during when I was sealed.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I was not confined in a body then.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But it's odd. Did you know everything from the beginning and let the humans kill you?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Something like this is constantly repeated over thousands of years.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Even if we give the humans guidance as gods...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Humans always want to fill their needs, while simply submitting to us.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: It is our way to keep showing them, so they might come to realize it one day.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Being a god sounds like an uncomfortable position to be in. Especially when you can live however you want. You could wipe out all the humans if you wanted to...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Luna. Like you said, we're living as how we want to.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Wiping out the humans could be a choice,

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: but watching over them and guiding them to the right path is another choice that we made.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Maybe it’s bit rude to say this....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But it kind of sounds like you're just enjoying this world as it’s staged according to the scenarios created by you.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I won't say you're wrong. The world does work how we intend it to work.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And this is the proof that we're living as how we want to, like what you said earlier.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: There are a lot of resentments, too. Why did you leave Jude like that when you knew what’s going to happen...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: In a way, I kind of feel bad for Jude.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: There is no perfect way.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And whichever way we go, there are going to be complaints.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eh... Aren’t you perfect?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: What do you think is being perfect, Luna?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: A world where humans don't have any complaints... And there’s no crimes... Something like that, I guess.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: If there is no complaints, it means that it is perfect. Right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Uhm.... Something... like that... I guess?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: You know that this world is finite, yes?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And human desires and pursuits are endless.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hm.... So you’re saying that in this finite world, it is impossible to fill the humans’ infinite greed... Right?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Yes. Even if a fuller, better world comes around...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Humans will want something even bigger and better.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Because humans are imperfect beings that is going to feel empty no matter how full they are.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry is lucky....

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Haha, why? Because Pieberry is a full-blooded deity?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: What if you’re perfect, or if you're imperfect?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Luna. You're worried because you know there's also human blood flowing in your veins.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: But because of that imperfection, it is important to find something with which you can fill yourself with.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: But before that...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: You must be able to embrace your imperfect self.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Only then, you will be able to embrace others.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Jude refused to embrace his own imperfectness.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: That’s why he couldn’t embrace many other imperfect beings...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And then he sacrificed a lot of people to fill his own void.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Luna. You’re going to be different.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Luna. All the hard time that you went through...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: You gracefully accepted where you were, and grew taller and stronger day by day.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Y.... you were watching me back then?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Of course. I’ve always rooted for you.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: And of course, I knew you would do so well.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I really want to improve myself!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Not just the magic power, but my mind as well!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: That's the spirit.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: If you need training, feel free to come visit the training room.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I left the portal to the Training Room open on the translocation device.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh heh!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Yes. You’re still young, but you're going to be a temple lord one day...

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: So you should continue to train yourself so that you can control the spring.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What kind of training is it? Meditation?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I will be your opponent. There is no better practice than actual combat.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eek...! How could I...!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: The purpose of the training is not to win, so don't worry.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I just want you to reach a certain level.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! I see!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m here!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Good. Shall we start?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huff... Huff......

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: This was too much... Power like this....

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And you didn’t even sweat?

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: But you passed the test.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Chrios Gown. I ordered this specially for you, a future temple lord.

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: I will be rooting for you so you can keep polishing yourself with the kind of good attitude that you have now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thank you!!

Item.name: aramute
Item.talkText: Then I’ll be going back to work...

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Huh...? A witch?

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: But.... there is a rumor that the witch saved the village....

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: If that black dragon completely destroyed the village...

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: We could have looted during the chaos.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: You’re right.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Then, should we attack?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: .... Idiot. That witch killed the dragon.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: I mean, it could just be a rumor.

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: I don't wanna waste fire. What are you going to do with her?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Does she even have any money?

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: She is the hero who saved the village.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: I heard a rumor saying that the princess of Vavelia gave her tons of precious jewels and money...

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Hey! Aim the cannon! Catch her before she disappears!

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Captain!! The ship...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You cheaters only rob weak fishermen because you can’t do anything about the Vavelian navy...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m glad I could sweep them.

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Ugh.. How are we going to move all these?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: #@%!! All of our crew have been scattered because of that witch!

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Can’t we just leave them here...?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Idiot! We can't go back to pirating if we don't buy a ship! To buy a ship, we need gold!

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: ..... Did you go insane? Don’t laugh like that.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Why don’t we bring someone here to sell us a ship?

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: How’s that? Isn't that genius?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Are you saying that there is a sane merchant who is going to come all the way into this strange cave, just to sell a ship?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: When it’s obvious that we could kill him after we get the ship, right?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: And besides, this is our secret warehouse.

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Are you seriously going to bring a stranger in here? Are you out of your mind?

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Oh.. Captain, you’re so smart!

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: It’s you who's stupid.

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: And get him to park the ship right outside!

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: When we finish the deal, we can go straight to the ship and continue pirating...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Who wants help?

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Kyaaaaa!! How did you get here!!?

Item.name: shipPerson
Item.talkText: Run... We should run away...

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: No! Protect these chests!! protect them with your life!!

Item.name: lina
Item.talkText: Without these, we can't go back to pirating!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... So this is your treasure house?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And if I raided this place, you can't pirate anymore.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You came back to reflect on the memories?

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: There were memories, and there also were nightmares.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to make you think about the bad memories.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: It’s okay. Even though it was heartbreaking mistake...

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: It also becomes something that I can really hold onto for many years.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Something that will help me get through the temptation, if it ever comes back.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's amazing!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think your experiences are also helping me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. Sometimes, the mistakes that you make become a good reference for the others.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Just like the Pope and Jude.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: But I’m sure my Luna will become an amazing temple lord, unlike me.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh~ stop it, it's embarrassing!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I’m saying that because...! Aramute seems to favor you. Hohoho!

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: Aramute has the power of prophecy, too.

Item.name: rudina
Item.talkText: I should ask him to take a good care of you.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... It's okay, mom...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hey... Why do you keep coming to my house?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Luna... Lunaaaa.....

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I got kicked out by Lord Durok...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I don't have anywhere else to go... What should I do...?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Huh. It’s honestly none of my business,

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: but if you really don’t have anywhere to go, I can let you sleep in the hideout on Mt. Kentz.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Eeek..! But it's so dark and damp in there!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why not? I lived in there for 10 years.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Michelle... Get it together, already.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Hey! How could you be so cold?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Says the one who sold me out.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Ugh... You're still upset about that?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmph. You never apologized to me for that. So...

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I’m so sorry.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: So can I live here now?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: .... Sigh... Right. You never change.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It feels even worse that I forced that apology out of you.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Ehehe~ I really regretted doing that, though. Even Pieberry knows.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It doesn’t feel sincere because you're smiling!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I give up. On a second thought, I don’t think I’d really buy it even if you were crying.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll kick you out if you don't keep my house clean.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You should clean the house once in the morning and once in the evening, okay?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: That's no problem~

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And don't forget to do the laundry. I really don’t like to see smelly laundry piled up.

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: Ugh...! I’m in charge of the laundry, too?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: I can’t touch other people's underwear, ‘cause it's dirty!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: ....... Would you prefer the cave?

Item.name: mishel
Item.talkText: ....... I will do as you command, ma’am.

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Ugh.. I’ve become a slave...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hi there!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I’m busy. Keep it simple and short.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What? What do you do?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: I’m the secretary of Lord Elysion. I’m a busy busy secretary who doesn't have the time to speak to you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Rather than a secretary... you seem more like a servant who does chores...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Eeek! Those chores are important!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: It is my job to assist Lord Elysion!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Ahem! Of course. I am the secretary of the Third Temple Lord!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Didn’t you say you were busy? How come you’re just hanging out with me? Huh?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Can’t you tell that I’m really focusing on Lord Elysion’s every move?

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: There might not be anything to do now... But if she looks thirsty, I’m immediately going to fly and get water for her.

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Or if she looks stressed, I’m here as her stress ball...

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Or if she's tired, she can use my body as a pillow.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’m impressed.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Any temple lord will love to have a secretary like you!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh...! You!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: .... Long time no see.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: The hero of the village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You.. You seem happier than before. Did something good happened to you?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Uhm.... Well..

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Nothing much, other than passing the palace warrior exam.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow~~ so you did it!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I emptied my mind, and it worked.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: It's funny, because I kept failing back when I was really obsessed.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But you're not wearing the uniform yet? When do you start?

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Sooner or later.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: They only have a few places for female warriors, so I have been on standby for a while...

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: But it sounds like a female captain went missing, so they’re looking for a new female captain.

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: I’m glad there's a spot open,

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: but at the same time I feel like I shouldn’t be so happy.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s unfortunate... But you should do your best on behalf of the missing person.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I believe you're going to do a good job. You have the talent!

Item.name: alflady
Item.talkText: Huhu... Thanks.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You’re probably the only commoner who dares to call me by my name.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Normally people bow down to me when they get the honor of having me as a guest.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well, I’m not a human. Let's say I’m an exception.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Hm, how rude! I would do anything to make you obey me!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: But I guess it’s not going to be easy.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I can’t buy you with gold...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You're a deity so you don’t obey me...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I’ve made up my mind.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: If you are not going to obey me...

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I demand you to be my friend!!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Ugh... Why aren't you answering?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: What are you talking about? We’re already friends.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Ugh... Huh? But I never gave you permission to be my friend...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: That’s not how friendship works...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’ve never had friends, right?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I... It’s not that! I just never gave anyone permission to be my friend!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Who would dare to become friends with the princess of Vavelia?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: You’re a special case!

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I’m letting you be my friend because you saved the village...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yeah, sure... Thanks, your highness?

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: Ugh, that tone...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Heh. Come visit me if you're bored.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ll show you around the village and the Kentz Mountain.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: You’re a princess, after all. You should know everything about every corner of this continent, right?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And to see how your people are living.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: ..... Oh. That's a great idea.

Item.name: noor
Item.talkText: I’ll come by often, to see my people.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes~ Any time!

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Oh. The hero who saved the village.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop it~ It’s embarrassing...

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: Come back here when you become a temple lord in the future.

Item.name: goldNuke
Item.talkText: By that time I’ll probably have retired, but there's going to be a new Nuke that you could use as your secretary.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ha ha... It’s going to take at least a few hundred years from now...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It feels like a dream.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn’t think I could ever come back to this house...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Oh, look who's here!

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Isn't this the witch who saved Vavelia?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Stop calling me a witch, will you...?

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: Well, that’s what we're used to calling you. And besides...

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: You might be a hero inside the village... But to us, you're still the witch.

Item.name: blackMerchantBoss
Item.talkText: And thanks to you... We lost our valued customer, Pope.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Well well, too bad!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Oh~ It’s Miss Luna!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Hey~ Luna!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Burp... I think I’m drunk...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Burp.. Stop drinking so much...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Whoa~ It’s the big sister with dark skin!!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: How are you doing?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh... Uncle Ruba...?

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: Oh... It’s you, Luna...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: How are you doing? I’m so sorry about before...

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: No... You don’t have to apologize to me!

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: I was blinded, thinking only about the promotion...!

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: Luna... I’m really sorry.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: No! I’m not that proud of what I did to you, either.

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: I have really hit the rock bottom when life was difficult.

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: I always wanted to stay as the friendly uncle at the tool shop.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I’ve gone through changes, too.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: But it's okay. We're back now.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And we no longer have to try to kill each other. Right?

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: Haha... Yes. I’ve learned my lesson.

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: Oh, and... I almost forgot to thank you, since I had so much to apologize to you about.

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: Thank you. Luna.

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: You probably had a really tough time because of us... But in the end you saved us.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I didn't do it by myself.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I had friends who helped me. Without them, I wouldn’t have come this far!

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: I’m really proud of you.

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: You were such a shy girl before...

Item.name: rubaNormal
Item.talkText: Is that thanks to your friends, too?

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Where’z da booze...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I keep cleaning, but there's no end to this!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Where's my love...

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Muffle muffle....

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Miss Luna~ What a great weather!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: It’s beautiful, isn't it...?

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Kyaa~ It’s Luna!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Deities are always welcome!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: Miss deity! Nice to meet you!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: The giant is back!!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Hey! Shoot now!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Let’s test out the new bomb we just invented!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: W... What is this!!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: #@%!! It's still a prototype, and the aim is off!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Why..... Why are you attacking me so suddenly!?

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: .........Hmph! No giants can be trusted! Give us back the Angel’s Eye you stole from us!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Give us back the Angel’s Eye!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Here!! We’ll make sure it hits this time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's... wait! I brought you the Angel’s Eye!!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Wh... What!? You brought the Angel's Eye?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Here, I found it from the Bandits’ hideout. This is it, right?

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Whoa.....!! Our blessing has returned to our village!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sigh..... What a relief. I could have died from that cannon fire...

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Th... Thank you. We knew it wasn't actually you who took it... but we were too mad at giant people.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I did almost die... But it’s fine. I’m glad you got your Angel's Eye back.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Those giant people... They barged in too quickly, and we didn’t even have the time to prepare our cannons.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: And when we were ready to fire, they already had the Angel’s Eye with them so we couldn't fire.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Would you like to come inside for a cup of tea?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Thanks, but your houses are too small, so I can’t go inside....

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Oh, that's right. She’s a big fat giant. (chatter chatter)

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Eeek..! No! I’m just bigger than you!

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Yeah. She has bigger butt than ours... (mutter mutter)

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Oh, by the way... how is Aramute doing? He normally comes to visit us once or twice every year, but we haven't seen him around much.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes. Lord Aramute is doing great.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: He’s pretty busy taking care of what the humans have done.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: I see... Those giants. Am I right?

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: But what did they do this time?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: They teamed up with a half-blooded deity called Jude, and killed all the temple lords.

Item.name: dwarfs
Item.talkText: Darn... Those ungrateful bastards.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Aramute gave them miracles, yet they tried to kill him?

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: How stupid... Aramute is not someone who would die so easily.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Yes! He came back to life and defeated Jude.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And he recovered the village...

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It’s peaceful now!

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: The humans are going to lick his boots again, like nothing ever happened.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Asking for miracles again. Hmph.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Ungrateful, disgraceful, dim-witted creatures.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: But we are different.

Item.name: dwarf1
Item.talkText: Unlike those giants, we never ever betray.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I can tell you guys don't socialize with the outside that much... but I think we can be good friends!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Good friends, good! Come hang out with us from time to time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Seems like you got something stolen.., But why are you taking that out on me?!

Item.name: dwarf2
Item.talkText: Here!! We’ll make sure it hits this time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: S... Stop!!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Ugh... I could die from taking one of those...!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I have heard that there are dwarves living under the cliff of Mt. Kentz... But I’ve never actually seen them before.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: And I didn't know they would be shooting cannonballs at me. Are you really... I think that could even kill a dragon.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: An Angel’s Eye? Sounds pretty precious.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: So, no more worrying about the berries, right?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Yes! But...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The Poisers from below the cliff are stealing our crops and food...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The tax became much lighter, so we have plenty of food nowadays...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: But the problem is that the Poisers are spreading diseases.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm... What are the warriors doing?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Oh, the warriors are trying hard to keep them away...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: But they're so fast, and the warriors couldn't catch them.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The warriors are always nervous because of those Poisers.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I think I’ve fought them before, at Lord Elysion’s temple.

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Where are they? I’ll get rid of them for you!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: The Poisers only move during nighttime... But we can't figure out how they get into the village.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: And they appear at random timings..

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Hmm... I see!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: These are the Poisers, huh?

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Successfully eliminated the annoying monsters!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I got all the Poisers.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: R... Really!?

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Thank you so much for helping us out every time!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: It's nothing much.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: It's not much, but... please accept this!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Wow~! It's a pretty dress!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Now that we have a better quality of life, people are starting businesses other than just farming.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: I started making clothes and I’m selling them to Vavelia village.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: This is all thanks to you, Luna.

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: That’s why I wanted to give this to you!

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: Unfortunately, this is all that I can give you...

Item.name: sera
Item.talkText: But I will never forget about what you did for us!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Oh, you're making me blush... Thank you for the dress! Thanks!

Item.name: none
Item.talkText: I will keep the peace of Lalaque village!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: I should show it off to Robin!!
